Content: good service

took my pet fancy rat here for treatment she was losing fur around her neck itching and scabbing she also had a recurring overgrown tooth  making an appointment was so easy and the reception staff was extremely friendly and helpful the veterinarian who treated my rat was knowledgeable friendly and truly listened to my concerns a few days later she called to follow up on my pets recovery  great atmosphere friendly staff great care affordable and reasonable prices

wonderful place dr pearlman was very pleasant and gentle with our cat mitten it was our first time there kerri the receptionist waived the 6900 first exam fee because i mentioned the internet coupon it wouldnt print but they honored it  she also squeezed us in that same day because his shots were overdue mitten received his 3 year fercp and 1 year rabies vaccinations thank you ocean county veterinary hospital

i came to ocvh with my 11 yr old labrador who had a growth on his eyelid  new to the area i chose this facility off the internet and took a chance  i am over whelmed by the compassion the entire staff showed  dr weiner and dr briggs were caring and knowledgeable never rushing our appointments taking the time to explain everything clearly  faced with surgery i felt confident justice would receive the best care i could hope for and he did  i am filled with gratitude and truly appreciate each member of this amazing veterinarian hospital  highly recommended

we have taken our eclectus parrot oliver to see dr gottlieb twice  he and his staff have a real rapport with birds  oliver had been plucking feathers from his chest and stomach  dr gottlieb found an infected follicle prescribed an antibiotic and it is amazing the regrowth of feathers oliver has experienced  these people are the best

i would like to make a recommendation to anyone needing a vet for their animal we have lost 2 animals a kitten and an 8 year old dog within a month and a half this vet takes your animal in asap and has shown so much compassion and generosity by helping us out with some financial costs of losing two pets recently thank you to ocean county veterinary hospital on river ave in lakewood for showing kindheartedness during these difficult times hopefully i wont have to see you soon but all my business will go to you in the future

they consistently care about my dog as if he was their own  the staff at ocvh always goes above and beyond our expectations  i asked them to update me if there were any issues while charlie boarded with them they called just to tell me he was happy and healthy  i recommend ocvh to any pet owner who wants to feel secure knowing their loved ones are being cared for properly

ocean county veterinary hospital is the only place i will ever bring any pets to the doctors are all unbelievably kind and caring and truly love every animal they see the staff is always energetic and friendly and they love the animals just as much i have a rabbit and its not easy finding an exotic pet vet they are the best

wonderful experience from my first phone call for basic information to my first puppy visit exam the vet was so warm knowledge  thorough everyone is so friendly  caring the facility is state of the art  their hours are amazing im so happy i made the first call  so is my new little  rescue puppy scout

very personal care for your pet and a personal connectioon between vet and client i go to the big boxes for shots but wouldnt bring them anywhere else for sick treatmemtthey are a bit pricy and need to consider a multi pet discount plan their current get a stamp on a card for every 100 spent on a visit is very old school and not really an incentive or reward

this was our first experience at ocean county veterinary hospital  our 13 year old dog was very sick  thankfully she received the proper care and is doing well  everyone there is very caring and clearly defined our options with our dog  we will now be using ocean county veterinary hospital for a pets needs

dr danowitz is great  i have been a client for several years with older and ill cats as well as my new younger healthy ones  he is always responsive to my calls with questions about my own cats as well as the feral cats ive encountered recently  i have never had a bad experience with anyone at your hospital  i especially appreciate your professional manner and the treatment i was given on the two occasions when i required end of life care

very pleased with the visit to ocean county vet hospital the staff is friendly and genuine in their interest in helping as you first enter the door the groomer did an excellent job in spite of my pet being in need of surgery the doctor was excellent in reviewing her findings offering alternatives but strongly suggesting the treatment plan best suited for the situation  i will return to the ocean count vet hospital in the future without question

i was in an emergency situation  called my regular vet and was passed off to poison hotline whose main concern was getting my credit card number for payment  friends happened to arrive at my home and called his vet at ocean county veterinary  in just a few moments they gave me helpful advice and that saved my pup and arranged to see home with hours  they are now my pups new vet  doctor bully and the front desk ladies were wonderful to us  highly recommend this facility

i had wonderful experiences at the lakewood location within just a few weeks timespan my dog was neutered brought up to date on his shots and treated for sensitive skin issues and my cat was treated for fleas brought up to date on shots and boarded overnight both pets came home perfectly fine and both pets and myself were treated in a very friendly caring and professional manner my pets were treated by a few different doctors and i was please with all of them highly recommended

just as i want the best medical care for the humans in my household i insist on the best medical care possible for my fur babies  there are many other veterinarians between my home and ocvh but i bypass them all  just recently we had an emergency  we were given prompt professional compassionate friendly care that  i have come to expect as the norm  they are there seven days a week

first time customers had 2 young cats one had some type of acne problem on his face the vet took a culture and diagnosed the problem previously tried lanoka oaks vetenaryand the vet said he had to research it on line what an amateur compared to the vet at ocvh

good experience has sunday hours staff friendly curteous and helpful havent had a problem getting an appointment same day i called veterinarians educated in all creatures they have three bird vets and a reptile guy too

this is the first time weve been to the office to have ourmufffin cockatiel evaluated for nail clippingi was unaware of the intricate exam that took place it was comprehensivei found the vet  to be extremely knowleadgeablei am so glad we were referred to the office by a local pet storethank you mary caddigan

we have been seeing the vets at ocean co veterinary hospital for several years now and are very happy with the care and professionalism exhibited by everyone there  from the reception area to the techs to the doctors we are always pleased with the care our dog and cat get

i really like this office the staff is very friendly and helpful dr danowitz is wonderful he is very knowledgeable and professional he loves animals and gets down on the floor to greet my dog i like that ocvh has multiple locations in ocean county and was able to accommodate me with an appointment for treatment on a friday after 5pm for a bad bee sting

ive been dealing with ocean county veterinary hospital for over 10 years and have never had a negative experience the doctors and support staff are excellent doctor erica iaquinto has been taking care of my 3 cats for many years and does a superb job with them

the people and the facility are top notch we leave our amazon parrot for extended period of time and the care they give our pet is the best they interact with him and send us pictures to keep us posted i have no reservations in recommending them for any pet requirements that might be needed

so far so good  everyone was friendly helpful efficient professional  i thought the pricing was very honest no upselling but no skimping on what was necessary either  very nice veterinary group  glad we found them

my experiences with ocvh have always been very comforting the staff is very professional yet friendly and caring olivers surgeries have always been explained well and the care he was given was always top notch  i trust them 150 with my oliver highly recommend them

the veterinarians conducted a thorough examination and clearly and clearly explained the diagnosis and treatment options the most important thing is that my dog feels comfortable throughout the entire visit i am grateful to the staff for their good care and concern

hello  i happen to be the owner of  4 great danes and an english  short haired pointer  as well as many other    feathered  friends  my last  visit was  terrific  i  recieved a  speedy  appointment  with a   dr i was not familiar with   which was   fine  actually it was a  wonderful  experience this new young lady got to meet a vetran animal  owner dr martin was  a most  knowledgable young lady cordial and experienced as well  my animals  always look forward to their  vet visit because they get such  good  care i can  proudly say i have been a customer of  occvh for the   past  50 years if the doctors were not the best  why would one go back thank you  cordually helene narucki

excellent veterinary hospital my dog puma is a new patient the staff  dr iquinto are true professionals compassionate as well as attentive  they treated my puma for back pain  she responded well to the treatment i highly recommend this place to all animal owners

dr danowitz is a downtoearth intelligent caring veteranarian who is not fast to sell you a product or push meds into your pet  he thinks holistically as well as medicinally my family and i have never felt so comfortable and confident in our veteranarian as we do with dr danowitz

im always satisfied with fischer veternarian the staff are excellent  my two dogs one a boxer and the other a pomeranian are treated with the up most care they also have a concern for your feelings when treating your animal will definitely recommend them to anyone that wants excellent care for their fur babies

i have been bringing my fur kids to ocvh for 7 years now and they have been nothing but the absolute best in every way possible  whether it was treating my dogs and cats for present issues or the unfortunate time of making the decision to let them go be at peace they showed me nothing but compassion and understanding  treated me like a person and most of all treated my babies to the best care i could ever imagine  they listen to you and not dictate to you what you should do   you have a say in your pets care and treatment and this is why i will continue to use them for years to come

dr koenigstein was great with my gecko gg she was very gentle with him in previous years gg didnt like going to veterinarians but this year he was smiling throughout his entire visit i highly recommend dr koenigstein for pets of all sizes

brought my 8yearold and 2yearold cats for exams first time i brought two cats at once staff was welcoming and wait was little dr danowitz was as always extremely friendly to me and to the cats the hospital had a promotion in october for free exam for new patients so one of my boys was no charge the cats were allowed to wander around the office and the atmosphere was comfortable and friendly if you are seeking a compassionate doctor who provides you with the information you need and treats your furry family members like his own dr danowitz is your doctor i went to the lakewood office on october 16 2017

i have used this vet twice both during emergencies when i needed a vet on a sunday  they were accommodating kind professional and knowledgeable in one instance they helped  me make the tough decision to put my seriously ill dog down and in another they helped my dog when she was ill both times they followed up with me my regular vet did not do so wish i lived closer so they would be my regular vet i highly recommend them

i transferred my dogs records from two previous veterinarians  without having accurate records from one of them my dog was vaccinated with shots not due until two years from now and did not get the shots he was due  then i was told it was my fault  luckily my dog is okay but i wont return

dr gottlieb is an excellent veterinarian  he really helped my turtle and answered all my questions  he gave me many recommendations on how to improve the turtles environment and diet and he took the time to give me an estimate on a procedure for another turtle

ocvh is the only place i would take my pet  dr danowitz is second to none  i believe the reason my diabetic cat lived to age 15 is because of the exceptional care from dr danowitz  i now have a 7 year old cat and she is healthy and happy  perhaps she is a bit thick but she doesnt always want to stay on her prescribed diet planthe staff is pleasant and professional the facility is clean  you are greeted at your appointment time  everyone wants  to make your pet comfortable during the visit  it is my pleasure to recommend ocvh to all pet owners

for the 2nd time in 3 years this veterinary group saved one of my dogs lives  i was at their lakewood office when a tumor on the spleen was discovered via an x ray and ultra sound and our airedale was bleeding out  stomach filling with blood from the ruptured tumor on spleen  within minutes he was being prepared for surgery to remove the spleen  because of their preparedness to do surgery so quickly harry lived  had he been at any other  practice he may have very well not made it had they not been prepared to do emergency surgery and had to send us elsewhere  my family and i will be forever grateful to dr danowitz and to the surgeon dr koenigstein of ocean county veterinary hospital for saving our boy harry chrismas   we love you all

my collies love ocean county vet hop the staff the doc are just awesome  the take the time to talk to you  about your needs for your furry babies thanks for taking such pawsome care of ki ki and mae mae and they also make sure any meds that they give to the girls or good for collies since collies have the mdr gene and some meds can kill them

when i moved i was so worried i would never find a veterinary clinic i was as comfortable and confident with in my old home my fears were put to rest when i first went to ocean county veterinary clinic i have brought my boys to see most of the vets there at this time and i have never been disappointed  i recommend ocv for all your animals needs

excellent service i used to take my pup to a pet store and felt like o had to constantly explain nel is an abused shelter dog they places embarrassed me so bad ocvh was so understanding and helpful they answered all my questions so respectful

words cannot do justice to the way my daughter and i felt about our experience at the ocean county veterinarian hospital  from the initial call to the generous amount of time given to us by the vet everything was wonderful  we felt like dr crawford truly cared about our bunny and truly cared about us  he took the time to thoroughly examine our rabbit and then explained in lengthy detail the situation   dr crawford then taught us how to feed our rabbit with a syringe and allowed us to try to do it ourselves  his warm personality and expert knowledge gave us so much reassurance and confidence  i cannot thank him and the staff enough for saving our rabbit and putting a smile back on my worries daughters face   i have already recommended this wonderful vet to others as we were so impressed with it thank you so much

i brought my bunny here recently and my experience was fantastic everyone i encountered was extremely friendly the doctor was very knowledgable and informed me of everything i needed to know and provided informational papers as well ill be back with my bunny soon

the ocean county veterinarian clinic cares about making sure your animals are healthy they are a pleasant and informative group who help guide you and making important decisions for your animals  they also have great grooming and all around support

we have small parrots conures and have been using ocvh for over 14 years now  the doctors are knowledgeable and really care about the health of their patients  the staff is pleasant and very cordial and they really like animals

i was very happy with the care that peanut received as he had a mass removed from his abdomen pathology report stated it was cancerous so i am happy with the decision that  was made to remove it thank you dr iaquinto for the excellent care you provided

favorite veterinary hospital i have a great vet there that i take my cat to ross gottlieb who is awesome with my cat and i have several that i will bring there as needed very pleased and comfortable there highly recommend this facility i use the lakewood facility which is immaculate everyone there is very pleasant customer client service is top notch i love them so much so that i want to work there great place

although i am in north jersey primarily we have used them on a few occasions over the summer we had a very sick chihuahua and they were fantastic with her saved her life basically they also carry the rx food we use for aging dogs with heart issues i would recommend them to anyone

im new to the area and the staff fit me in to have my dog examined as she was limping  vet was super friendly professional and spent the required time with us  no rushing  she answered all questions and took her time  i would recommend this facility and will continue to frequent there

very friendly staff dr konickstine not sure if this is the right spelling sorry  was great  she explained everything and helped me be reasonable with options for an elderly kittie i just adopted  would highly recommend

the vet and vet tech could not have been nicer and more professional however it was somewhat of an emergency and i was told by a very formal receptionist who got her locations confused anyway the next appointment was 5 hours away i chose this vet because if i did have an emergency it was close the receptionist only offered going over the the lakewoodbrick office finally she relented and let me pay the emergency 50 fee to come in i understand procedure is procedure rules are rules etc but the tone and officious attitude got me very close to changing vets i am still somewhat annoyed an update within a few minutes of this posting i received a call from ocvh apologizing for the actions of their employee and promising to look into it further that made me feel much better and is the level of service normally associated with this clinic thank you
a very fine establishment doctors and nurses were very kind and helpful a bit more expensive than usual had to pay an extra 50 for an emergency appointment place is clean and professional

we were away from home and not sure what vet to go tobut luckily we picked an excellent one and the staff was also great they were so caring with my family member he was taken care of with gentleness and kindness and professionalism thank you so much

having moved from north jersey and leaving a vet i have been taking my pets to for 30 years i had some trepidation about starting over with new vets there was no need for concern because i found the right place my dog and i love dr gottlieb and feel hes concerned about her and very capable of caring for her needs

excellent service  doctor is available for any questions after the visit  docotor called me back quickly and never rushed me when i had any questions  thanks for your caring compassionate interest in my pet

only problem i had was with the medication that was prescribed to my dog was way overpriced they were charging me 75 dollars a month and when i asked if they could send the prescription to the pharmacy i only had to pay 7 this was after months of paying the outrageous overcharge besides that the staff was friendly and it is a clean facility

dr danowitz and the entire staff make me and my animals feel welcome and loved every time we come whether its for a yearly check up or a sick visit  for my doberman duke dr danowitz got right on the floor with himand when i had to put my cat to sleep they comforted my cat and myself  i cant say enough great stuff about them

i have a 4 month old black lab puppy that i believed to have a urinary tract infection i called and they were very kind and they were able to get me in the same day they have late hours so it was perfect for me to go after work that evening the receptionists were very kind and made my puppy feel comfortable when we were in the exam room the assistant which im assuming is a vet tech was so kind and friendly she was very knowledgeable and made us feel like we were in good hands when the doctor came in he was very understanding and did whatever he could to help us resolve her issue just a very overall great experience this was our first visit to a vet since we adopted our puppy and i would definitely recommend this practice to friends and family

i have been going to ocvh for many years for all my dogs present and past  i can only think of one incident that occurred many years ago when the vet i used for all my dogs was not in  my beagle was in extreme distress caused by a blocked bladder and was crying in pain  the vet that handled the case took all her time diagnosing him and since the dog was quite old and had many other problems and was not able to walk  i chose to have him euthanized but she suggested surgery to resolve the blockage  i still remember that day and the extreme coldness on the part of the vet and swore to never have her treat any other dog of mine  out side of that  i have always been very pleased with the way my pets have been treated  the one thing that bothered me was that i recently realized that the vet was still part of the staff
dr danowitz and his staff was so friendly professional and nice very gentle with our little kitty lots of advice and information already recommended them to my friends and family
absolutely love the staff  dr perlman is kind compassionate and very thorough the prices are really high compared to most offices around here but i wont switch because of the doctors and techs

we loved dr gottlieb he didnt tried to push anything on us or rush us into a decision on our bearded dragon the office staff was wonderful even told me about a coupon for the 1st free exam i highly recommend this place

a very professional vet practice i use the lakewood office i have a bird and have visited there twice already both times very positive and very happy with the doctors also i had to board the bird for a week excellent care and daily pictures helped me through missing her cannot say enough excellent things about this experience
i can always get an appointment for my dog or cats promptly  everyone there is caring and professional when it comes to dealing with either well being checks or emergencies

nala and i had a great experience at your veterinary hospital the staff was very helpful and friendly they made me feel real comfortable leaving my nala in their hands i would recommend your hospital to all my family and friends keep up the great work guys
awesome place  the doctors and technicians are great  we had such a positive experience every time we came  we did the k laser treatment for our westie  and they were wonderful
i highly recommend this veterinary hospital because they treated my pet like their owni have peace of mind every time i am out of town that my zoey is being taken care of

our dog recently had surgery and it could not have gone better the staff were all friendly and showed compassion for our little furry friend they checked in with us post surgery and expressed their concern for how he was doing i love taking my dog to ocvh because i know theyll do a great job no matter what

i got charged for a office visit in which they never looked at my cat just asked what was wrong with her and i told them she had like clogs of matted fur that need to be cut off or shaved off  and they didnt do such a good job as before and my cat was in pain cause of how they shaved her i will never let them shave her again the people were nice and all but i felt i shouldnt have been charged 6900 for the visit

i have always had a great experience with the doctors especially dr danowitz  last night my dog had an emergency and dr weiner went out of his way to make sure we found the best overnight facility he made phone calls and spoke to the doctors and reassured us that my dog would be taken care of all is well today thank you dr weiner

i use ocean county veterinary for 11 years when i had my previous dog she was a papillon and the care and services from the staff was awesome  when me and my son decide it was time to get another puppy i use a local vet near my house  will that was a big mistake to do so i decided to bring my puppy here when he was not feeling to well  the 25 mins plus drive is well worth it  excellent care
dr crawford and his staff were amazing taking care of our dog casey in an emergency situation  they were quick caring and very sympathetic to our needs  thank you so much

i got charged for a office visit in which they never looked at my cat just asked what was wrong with her and i told them she had like clogs of matted fur that need to be cut off or shaved off  and they didnt do such a good job as before and my cat was in pain cause of how they shaved her i will never let them shave her again the people were nice and all but i felt i shouldnt have been charged 6900 for the visit
doctor was good but very expensive and they charged me twice in a month for doctor visit when i took my cat the second time only to finish the vaccine they charge unnecessarily and it was not fair

great care if you want to be treated with courtesy and respect and want to be confident that your pet will be treated with courtesy and respect also make ocean county vet hosp your first and only choice  they care for your animals and care about them as well
doctor was good but very expensive and they charged me twice in a month for doctor visit when i took my cat the second time only to finish the vaccine they charge unnecessarily and it was not fair
have been using ocvh for over 30 years  pleasant staff and now that they have extended their hours pretty easy to get an appointment that fits your schedule dr briggs and dr dannowicz are awesome
the doctors are kind take the time to really listen and are compassionate  all youd want in a vet  i highly recommend this team of doctors switched from a previous vet and will never regret the move
honestly its always a pleasure coming here you guys treat our animals as family and always go above and beyond to take care of them

always able to get us an aplointment all the vets and techs there are very good with both out girls even when i requested a document to be faxed recently they were on top of it and sent it immediately
the staff was very friendly  the veterinarian was very informative and patient  i wasnt pressured into tests or additional products as i have in past at other vets
i would not trust my little girl with any other veterinary they took such good care of her very professional the whole staffspecial thanks to dr cosgrovecorina says thank you

i have been bring my 2 dogs for treatment and yearly well visits for the past 8 years  they are available when you need to bring you pets for treatment and return calls if you have questions   i would recommend them to my family and friends

dr was very nice to xplsined everything to me with cost before doing anything he was very concerned about cuddles condition he called me monday morning when he got results of the xray which i thought was nice
doctor danowitz is by far the best he spends the extra time answering all our questions and making sure we are comfortable

just this week brought my dog in for teeth cleaning hes been seen by vets there for the 3 years ive had him never once during an exam did vet say he needed teeth cleaning i was the one who expressed my concern fast forward12 teeth taken out cost outrageous i expressed that i needed to pick him up close to 3 so that i could make it to work sat in parking lot till 5  other then  not sure they care

i have 5 pets and they are all well cared for by ocvh  every veterinarian that has taken care of my pets is always well informed and keeps in touch with me as to the care of my pets and any illness they may have  if i need to call they will call back  i have had a couple of instances of ill pets that have been taken care of very welli do like that they have multiple offices and the availability of multiple vets if particular vets are not available that day for my pets to see  they do make every attempt to make sure you get the vet you want to see  their hours are great and 7 days a week most important they take me right in when i have an emergency
honest and gracious are those that work at this hospital id recconmend everyone come and check out their services
we love going to ocvh our cat is always treated with kindness dr wiener always knows the best solution to help her and always puts us at ease

we absolutely love ocvh we have been going there for years and have always been happy with our experience dr briggs is the best he has so much knowledge and is always willing to educate us on the health of our dog we are truly grateful for dr briggs and ocvh

wonderful and caring staff and doctors  they have helped keep our pets healthy and have saved their lives  i especially love dr koenigstien and dr crawford  they are so caring and realistic about our multiple cat home
wonderful staff  doctors  they took care of our baby with compassion  professionalism  this is why they are our vets
was a pleasure dealing with the lakewood office for my horrific ordeal of fleas on my indoor cat  clean facility friendly helpful staff
excellent servicethe doctor was nicethe reception is so helpful and friendly they make you feel at home i highly and heartily recommend ocvh

i brought my 7 year old cavachon in to check on some growths  all was fine  gave me drops to put in her ears when they bother her allergies vet was polite and kind  will probably make this hospital my regular vetthank you

we have two dogs that we bring in for care and we have always been very pleased with the attention and care they have received all of the doctors in the practice are excellent we trust them completely
thanx to ocean county veterinary hospital they save my lovely boxer diana best doctors team supportive staff
everyone at ocvh in lakewood is very friendly and helpful dr koenigstein is amazing and always treats my dog wonderfully
i would definitely recommend to a friend dr crawford was amazing with my hamster i felt comfortable with him and he was so kind understanding and knowledgeable
i felt comfortable bringing my pets to this veterinarian hospital and trusted the vets opinion clean and overall welcoming just a little expensive but worth the initial charge
i wouldnt trust anyone but dr briggs and the wonderful staff at ocvh to take care of my furbabies much love from ollie lexi and chloe
dr danowitz is an excellent veterinarian he is knowledgeable caring and thorough the staff is very friendly i highly recommend ocvh
ocvh is the best they are very caring and compassionate of your pets we love the hours of operation and the ease of getting an appointment
extremely friendly compassionate caring sincere and skilled staff  wouldnt think of taking my pets anywhere else
it was a very good visit for me the vet and her assistant handled niko expertly even though he was not being very cooperative
couldnt ask for a more caring and wonderful vet vet techs office staff are all just wonderful compassionate people
saving animals so lovely i cant even explain how important it is thank you kind people you are my heroes
dr mitchell is amazing   she is very thorough yet gentle and takes time to listen to all your concerns   excellent care highly recommend
dr jenna k was absolutely amazing her sincerity and kindness brought tears to my eyes shes the best  forever grateful   duke k
everyone was friendly caring and very professional they answered all my questions and took good care of my two kittens
professional caring and trustworthy highly recommend my dog will be going there from now on
my little bichon lala was in pain when i brought her in she was diagnosed and treated quickly and gently she is now on meds and is improving daily they always give you an appointment right away

thank you for saving my dog lainey  in the summer she didnt want to walk much at all  then she started passing out fainting when she pulled on the leash on her harness dr weiner helped us by helping me find ways to help her  he helped me see that i could take action  that didnt break my bank account  he got me to a dog cardiologist at red bank veterinary hospital  she has chronic mitral valve disease and now is on medication to help her heart function more efficiently knowing what her illness is has been an important part of helping me care for her  it helped me focus on what to expect from her and what i could do  now i walk her wherever she wants to go or not go and for as long or short as she wants to walk  if she is doingher business i hold onto her harness so she has no traction to pull away and doesnt faint if she starts to pull andor run i run  with her a short ways   in the cooler weather she wants to walk farther sometimes  next summer we will seeit will be her own assessment of what she can do or not do  she is such a happy girl these days  and she hasnt fainted in over 4 months  thank you so very much to dr weiner  and thank you to the other vets at ocvh that i have had contact with  all superb smart knowledgeable caring  i highly and heartily recommend ocvhps  sorry her photo downloaded sidewayssystem wont let me edit it
dr danowitz is the best his caring attitude and expertise puts our fur babies at ease
i always feel comfortable taking my cat in for care at ocvh the staff is very helpful and the veterinarians are knowledgeable and compassionate
amazing caring staff who will do anything to help you and your pets my family have been loyal clients for over 30 years

we have seen dr koenigstein twice for a wellness checks and trimmings for our red lored amazon she is so very gentile with jack and likes her she takes the time to answer any and all questions we have our bird goes no where else

i have been taking my cats birds and dogs to ocean county vet for 19 years they have always taken very good care of my animals and dr briggs and dr donowitz are the best the reception is so helpful and friendly they make you feel at home
i love going to the vet with my kids everyone is so pleasant and helpful have never had a bad experience
love this place doctors and workers are very professional take good care of my two babies
i have been using ocvh for the past 10 years at least at one point or another i have met all the vets and staff they are excellent in every way and  have gone out of their way to help my pets

i arrived at the lakewood animal hospital with our dog at the time i had written in my pocket calendar i was informed via phone that my appt was for 120 not 1240 which was my written time i had appointments scheduled for doctor visit and for grooming i was told the doctor was with a patient in an examine room they would have the doctor or groomer call me i waited in my car almost 40 minutes no one called nor did anyone come out to my car i called the desk again i told the person that i was waiting outside for 40 minutes the person again informed me that i had written the wrong time down my error i explained that i was given a time to see the vet first and then the groomer would handle the dog when i asked what time was the vet appointment and the groomer appointment both appointments were scheduled for the same time oh sorry yes that does seem strange doesnt fit thats the answer i got i was already annoyed because of the wait i was told ads soon as someone free they would come outside i cancelled both appointments oh would you like to come another day why so you could screw up again very disappointed with this group today i feel an apology is well deserved especially how they insisted that it was my error when i pointed out the same time they had for 2 different appts oh thats odd isnt a satisfactory answer i took a day off from work plus they never returned my call it was handled like careless attitude very poor

just wanted to thank dr crawford and niko for taking such good care of squeaky she is now back to playful self thanks for telling me about the pill pockets she loved them and thought they were her daily treats your services are the only ones i will trust with my little girl i tell everyone about you
the front office staff was very nice the facility is very clean the vet had a good repore with my dogs and took his time examining them
i thoroughly recommend the ocean county veterinary hospital the doctors technicians groomer and staff members are great caring wonderful people
i thoroughly recommend the ocean county veterinary hospital the doctors technicians groomer and staff members are great caring wonderful people
everyone very friendly and took their time with each animal  very caring and knowledgeable
dr crawford is excellent  i feel confident in his decisions for my dog
everyone at ocean county veterinary hospital was wonderful they have taken excellent care of my bunnies

always taken in soon after arrival  if an emergency immediate attention is given  the doctors are efficient compassionate knowledgeable and kind   wouldnt think twice to recommend this veterinary practice
took my 7 month old puppy there on a sunday the  women at the desk the girls working and the doctor were great  the office is very clean
my dog was diagnosed and treated properly friendly staff clean environment

i dont typically post reviews and clearly ocvh does not need me to vouch for them but they are a truly incredible practice thanks to a referral from another lifelong customer of theirs i brought my critically ill parrot to dr briggs in 2015 following numerous visits to emergency hospitals with no resolution dr briggs not only saved his life but took the time to educate me on how to provide him with the best ongoing care i cant stress enough how poor the outcome was looking before his treatment i only wish i had found him sooner it is now 2018 and i have been back regularly for routine checkups and grooms with briggs i do not have a negative thing to say about a single experience i have had my parrot has been sneezing recently so i spoke to kathy who is always wonderful who assisted in providing me with a recommendation from dr gottlieb to bring him in sooner rather than later if possible bird owners know that seemingly minor symptoms can turn serious very quickly she then made me an appointment for the same day with dr crawford as briggs was not working dr crawford was awesome caring patient knowledgeable and educational i already had complete trust in this practice but getting to meet another doctor here made me love them even more the technician and csr staff supporting the superhero vets here are just good people i dont know how to put it more simply everyone i have interacted with has been professional friendly warm and caring everyone even the staff members that walk by go out of their way to acknowledge me and say hello excitedly to my bird its obvious they are passionate about animals and see them in the same special way that all animal lovers do i have the utmost respect for their dedication sensitivity and empathy especially considering the emotion and stress that comes with their line of work i have to mention melissa in particular we both met each other on our first days at ocvh just from opposite ends of the counter she is an excellent example of what makes this practice so special niko is also fairly often the lucky tech that has to wipe bird poop up during our visits thanks man to wrap this novel up i feel very fortunate to have this team and would recommend them with absolute confidence to anyone i was abused as a child and crossing paths with my parrot 14 years ago saved my life and got me through it of course the people at ocvh dont know that but that is exactly the point i dont have to explain to them how much i love my parrot or how important his wellbeing is to me they understand that already and apply that level of care to all of their patients i just hope the entire team knows how significant their efforts are for people like me thank you

for exotic doctors dr gottleib and dr crawford are knowledgeable reliable and dependable  they are rarely unavailable to speak with and always willing to jump on the phone and answer questions which is great especially when you have a reptile that you are not trying to take out of their environment and stress out by bringing in unnecessarily just to address a small question about husbandry or a particular behavior  they go the extra mile when it comes to all exotic concerns and provide the most insightful advice and instruction  i really appreciate them being so local and always available  it makes me sleep better at night knowing these two are just a phone call away if anything should happen to my snuggle muffin bearded dragon man

my rabbit died in their care during a regular spaying from the start i should have known better than to go here when i first needed to make an appointment i had to call 34 times and leave a message for the manager who never called me back then once i actually got the appointment they called me about an hour before the appointment because the surgeon called in sick then once i actually brought her there all they did was weigh her check her to make sure she was a girl then took her away no exam infront of me didnt ask me any questions about her nothing later on that day i got a call asking if i consent to cpr then a call saying she passed they gave me my money back and paid for her cremation i got to say goodbye to my baby and the only explanation i got was that she was fine after surgery but 2 hours after her temperature dropped then she died i asked if she was monitored at all and they told me she was she was next to a dog in critical condition during recovery so there had to be staff around her i had a woman from the nj house rabbit society follow up with them and the story they gave her was completly different than what i was told they told her she passed due to her bleeding more than usual if she bled more than usual then stop the surgery and save the life of my bunny or watch her closer during recovery i believe they did not tell me the truth and she was not watched as well as they said she was i got more sympathy and compassion from the woman at the house rabbit society than the office manager there im sure this vet is more than fine with dogs and cats but if you have a small animal please dont go here for surgery there are plenty of other specialists who give you more one on one care than here im sure they did not mean to harm her in anyway but after reading all these negative reviews from small animalexotic animal owners they probably shouldnt be working on small animals and just stick with dogs  cats not only is my family heartbroken but my other 6 year old rabbit is left without his partner

my family just moved to toms river from central nj and we had an emergency with our 3 years old olde english bulldog benjamin the second day we were in our new home he had caught his dewclaw in the deck and it broke in half fischer veterinary hospital fit us in right away and had benjamins paw fixed within minutes the vets personal care and concern for our dog was so heart warming and they even called a few days later to check and see how he was feeling we now bring our three dogs and hamsters to fischer and couldnt be happier all of the vets are knowledgeable compassionate and truly care about not only our animals but our entire family i give them 5 stars and would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a great trustworthy vet the staff is also amazing from the front desk to all of the vet technicians we look forward to bringing all of our fur family to them for many years to come thanks fischer vet you guys are the best

i met dr falk in 1976 and was immediately impressed with him in the early 80s  i was able to work there part time and saw that all clientele were treated with respect  and the pets were given top notch care over the years some of the faces have changed but never the quality of care and understanding given to my pets and to me personally i hope dr falk is enjoying his retirement i miss him and think of him often  the staff at ocvh is exemplary in every way friendly caring warm interested concerned knowledgeable and efficient  i was glad to see them expand their practice  although i have moved a few times i would never consider another practice  there could be none better when my husband passed dr falk and kate flitton from their office staff even attended the funeral which touched my heart i have known dr briggs since he joined the practice and trust him to know what is the best course of carehe is such a professional that i always have to remind him to drop titles and just call me carol despite the length of our affiliation  dr pearlman always goes out of her way to ensure that everything is thoroughly checked and that each of my pets thrive and are safe and happy she is a warm and caring woman who takes care of me too understanding what a deep bond i have for my dogs all explain any procedures and dispense information without talking over in vet talk through the years they have grown  and it couldnt happen to a more deserving group  they are like family and i am proud to have experienced ocvh and will continue to trust my dogs to the best veterinarian practice
ocvh has been taking care of our pets for almost 20 years we have never had a bad experience and have always been treated exceptionally we cant imagine taking our pup to anyone else

we love everyone at ocvh dr weiner is so knowledgeable and honestly cares for every pet weve ever brought to him as if they were his own he is extremely gentle and takes his time with us  dr weiner also explains everything so thoroughly and breaks down the cost for you before doing any procedure he will help you set everything up in a way that makes sure your animal is cared for and you can afford it when our dogs cody passed in 2015 and zuska passed 2017 were so sick dr weiner did everything he possible could for them he stayed with us and was a huge comfort as we cried letting them go he let us take as much time with them before we had to go home without our babies each person on staff those horrible days cried with us and were just so comforting dr weiner called us the next day to repeat how sorry he was for our loss and then personally sent us a sympathy card along with a paw print and our dogs fur  ocvh has also helped us out with any animal weve ever fostered even though they were with us for a short time dr weiner and his staff treated them as if they were ours  everyone is so kind and caring as at ocvh you are always greeted with a smile and the staff is very knowledgeable as well  when you are there you feel like family i always have and i always will recommend ocvh to everyone i meet

my wife and i boarded our cat buddy for 2 weeks and were completely satisfied with the excellent care he was given we had used your services once before and would do so again when leaving a beloved pet for a significant period of time it is a pleasure knowing that he or she is in capable and loving hands thank you mr mrs vincent vitolo

we had our girl ella examined by dr gottlieb  she is elderly and is starting to develop problems  we went to the bridge avenue office  dr g was just wonderful to her  he sat on the floor and waited for ella to come to him  she was very relaxed  he prescribed new medicine and she is doing betterwe would recommend dr g to any animal parent
i always have a great experience with dr danowitz he seems to really care about my pet
everyone was great friendly and caring

no matter how busy the hospital is everyone including the doctors make you feel you and your pet are the only patients there from the front registration area to the techs to our fantastic doctors  your love and concern for our beloved pets are second to none
thank you for all you do for all the elderly rescused pomeranians i haveyou get us xoxo  susan lanza

excellent service very personable and enjoyable to be around all the staff the veterinarian was very clear of what was making my animal sick he seemed to be very knowledgeable about ferrets and assuming other exotic animals i was completely confident in his prognosis would recommend this office to everyone

they were so nice i was presented with options and never made to feel like i was making a bad decision with my pet  no pressure to go for the expensive tests and they made sure i understood everything about medications and administering them before i left

whenever i go to ocean county vet i feel that caring people are there to help and that they care about my cats the way that i do everyone takes the time needed and the visit is a wonderful experience  thank you

this is not my regular vet  i was in toms river with my cat when my regular vet back home advised that i find a local vet to take my cat for my first time meeting him dr crawford was very kind sympathetic patient understanding and answered all my questions  he also gave me a handout dealing with my cats situation  he took all the time with me that i needed to be comfortable in understanding what was wrong with my cat and how to correct it  as promised he called the next morning with blood test results and was happy to hear my cat was doing better  i would highly recommend him and this clinic
they were really nice treated my dog very well got an appointment the next day
wonderful caring people and amazing service
ocvh is awesome  thank you to everyone from the csrs to the tech to the dr  everyone is so nice and professional  thank you dr danowitz for everything
the staff are amazing
when it comes to avian vets there are few to choose from but i found a great avian vet at ocean county and i am completely great full for all the love and attention fruity received at ocean county

the entire staff at ocvh went over and beyond the call of duty to make my sweet cat feel better  from the sweet lady that answered the phone to the friendly man that helped carry my cat out to the car you are all angels  thank you for your awesome service
everyone was very thoughtful caring and attentive

i called for an appointment on very short notice and they took me right in my boston terrier  had kennel cough and i was very concerned about her choking everyone was so  comforting and the vet examined her almost immediately  i was in and out less than 40 minutes i will now be using dr erica as my pets permanent vet great staff

after an unbelievably awful experience at my prior vet ocvh helped my dog big time dr iaquinto is very knowledgeable budget friendly not an alarmist and prioritizes procedures as far as whats most important first to avoid spending thousands all of the staff is so friendly the facility is clean and the hours are amazing the pharmacy is on premises and open until late at night in my many many visits there i have not one single complaint

i chose the bridge ave in point vets after a lot of research i needed a vet service that knew a lot about cats with urinary blockage for i have a male that is 5 years old who has this issue dr martins was wonderful and had studied this disease in cats fast forward 6 months later same cat different issue i called in the am and they told me to come right over this time i saw dr koeningstein she was also wonderful and so supportive i was a mess she was on the phone many days after my visit all hours of the day we still do not know what was the issue with my cat blood work shows liver levels were spiked my cat has since recovered because i had these wonderful vetsthe only issue i have is they are more expensive then other vetsi am on a fixed budget so this hurt me financially but i love my cat also there medication is way over priced so if you can take your script some where else i recommend it what cost me 2400 there for 2 tabs i got 30 tabs at costco for 1000
you need to have a couple hundred dollars every time to go there the bill adds up  too many doctors in the practice which make the price expensive

i have taken all of my pets to ocean county vet for years now and i find that i get a lot out of their yearly exams the vets always take the time to answer any questions that i may have and always give suggestions to improve my pets health
dr briggs was a very good vet who quickly helped my dog with expediency he took an almost dire situation to help my baby will make a full recovery
we have brought all of our pets  here for the last 20 years  very caring staff

left my dog oliver there for 10 days for my trip to california he received the best care and love which could be provided always take him the re for his examinations and any shots he requires janet

i recently adopted a puppy and switched from a previous vet we used for our since deceased dog the office staff was delightfully friendly and the technican we had was so very gentle and kind  when the doctor came in she just as kind and very thorough  i am so glad we found we this practice
rooms were clean and bright
staff is great but we are loyal customers because dr danowitz is the best

i truly love the care my furbaby received at this hospital  the only reason i did not give 5 stars is because while waiting to pick up my baby after surgery i heard a tech in the back tell her to shut up now while i understand how frustrating it is to have a small dog continuously bark in a cage they may not realize that the furbaby is scared misses her mom and brothers and is never ever caged so she is probably extremely stressed out instead of maybe holding and petting her to yell shut up is unacceptable and what i should have done was  opened the door to the back and reprimanded the person who did it  other than that the front desk was wonderful and i cannot say enough wonderful things about dr i

i always get the very best service at ocvh  no matter whether i am going in to pick up medication for one of my dogs or have an appointment with one of their vets  all the vets that have taken care of my pups have been terrific  they always listen to my concerns and have clear and concise instructions for me to follow to help me care for my dogsthank you for caring for my pups as you would care for me
dr was great could tell she loved animals staff was courteous and proficient at their jobs

lately it seems that my visits with benjaminmy 4 yearold dog have been emergencies i have total confidence in every vet doctor i have seen i recommend this veterinary hospital to everyone and have sent three people the past year who have been very satisfied with the care and say they would not consider going anywhere else linda isenburg human mom of benjamin george
very caring friendly staff offices well kept and clean excellent vet

saw dr mitchell for our elderly cat she is one of our favorite veterinarians at ocvh  we were a little disappointed in the vet tech who was nice to us and our cat but seemed uncomfortable cleaning him up after he had an accident in the cat carrier  other vet techs we have had in the past go above and beyond to clean up our kitty and his carrier  this tech seemed new and inexperienced so maybe it will be better next time  we still love ocvh

i have been with ocvh for 25 years 3 dogs wouldnt go anywhere else love dr mitchell she is so caring gentle and thorough took great care of my bailey right up to the end and now is taking great care of my molly the office staff is great pleasant and always there to help you all your questions and concerns are always addressed immediately i have recommended a few people and they are all happy  love you guys

they have always taken good care of my brandy i had to board her last year for 3 weeks while i was recovering from back surgerymy brother who lives in ohio found them for me and handled everything they wereare a blessing wouldnt take her anywhere else
we have been using ocvh for a really long time and through most of our dogs lives i have recommended them to all my friends that have pets too

my cat baxter had a laceration resulting in an abscess  the vet i initially took him to could not do the stitches that day  i called ocean county veterinary clinic and the receptionist said to bring him right over  dr weiner did the surgery that afternoon and i picked baxter up the next day  everyone was so nice  they stayed in touch that night and the next morning to let me know what was going on  i will never go anywhere else

the 1st time we visited ocean county veterinary hospital was in february when we got our sugar gliders we were so lucky to get dr gottlieb  a few days ago we adopted a puppy and she had just been spayed and has some bleeding as a result  we headed there late in the evening with her and dr gottlieb was amazing he sat on the floor with her and made her feel comfortable  his love of animals is undeniable and he is very thorough my puppy is now feeling great and we know we found a vet for life  i also want to compliment the staff at both the lakewood and the jackson office everyone is always helpful friendly and knowledgeable

i am so thankful for ocvhi called for an emergency and the receptionist said bring her right ini only waited 5 minutes in the officethe doctor and staff were wonderfulthank god as far as we know it is only a utii will continue too use ocvheveryone from the receptionist too assistant too the doctor was wonderfulcan not thank them enough
had my pets nails trimmed the vet techs were very nice and a vet actually came out to answer a question i had great experience just wish nail trimming were cheaper for smaller animals

we have 2 parrots  every place will see dogs  cats but help for birds is much harder we were able to come in right away or wait until saterday to see the main doctor we waited  doctor k was great everyone involved was so wonderful she is now are babies doctor  this is our place for help
i loved the way ocean county veterinary hospital dealt with my dog eric and with me and all the services including the pharmacy are under one roof
i was very pleased with everyone who works here i was treated with care and respect as was my dog bentley
very pleased with the compassion this office has with my dog

we have been bringing all of our pets and referring all of our friends to ocvh for over 40 years although sometimes the faces change with new physicians joining and a few leaving almost always everything remains the same high quality veterinary care starting from the top on down could not ask for better treatment or concern a special mention to dr koenigstein who most recently helped us through one of the most difficult times in our lives with compassion and understanding that is rare these days pretty sure we could not have handled this without her

i have a sun conure avian and she starting laying eggs and i was very concerned about her condition i went to the fischer location and i did not feel that comfortable then the following week i spoke to dr paul crawford regarding her condition and he was so helpful and compassionate and had me go to the office to pick up medicine for her the first visit was 28680 and i am on a fixed income this was quite expensive for the visit so when dr crawford  the ocean county office said i could come in and pick up the medication and it only cost me 2251 it was such a releaf dr crawford is a wonderful person  edna krane
very tender with the animal every time i had to bring my cat their

i have visited two branches of this hospital for well visits for my canary each time i was impressed with the high level of service and courtesy displayed by all the employees i definitely recommend this hospital will be returning for future visits for sure
competent and caring vets

dr danowitz was kind enough to see max even though it was at the end of his busy schedule  he is always compassionate and caring  i also like that he takes the conservative approach when treating max  i am very happy with ocean county vets

all the staff  doctors are fantastic  the only issue i hadhave is that the medication prescribe for my dog besides costing 12400 he wont take or eat  even when it is ground up and mixed in with his favorites appears he can smell the medicine  other than that id recommend ocean county veterinary hospital and have to everyone who needs a vet
always a articulate friendly and comforting experience at our vet
i have been using ocean county vet for years and have always found them efficient and professional love that they call you when promised and explain everything in detail

the vet was acceptable the vets assistant the technician was terrible she said she was new and didnt know the answers to my questions about the medication i was given i asked to speak with the vet regarding the medications perscribed she left came back and just again tried to answer my question when i specifically asked to speak with the vet  thats not a big issue or a big deal the problem i have is when my large 3lb guibea pigs stomach and ribs are being squeezed down to about 2 inches against her body while my guinea pig is squeezed and screamed at the top of his lungs my guinea pig is practically mute he doesnt make vocalizations practically ever i immediately said stop squeezing him and made the doctor look at his organs again and bones since i figured an organ burst or ribs were fractured definately a traumatic experience for me and most importantly my guinea pig he doesnt really seem to be improving and im sure the severe stress of being squeezed hard and squeeling for the first time in his life added to his already declining status certainly will not be using this clinic again because of the lack of training and common sense the new  technician has this should be a professional establishment when its costomers are asked to drop 100s of dollars pet parents have enough to worry about with their sick animals they shouldnt have to be deeply concerned for the health of their animal at the hands of untrained uneducated clueless technicians  side note it wasnt his nails being trimmed he has no problem with that many people have held him normally in the past and it was a smooth experience
everyone is always very pleasant and they always take such wonderful care of our sam
terrific everyone was warm and friendly and treated bailey like a princess

this was our first visit to the ocean county veterinary hospital  we had been looking for a new place since we moved to toms river  the one we had been going to was not very caring and they were outrageously expensive  i got a great price on groupon for a checkup rabies vaccination and nail clipping  i thought it would be a great way to try a new place without getting slammed with a huge billwe have a  5 12 year old cockapoo who loved the attention she got  and a 20 year old bichonpoo  the doctor spent time answering questions and concerns we had about our 20 year old dog  she was very helpful and understanding  we feel that we have found the right place for our family

they took great care of my harley girl she is a spunky english bulldog and a very heavy breather especially when she is excited she had a runny mucos nose and was coughing they put her on antibiotics and she is doing great  they had allot of patience with her and really cared its hard not to love her because she is so friggin cute they called me a few times to check up on harley to make sure she was getting better and she is thanks to all for helping my baby girl

my experience was reallyreally great  the dr and his staff are all wonderful people  friendly courteous  and very very pleasant and helpful  i would never hesitate to go their again and i would recommend as many many friends and family as possible thank you all for your help and kindness from pumpkin seema  and steven

dr crawford is the best vet i have ever seen all of the vets are great but dr crawford is awesome he was very informative about new treatments and hopefully the treatment that im trying now will help my babies not be so itchy so far they are doing good on the new meds if it wasnt for doc crawford i wouldnt have known that the medicine existed

all the staff are really caring and friendly docs are top notch and spend time with you i take all of my pets there dogs and birds great grooming on site and the groomer used to be a vet tech so she can help spot trouble early

this was my first time using them and i must say i was very pleased with the facility and the people the doctor was very knowledgable understanding and compassionate she explained everything in as much details as we wanted and gave us time to absorb the information and make informed decisions taking care of pets is very expensive but our pets are part of our family so we need to be able to do the best for them and be able to afford it having the most information helps when hard decisions are to be made
excellent service from a very compassionate staff  especially love the knowledge professionalism and sense of humor of dr briggs who cared for my baby girl lola

my 4 year old cat jj had a urinary track blockage  the plan was for energency surgery  i left jj and by the time i got home i got a call saying the prep medication had relaxed him and he had begun to urinate  he had to stay for a couple of days to test for toxins and monitor his urination etc  i got calls each morning and evening with progress reports  i wish  human doctors were as caring and efficient  i was confident jj was in good hands  i got full written instructions on medication and what to expect in a release report  this would have been 5 stars except for the cost  this is not specific to ocvh but in general  there is a push to adopt rescue etc animals  as a senior citizen on fixed income the cost of veterinary care makes it difficult to have a pet without the worry  in the back of my mind what if they get sick  pets are expensive proposition
dr danowitz is the best stu loves coming to see him and i think dr danowitz loves it as much as stu great place to bring your animal

love doctor danowitz great doctor the only thing i had an issue with recently is that i feel i shouldnt have been charged for a full office visit for a 2 second booster shot still trying to figure out how that makes any sense

ive been back and forth with vets for my dog and i could never find the right vet for her so once i went to ocvh i was amazed with how truthful and honest they were and helped me get the right things needed for my best friend i will be returning to them they are reasonably priced and nothing but loving to your animals definitely a place to go
great well trained professionals

i went to ocvh due to an emergency for my dog  i do not live in the area  and this is not my pets vetdr danowitz was excellent  took the time to discuss with me the issue with my dog i did not feel rushed or and felt comfortable asking as many questions as needed to help alleviate my concerns  the treatment required several follow up visits and each time i felt comfortable that my dog was getting excellent and the best care  after arriving back home i brought my dog to his usual vet and did not get the same feeling of care and concern from him and weve been going there for almost 12 years  dr koenigstein  saw him for his last visit dr danowitz was off that day and that was the only day i can get there and she was just as wonderful  she said she spoke to dr danowitz that morning concerning my dog and not going based on reports  that made me feel much more comfortable seeing her and dr danowitzthe assistants the front desk and billing desks were all personable and helpfulmy only complaint is that i cant use dr danowitz and ocvh as my primary vet  i would switch in a heartbeat

the staff is super friendly  it is easy to get an appointment quickly and there are never long waiting times before being seen in the exam room  the exam rooms and reception area are spotless  i trust them to know what is best for my pets

i called the office upset because my elderly dog was ill the staff was professional and kind i really appreciated their response the dr made an appointment to see us that night

why does pet care have to be so expensive still dont know why may pet is lethargic and has no energy and spent over 1000

my 1st experience with new prospect veterinary  no problem with ocean county vet who could see my dog as an emergency visit extra  but told me new prospect vet would be a charge for reg visit i needed a vet tech to remove a tick from my dogs eye lid but was told a dr had to perform this procedure  long story shortwhat should have been a 66 office charge turned into additional 65 for nexgard frontline is around so long ticks are becoming resistant  i mentioned my dog licking her paw50 skin cytology 21 diphenhydramine capsule and 30 for chlorhexidine mousse   i left charging 23288 excluding tax  to my bank card  i have not used the capsule or mousse and dont intend to slight bacterial infection which cleared on its own  that would have been a savings of 51 not to mention the 50 cytology fee meds were handed to me on exit with prescription labels attached  i know i should have said no but was in shock and had a impatient person waiting in the car lesson learned  ask for purpose of tests and for a consult before accepting meds

i couldnt get dr briggs and when i asked for an avian vet they told me she was good she was in the process of learning about birds and kept asking the tech if she was doing it right he knew more than her  couldnt answer my questions and in my opinion did not cut his wings right

i specifically chose ocvh because of their experience doing laparoscopic oves after doing a great deal of research i decided to take this route for my dog instead of a traditional ovh i am glad i made this decision all the personnel at ocvh were excellent the entire staff is very professional and i did not feel any concern leaving my dog in their care dr briggs took time to meet with me before the operation and explained everything and answered all my questions i highly recommend this approach to spaying the surgery is minimally invasive and my dog came home with me that day i dropped her off at 830 and picked her up at 1230 within 36 hours after the surgery she was back to normal as if nothing had happened i highly recommend the ocvh

i came to this place and off the back i was comfortable the staff were very nice and welcoming as well as the doctors there was no sign of anything being rushed my dog was handled very gently this place is very professional   i would suggest this place to people

my wife and i have been clients of ocvh since 1976 we took our very first pup to them way back in 1976 we had raised 3 dogs separately during the course of those years till present time all of them had the best care possible at ocvh they were there for our dogs thru sickness surgeries and whatever was needed to give our dogs the best quality of life possible when it was time for the inevitable heartbreak due to sickness or old age of putting them down the compassion felt towards our loss by the doctors was just wonderful because not only did our family feel the loss of our loved one ocvh felt the loss too that says a lot we now have a new pup which is now our 4th dog and she is following the past footsteps of all our previous dogs and we are right back at ocvh she is already a part of their family our favorite two doctors are dr mitchell and dr danowitz we continue to be in the best of hands

we have been a client of ocean county veterinary hospital for nearly 40 years the cost of monthly preventative medications for our dog are completely out o sight being retired and on a fixed income we are finding it necessary to seek alternative services and alternative meds for our pet

for the most part the staff at ocvh are incredibly kind and caring i had brought my kitten to the jackson location multiple times for kitten care and always had a great experience the only reason i have mixed feelings is that i had to bring my kitten in when he stopped eating and was vomiting they took an xray and ultrasound and confirmed that he had an obstruction in his stomach  2500 later i found out that there was no obstruction and that the surgery was not needed i wish more could have been done in ways of blood tests to see if he really had an obstruction or if it was slight inflammation of the gi tract and a very mild bout of pancreatitis which is what he really had they didnt run run blood tests before the surgery to see if there was an alternative and in the end the surgery was a hinder to my kittens recovery they wanted me to keep him there for overnight fluids for two days but at this point i didnt have anymore money saved they wanted another 700 and they dont even have anyone on staff from 10pm to 7am so if anything went wrong no one would be there to help i decided to take the fluids medications and my kitten home with me it took a lot of tlc and some syringe feeding but he got better  i have been trying to contact them for some more information on aftercare but no one is getting back to me i know they truly believed they saw an obstruction in his intestines but they misdiagnosed my kitten and didnt seem to blink an eye when i explained to them how upset i was that they had to cut my already sick cat open for no reason and then proceed to charge me full price   pros caring staff great same day service cons misdiagnosis
i wholeheartedly highly recommend ocvh  you wont find a more caring  compassionate  or knowledgeable staff

my cat tore a hole in his run  went off to party he arrived back home  4 in the morning reeking of skunk he had his first bath ever in tomato juice cats dont like tomato juice much  or the blow dryer he still smelled awful i dusted him with baking soda  rubbed it into his skin no help after 3 weeks i called ocvh not expecting any help but carol told me about skunk off a product they have in the office she said shed had good feedback on it i got barney back on the bathroom counter  followed the directions on the bottle the good news is it worked  the bad news is barney has lost his run privileges he is grounded for life  thank you carol you have possibly saved the life of one stinky cat  the sanity of one old lady

i discovered that one of my rabbits had a nasty parasite called a cuterebra living inside her and causing an infectious opening in her side with the black larvae visible through a hole the bug made in order to breathe of course this was extremely gross but more importantly it was life threatening to my rabbit after calling about 6 different vets nearby and finding no one who handled rabbits on staff a friend of mine recommended the oc vet hospital in point pleasant the staff were extremely accommodating squeezing me into the last half hour of their day with a vet who would see a rabbit dr crawford mick vet assistant and alyssa reception were all very wonderful and thorough in each of their respective jobs my rabbit was calm during the removal procedure and thankfully well on the mend with a course of antibiotics everyone explained what to do next in a calm manner and treated my animal and family with a touch of extra kindness i definitely recommend this hospital to anyone in need of an excellent vet

i recently had the pleasure of visiting your business as a new customer i was impressed with the friendly staff and their caring ways to my very scared little rescue dog  upon leaving i was given my bill which i paid in full immediately only to receive a phone call 2 days later that an item was missed on my bill and i owe an additional amount of money i find this annoying now i have to either mail a check or make a special visit to office to payugh  so please check your invoices before presenting them to your customers it will save everyone time and money thanks

i tried this new vet office because it was much closer to my home then the vet i was currently using for 25 years and was happy with the office in pt pleasant was very clean and bright and the staff was wonderful to deal with my problem was for the advised treatment plans i would have to travel to the main office which is further from my home than my current vet i also found the prices to be significantly higher for example medicationold vet prednisone 10mg for 30 tabs840 this vet prednisone 10mg for only 20 tabs1845 ear drops old vet 4058 this vet 4960 also since the dog needed to be given anesthesia for an ear hematoma and she is less than 2 years old  my old vet did not require any preop testing since she is a young healthy dog but this new vet required a couple of preop tests that added about 300 to the bill which was  estimated over 1600 i am just not able to afford this new office on a fixed income i did have the dog treated at my old vet for under 600 cost is the main reason for sticking with my old vet unless a real emergency occurred and the 3 minute car ride out weighs the cost
