the best care for my pet lucy  dr koenstein  hope name spelling is correct dr koenstein is compassionate professional and understanding i trust her opinion and recommendations regarding any care for my dog

on thursday september 17th i took my 7 month old puppy to get spayed at ocean county vet weve taken our bird there for about 10 years so of course i had to take my new puppy there she received all of her shots there and ive never had any issues with them until last week  the spay procedure itself went well and the doctor was great after i picked my dog up on thursday we came home and she slept for the rest of the night on friday i noticed a thick scratch on her stomach and thought it was from her nails because she kept crying trying to itch it saturday morning i looked at it again and it was a large burn like razor burn from when they shaved her before surgery  i called immediately and was told on the phone that this is common ive never heard of this happening before and it would be free to come in to have a doctor look at her but if any medication needed to prescribed i would have to pay i know plenty of people with dogs and puppies and those who have had this surgery have never told me their dog got razor burn from being shaved also if i did take her i should not have been responsible for paying for anything they also told me if i chose to not come in to use a small amount of neosporin which i ended up doing and it is healing now i wish i could attach a picture in this review to show the burn she had   i was very satisfied with everything up until this if this was so common i shouldve been informed that before leaving that within a few days she might develop razor burn from being shaved ive been a loyal customer to this vet for years along with my mom and this incident might turn us to go to another vet
awesome  people they treat your pets with gentleness  and concern never have to wait forever to get in
dr briggs was so compassionate and gave my bird harley and extremely thorough check up i thank him so much for putting up with my emails great  and putting my mind at ease such great doctor

this office lakewood location is very unorganized i arranged to board my dog for a week and was quoted a price after dropping off my dog and departing on a cruise i was called and was told a booster shot was needed or i had to pick my dog up immediately so i said sure no problem to the shot and asked for an updated quotewas told it was already factored in because she was being boarded  okso i return from vacation to pick up my dog and the cost is over 200 more than i was quoted 203 turned into 410 i immediately summoned for office manager kathy and she reviewed the chart and said it was because the dog weighed more than we thought and the quote did not include  the 69 office visit that needs to be charged to give the shot what my dog is being boarded that i am paying   per day for  i had spoken to 3 different girls in the office and none of rhem mentioned the weight was different and the cost went up i received no apology from kathy just a well i guess they didnt completely look at the chart unacceptable and really do not wish to return and will not board there again

dr briggs just performed a lapspay on our 6 month old standard poodle and all i can say is wow dr briggs is one of a few that perform this incredible procedure that is without a doubt the best thing for our animals bailey had the procedure in the morning and by 3pm was going home and by morning you could never even tell she had surgery the incision was so small that a few days later you could not even see it is the procedure a little more money yes but well worth the expense to see our bailey back to normal in no time with no pain plus everything that i have read and according to dr briggs this procedure is better for your animal since only the ovaries are removed

i have been a client of ocvh and fischer vh for many years and for many pets  their service is outstanding and the veterinarians and their team are highly competent and extremely customer service focused  i would highly recommend them

what a great group i have never been made to feel so welcome with my larger than average rottweiler and the staff showed no fear the staff kept my dog so calm and that made it that much easier on me great care great staff  thank you so much for making my dog feel like the chihuahua that he thinks he is not to mention the fact that the vet instantly knewand correctly diagnosed my dogs condition
dr falk answered all my questions and was very helpful the entire staff were friendly

i have been taking my pets to see dr danowitz at oc vet hospital for many years he took great care of my first dog through his senior years and was there to guide me through the process of saying goodbye to my beloved pet when it was his time to pass he has seen me through the puppy years for my current two shelties and they are thriving in great health as 7 year olds  if you are looking for a doctor who truly cares and is a great doctor look no further the staff at oc vet hospital is also very friendly and professional

i have had a number of exotic pets and they are the only place that i trust i have seen a number of their doctors and have never had an issue they were wonderful with my very nervous rats recently and i wont go anywhere else i believe they are the best

i took my cat there to get declawed the surgery and recovery went great however my cat is now infested with fleas he didnt have them before the surgery and he is strictly an in door cat so we are pretty sure he got them from his stay at the vet during the recovery period i am actually writing this review in the car because my house is in the process of getting bombed overall im happy with how the surgery went but not happy at all that my cat came home with fleas this is just more money out of my pocket the place would be great if they paid more attention to keeping it clean

i brought my 1 12 year old chiweenie gracie in as an emergency as i suspected she had eaten a pill  everyone was very kind and professional and i was very impressed with the facility the services personnel the hours and care

dr weiner was amazing he explain the different options he explain the cost and since i left the hospital with my pomeranian has called and checked up on my dog several times my dog is doing much better and i would recommend this vet and hospital they are friendly when you walk in and they work with your budget
dr briggs is a caring and knowledgeable avian vet
ocvh is an incredible group of knowledgeable caring individuals who truly love what they do thank you all for your consistent help and compassion

my cat was very very sick and dr blair was right on the money  she was so nice and kind to us and coco  you also recommended garden state veterinary specialists  i was very happy with them and coco starts chemo with them on thursday  you are now my new vets thanks for your good work

i was extremely worried about getting our male sugarglidder neutered but the drs  staff were very knowledgable and made us feel very comfortable to proceed with the procedure thank you again to all the drs  staff for taking such wonderful care of our stitch

dr briggs mick the tech and the staff at the front desk really friendly caring and helpful while my dog was sick on vacation i am a veterinarian and i recommend ocvh rt 9 lakewood as my experience was positive in every way
very satisfied with the care they took with our darlyn they explained everything to me as they did each thing which put me at ease i would recommend them highly wonderful staff

i can not recommend ocvh any more highly they are just so wonderful and caring with our cats including our newcomer indy he was a stray that more or less adopted us on july 4th this year after being examined it turned out indy our name for him had been microchipped and we thought we might have to give him back to his previous owner nicole tried for a week using every resource but his former owner never came forward we then proceeded with tests shots and neutering for indy everything has gone so well ocvh is truly outstanding thank you

we were able to get same day appt for a few vaccines my dogs needed for an overnight stay at a dog boarder after giving shots and doing routine blood work they discovered one of our dogs may have contracted heart worm we are heart broken for our adopted adult lab to learn this but they vets office was kind compassionate and genuinely concerned about our dogs well being though we are only in this area for the summers i would absolutely return to their office and reccommend them to others
i was able to contact this office on a sunday to submit  a fecal test for unexpected boarding during vacation the staff was lovely and very accommodating

i have a 15 year old little dog that needed immediate care on a saturday afternoon my previous vet closed their office and moved too far away for us to use  i called ocean county veterinary hospital and without hesitation even though they were closing for the day they told me to bring my dog kookie indr perlman was very compassionate thorough in her exam  listened to what i had to say and discussed my options with concern they even waived the cost of the exam because i was a new customer and just charged me for the medications couldnt ask for a better experience in an upsetting time  i will not hesitate to use dr perlman again for all my animals
have been with this veterinarian for over 20 years they have always taken great  care of all my pets would  never go anywhere  else

took my holland lop pickles here to get a neuter and was a little worried knowing hes an exotic animal but as soon as i walked in to meet the doctor i had no worries at all dr golodik was like the bunny whisperer he knew exactly how to handle pickles and could answer every question i had even as i left the ladies at the desk were so helpful and nice  all around my experience was wonderful and would recommend for any new rabbit owners

i am pleased with the care and prompt attention i received when i brought my rabbit in  i thought the rabbit had fur mites but it turned out he had fleas i was expecting a 11200 bill for the exam and the revolution prescription  the doctor was really nice and  i felt better that my rabbit got good care and she gave me advice how to care for her and my bunny is still on the mend and doing much better  the only thing that disturbed me and put me in a financial bind was that the fee came to 160 odd dollars and when i asked why not the 11200  she said well the doctor took a skin graph for mites  well im sure her intentions may have been  good but if the rabbit did have mites that would have been taken care of with the revolution  so i i had to borrow another 50 dollars against the money i borrowed from a couple of people to make the 11200    i dont regret going but i was put off with that action

we were taken in a timely fashion  assistant and vet were very courteous and kind to our puppy  vet was able to get to the root of dogs problem and resolved the issue  not a full time resident in this particular area but when we move down permanently we will seriously think about using vet services

its a pleasure coming into the super clean  cheery office its so nice to be greeted  acknowledged by every member of staff encountered i appreciate thoroughness  know how of the vet  vet tech with whom my cat mr stapuft visited the friendliness cleanliness  expertise are uncompared thank you

ocean county veterinary hospital has a very high standard when it comes to every facet of treatment from the moment i walked in the first day they were more friendly and more helpful than any other vet we had taken coco to coco is blind and requires extra special attention and every other place just wasnt willing or able to deal with her so finding a vet that understood her problems and was willing to cooperate with her was a huge relief it was also good to know that at every office owned by the practice the same environment of professionalism and friendliness was maintained i highly recommend ocvh to everyone i know who is looking for a vet or has a subpar vet

i always have such a positive experience when i bring my dog here the vets always get on the floor to my dogs level to introduce themselves to her it makes her much more comfortable the facility is always clean and front deskvet techs are  happy and upbeat i would highly reccomend to anyone
staff very helpful doc good diagnostician   malcolm is doing wellthanks  groomer did a very nice job

i went to the point pleasant location for an emergency and the staff and doctor made my pets  i feel welcome the doctor was gentle and soft spoken to make my dogs not feel nervous i will continue to go to this office as long as the doctor is the same
i took my puppy there with the referral from a friend what an amazing place the staff were so kind and the  vet was amazing i will definitely be referring  my friends with pets there

when i noticed that my cats appetite had declined i brought her to another veterinary clinic to be checked out i found out then that she had fiv feline aids up until then she seemed to be doing just fine their answer was for me to euthanize my cat i couldnt do it it just didnt feel right as i said she was fine just a few days before that it would feel more like murder than mercy  so i ended up bringing her to ocvh for a second opinion they did confirm that she had fiv which i wasnt surprised by but i did learn that she was also suffering from anemia which the other clinic never mentioned despite the test results showing that as pointed out by dr mitchell i was given some medicine to help with the anemia and an appetite enhancer as well never once did dr mitchell mention anything about euthanizing my cat  my visit with ocvh and dr mitchell was over two months ago had i listened to the other clinic my cat would be dead now instead my cat and i have had that much more time together unfortunately fiv is getting the better of her and its coming to the point that im afraid im going to have to put her down i dont want her to suffer but at least we had a little more time together and for that im very grateful for dr mitchells optimistic and realistic approach thank you for your humane approach not only to my cat but to me

i brought my new puppy in for a first visit and i left feeling like the whole visit was about what they could sell me  the vet tech and the vet were both very nice when they werent trying to convince me to buy some product they are the reason i gave this review a 3 instead of a 2 im assuming the oversell is their job and not their preference  the charge for the visit was very high  i left feeling disappointed and dissatisfied  i get this is a business but this was over the top i think their bottom line would be better served by keeping clients  looking for a new vet whos more about my dog and less about their bottom line

i made the mistake of cutting my dogs nail too short and blood was spurting out  very scary  i called and was given immediate on phone assistance and an immediate as soon as i could arrive appointment  upon arrival we were immediately ushered into a room and a vet tech took care of my dog  within a few minutes the veterinarian was also in the room  everyone was calm kind and helpful  i would recommend ocean county veterinary hospital with no reservations based upon my experience on a sunday morning fathers day
they  had to  muzzle  my dog  because  they were  scared of  him  charged  me 95 dollars  for  pulling a  tick off his  ear

i have been taking my cats to ocvh for 25 years dr falk has been my primary vet i adopted sam and jake my current 2 cats from ocvh all of the staff are pleasant and professional  i have also referred a couple of friends
everyone there was so nice and they do whats necessary without running a bunch of extra tests that arent really necessary  great place
finally found a trusted source for dog grooming  my dogs breed has a difficult coat and this has been the only groomer that understood how to work with his matts and thick curls

the staff at ocvh was very professional and kind to me in my time of need with my sick dog they were honest and to the point with the care of the pet and cost of what needed to be done i would recommend the office to anyone who needs a check up or in an emergency situation with your pet

thank you for your immediate respond to my call i called and they made an apt for my little parakeet in one hour sadly my little girl passed by the next day but i felt like everything was considered and done for her

when our dog had a seizure recently and a nearby vet turned us away ocvh in lakewood took us immediately and gave our dog the attention he needed we cant thank them enough the staff there from the office to the veterinarians are wonderful
the minute i walked in the staff was polite caring  they really care about the amimals

clean friendly and compassionate i trust the ocvh doctors i dont feel that its all about making money that i have felt at other veterinary facilities i would recommend ocvh to any pet owner that is how i found out about them a recommendation from a neighbor
very professional and patient really took the time and attention to answer all my questions and concerns looks like sly found a new doctor thanks team

i had an emergency for my pup he had had a bad seizure among other issues  i called a sistervet and they couldnt get me in at that office but sent me to ocean county vet hospital and when i arrived they had all my information and were ready to see us  the doctor was very thorough and explained everything it couldve been and every possibility for treatment  the staff was wonderful  the facility was clean and uptodate  they even brought my boy water while we waited which no vet has ever done  i would definitely bring him back there without hesitation
i was impressed how clean and friendly the office staff wass i will definitely be back

everyone was very kind and understanding rabbit was diagnosed with cataracs all options were explained and the cost of the proceedures were discussed before hand antibiotics were given by vet as well as a script for eyedropsnails were clipped during exam as wellwe were able to pick up eyedrops at one of their other vet hospitals the next day as the pharmacy riteaiddid not have them in their systemwas given valuable info on rabbit care expected follow up call on rabbits well being did not happengood experience would definitely return and recomend

my recent trip was with my third pet that i have taken to this clinic every experience has been great sadly my first pet i had a cat she was very old and had a good full life they treated her kidney failure as best as possible with special food etc when i knew i had to make a decision i called they had me come in immediately they were very kind and understanding since then i adopted another cat and then recently a puppy i would refer a friend based on my experience

cant ask for more dudley always comes home looking like a winner the soft coated wheaten has tender legs to touch why i have no idea but megan gets it done and he looks better for her trouble  thank you
i would recommend this place to anyone great facility great doctors and a wonderful staff  they were very helpful to my situation and extremely accommodating

by far the best place to take your animal the staff is friendly kind and more importantly they are sweet any questions i had were answered before i even had the chance to ask  the office as well as the exam room was clean and spotless they drew my pets blood in front of me instead of pulling my pet out into another room the doctor and assistant were very gentle and loving towards my pet i would recommend this place to anyone i felt that i wasnt taking my pet to the vet but just out to meet new people it was a relaxing and painless experience for both me and my pet i was most impressed with their prices and didnt feel that they over charged for any aspect of the visit

my 14 year old white persian cat brianna was in need of a grooming due to severe matting  she was first given an exam at no cost if you use the website coupon and then nicole did an excellent job of shavingshearing her matting while at the same time making her look adorable  the topper was the little purple bow on the top of her head  the grooming was reasonably priced and expertly done  both brianna and i are very happy
i enjoyed my first experience at the office  i brought my 3 month old boxer mix for examination   doctor and staff were very knowledgeable and kind
most loving and caring group of individuals our baby is always in good hands

we have been using ocvh as our primary vet for the last 4 years and have found them to be very fairly priced and the staff is always professional and caring  they all seem to have a true heart for caring for animals
vet was kind and gentle and so was the vet tech it was my first visit with two dogs

the dr  danowitz and his assistant were extremely nice and compassionate i didnt have a great experience last time and they renewed my trust in this hospital they walked me step by step through the process of what was going on with my dog thank you  i will be back to only see dr danowitz

disorganized and somewhat deceitful x rays were done but apparently were useless as he needed a ultrasound so spent wasteful money there just to be sent to another vet hospital so ended up payimg almost 400 to ocean new prospect jackson nj  and then going to to the other facility and spending almost 700 if they would have been upfront about the xrays not being effective in diagnosing i could have save a little bit of money definetly would suggest to others to ask if the tests are going to be helpful as i said they knew only a ultrsound would be effective in diagnosing and yet they did xrays which was a waste of money as xrays are not able to see many things
i love this place and everyone in it so caring and friendly im very grateful for their hard work and compassion
this is the best place for your pet

this was my first time at ocean county veterinary hospital and couldnt be an happier dr g is professional and is definitely interested in the well being of the animals i brought my amazon in and he was patient with him and very easy to talk to he and his staff did followup with a phone call to ensure that my pet was doing well great place if you want a professional caring staff great job guys and glad i found you

i just moved to south jersey and had to find a vet  went on angies list and found ocean county veterinary hospital  i loved that they offered a free initial visit use email to update needed inoculations and treated me and my minibulldog with kindness and gentleness  im thrilled

i have been going to the same vet for years with intentions to change but never found a place i felt comfortable changing to i consider my dog my child so i am inevitably overly cautious and particular when it comes to who treats her my sister and i brought her dwarf bunny into this practice and they treated her with the same love that we feel for her from there i made the decision to bring my dog named holly to the same practice but new building in point pleasant and the receptionist and veterinarian were both amazing to her holly is very elderly and anxious and i left confident that they made her as comfortable as possible during her check up the doctor also spent time discussing with me different options to use that could help alleviate hollys anxiety rather than just prescribing her medicine to get me out the door i would recommend to anyone looking for a new veterinarian who genuinely cares for their animal patients

my dog lusi is very nervous going to the vet but this team put her at a comfort level better than any other office she has been to  they are caring and offer advice in regard to health and training issues  they took their time and i highly recommend them
i was very impressed by professionalism of reception  vet techs and doctor facility was spotless and we received excellent care is highly recommend

truly a wonderful experience from the moment we arrived until leaving dr briggs explained the procedure to us in depth and gave skye a very thorough exam the assistants were very pleasant and easy to talk with  you could tell this was not just a business but a thriving practice i would recommend ocvh to everyone i know with pets

we were looking for a vet for an exotic and with a new location opening close to me i decided to give them a call surprisingly they did see exotics and i learned that i was able to visit whichever location was convenient to me  the front staff was very pleasant and my wait time was less than two minutes  the vet was great and while we didnt get great news for our pet i was very pleased with this practice i will definitely bring our other pets here as need be and had a great experience with them and would recommend
absolutely wonderful

wheni brought my little kali into the lakewood facility three weeks ago she was very ill  dr iaquinto immediately performed a blood test on her and determined that she was in extreme kidney distress  she recommended that kali be placed in iv for at least 3 days to try to bring her numbers down to a reasonable number  dr iaquinto called me several times during that day to keep me informed of kalis condition  the following day dr danowitz took over her care because dr iaquinto was scheduled for another facility  he too could not have been more informative and excited that she was doing so much better  he called me several times during that day and again before he left that evening  on saturday dr wiener called to report on kalis progress  she was still improving and it was decided to let her remain at the hospital for another day probably until monday to be sure that she received as much of the medication as possible  on sunday dr golodnik called to report on her condition  she was constantly under supervision and being cared for by very caring techs and doctors  when we came in to pick her up on monday dr iaquinto was again  on duty  she was so positive about kalis chances and we were and  are so grateful for all of the attention and care that kali received  by the way kali is doing beautifully she is eating and drinking and acting very much like her old self  thank you to all of the wonderful humans who give their all for the animals
i travel from new brunswick to ocvh because ive not found another practice that provides the same level of care to my rabbits  ive also brought cats here and id recommend them to anyone
very professional and helpful
my second visit to ocvh with my 13 yr old cockatiel was great  charlie is rescue bird that was never handled the care given was wonderful will be taking him back when needed

best service i have ever received at any doctors dr danowitz is so caring and knowledgeable  he truly has a gift for the love of animals  im so thankful to have finally found the perfect fit for me and my pups

after being handed off from other vets when trying to get my ferrets vaccines i was finally referred here and it was worth the drive and every headache i will never take my fur babies to another place dr golodik was very pleasant to work with knowledgeable and handled both kits with care he wasnt just doing his job he was genuinely interested in their well being and made me feel at ease  i highly recommend ocean county vet the staff is great and personable and the hours are very convenient also the time spent waiting was minimal

i have been bringing my dog there since he was 2 months old he is 2 12 now they have been with me every step of the way through routine check ups emergency visits like when he eats things he shouldnt and when he was hit by a car ocvh is incredibly efficient with their educated compassionate and loving staff i have recommended them to several people they have several vets working there which some people do not like but once you meet one you really like you can request that vet for appointments i have never met one that hasnt been outstanding their vet techs vets and receptionists are so friendly exactly the place you want to bring your pet the only thing that i will say that isnt so great and it is their prices it is expensive but it is worth every dime for how incredible they are you wont find a better place

we have a very large white shephard friday who was not himself and needed immediate attention of course it was a sunday no vet is open on sunday ocvh on route 88 in lakewood is open on sunday and did see him dr g was very tentative great listener and very thorough the staff was extremely friendly and great with friday we will be keeping them
they r a group of kind  compassionate people  they value ur input as part of ur pets care  theyll offer different types of treatments in order to help financially especially in emergency situations
we love ocvh dr danowitz is the best very caring staff and doctors

ive gone to three other vets in the area and have not been satisfied my dog was in distress breaking out in hives all over her body they were the closest vet that was still open so i took her there im so glad ive found them  they were very comforting at a time when i was very upset and i truly felt like they were taking care of her as if she were their dog

upon getting our puppy and searching for a compassionate  honest veterinary office we were referred to ocvh by multiple people we have had 3 visits since then and every time we left with a smile on our face the staff was so sweet caring and welcoming my puppy actually enjoys going despite the shots because of all the attention and love he receives all of the staff has his best interest at heart and has received the best care hes happy healthy and growing right on track thanks to ocvh i will always recommend this group to a friend

i recently moved to the area and did not have a vet there yet my dog became ill and i had several bad experiences with other vet hospitals close by the vets and staff at ocean county veterinary hospital and fischer veterinary hospital were such a please to deal with during this difficult time they were helpful and willing to work around my hectic work schedule to make sure my dog was on her way to being healthy again i am so glad i found them and love that my dog is in such great hands there

we always have a very pleasant experience at ocean county veterninary hospital  dr danowitz and dr weiner have better bed side manner than any human doctor ive ever seen  they take very good care of my pup thanks

i brought my one year old dog there for the first time last month it was a last minute decision as to where to take her because it was an emergency so for the first time we tried the vet on fischer blvd in toms river it was a great experience and the price was cheaper than i expected we were fortunate enough to have doctor jessica m who was a great and nurturing doctor i am impressed and we found our new veterinary

while i like the personnel at this facility i think it was grossly unfair to charge me for a well exam when all my dog needed was 2 shots  i could see if she had not been in for a year but she just had a complete exam and her other shots in september  by charging another exam fee you doubled my bill  i will have to make other arrangements in the future
the veterinarians and staff are always kind and courteous  i have always had a great experience when going there
i love it  and i would go again
the vet and techs were all wonderful very welcoming and seemed to know theirstuff
love lov love dr briggs always so great with monte ohhh and his parents too  he always  addresses our questions and concerns
this is my second dog i wouldnt take her anywhere else

the fischer blvd office is smaller and more quiet than rt 9 location appointment was right on schedule  dr briggs and everyone in office was pleasant and efficient plenty of time to answer any questions or concerns never a rushed feeling i have no reservation recommending this practice to any pet owner
awesome  professional teamwork compassion

i have been taking my blue crown conure to ocvh and dr warren briggs for more than 12 years and would never go anywhere else the staff is always courteous and professional dr briggs is fabulous and my conure is very comfortable being handled by him best place for any pet

my 9 year old daughter had her guinea pig for less than a week we brought her to ocean county vet hospital for a runny nose and sneezing the vet we saw spoke directly to my daughter he knew it was her pet and he discussed her treatment as well as how to handlefeed and care for the pet he walked into the room and introduced himself to me as dr godlac spelling and he introduced himself to my daughter with his first name i was extremely impressed with him and the office staff

my pet is always treated very careful the entire staff is extremely professional and extremely helpful kind friendly i will always want my pet to be taken care at ocvh  thank you all at ocvh for the wonderful service

since you asked ill tell you i requested an appointment for a rabies shot for my greyhound the dr came in did a cursory exam including taking my dogs temperature then gave her the rabies shot the bill was 29 for the shot and 63 for thewellness exam she didnt need the exam i didnt ask for the exam my dog was examined less than six months previously for a baseline i paid 63 for something that was completely unnecessary my dog will need two different vaccinations in about 5 months if she has to have a wellness exam before she gets the shots ill find a new veterinary hospital  and i could have gotten the rabies shot free in downtown lakewood
i didnt know what to expect but the staff and the doctor was very nice and they took great care of my oreo so i say thank you to everyone involved

i have a 10 yr old dog who woke up with a mass on her foot and not wanting to get up and eat i took her  in without an appointment and the office was happy to see her  they called several times over the holiday weekend to check on my pets progress and me which gave me a lot of comfort

they do a great job but i went in for a check up with two dogs left with a 800 bill i really think they should have pricing listed some where im not saying we would not have had the tests done but im not sure what i would have done if i didnt have the money to pay once all was said  done

the staff at the fisher blvd office was friendly and professional  the office was very clean  dr mitchell was thorough and treated my cat very nicely  she did not recommend any unnecessary testing to be performed  i am very happy with ocean county veterinary hospital
from the receptionist to the nurses to the doctor  everybody was fantastic  very professional

on the phone when i said i only wanted to clip birds nail and wings they gave me a price of 35 when i went for appointment they said they giving a full exam and they charged 80 buts i probably would have not used them if i knew it would cost so much dont know if i will use them again but the doc was nice just wish they communicated and didnt get screwed like that

everyone is great there all my animals are treated like i would treat them  my only complaint  issue when i had to bring all my animals into the office for the same sickness i had to pay an office visit for each animal  plus meds  a suggestion is when 3 or more animals that have the same sickness the 4th  and others should be a free office visit 5 times 67 is a lot before meds shots and so on  other than that the place is clean and staff is great

i called ocvh in an emergency situation  my cairn terrier hurt herself outside and was bleeding from her leg  my usual vet was being a jerk so i refused to see him and pay an extremely large fee for being fit in without a standing appointment  initially we went to fisher blvd ocv   we were seen very quickly   i found the vet to be very friendly and very caring of my pet  she explained my pet needed several stitches and it would be best to have that taken care of at ocvh in lakewood  the staff called ahead to prepare them that we were on our way to their facility  we were treated very nicely my sweet lily was seen immediately  i was given previous notice of just what would be done and also the approximate cost  i was impressed by the entire staff not just the doctors  the facility was clean attractive and animal friendly  unfortunatley my cairn pulled her collar off during the night and she managed to pull out one  endstitch  we had to return to ocvh the very next day  the dr said it was okay no damage done so no more stitches were needed  she would just clean the area and put an elastic wrap around lilys leg  i was shocked to find out that this five minute visit with the 100 bandage cost me an additional 4900  i felt  it should be included as postoperative carebeing it was less than 24hours  and here we were back again   i felt this was quite unfair   other than this i was very pleased with ocvh
doctors and staff provide complete pet care from the moment you arrive  would recommend this facility to all pet owners
the doctor was wonderful and was very gentle with our new bird  he took his time to educate me about the bird and his needs

dr peter falk is a wonderful doctor and person he has tended to my boxers and we are extremely pleased with his knowledge and his handling of them  we are relatively new to the area and have been to another local vet  a number of times for convenience of location but have come back to dr falk and will remain  his office is not pushy trying to sell you every new product office staff is competent and friendly  dr falk has also gone out of his way to recommend several other doctors in his practice that will fit with our and our dogs personality if he is not available  his office is state of the art equipment wise and is competitively priced with offices not nearly as well equipped or staffed my dogs love his office sandra robertson

i thought the receptionists were very nice i thought the veterinarian assistant knew what she was doing and that she was as gentle as she could be with my kitten the doctor discovered something about my kitten that a previous doctor failed to do both the doctor and the vet assistant were very knowledgeable when it came to the problem my kitten had i also liked the complementary items that were given to me the only reason i am giving this 4 stars is because i asked the doctor to show me how to clip the kittens nails i was under the impression he was going to do one and then that was it but then he did all of them and i thought that was nice of him lol it was nice of him but he also charged me for it i didnt ask for them to take it off which they might have but ill never know overall great place
i love the vets here  they do a great job taking care of our dogs they really care about the animals and do a great job taking care of them

my newly adopted dog developed kennel cough and the vets saw me the next day with no issue  the vet even remembered my other dog too and everyone gave my dogs love  it is always a pleasure coming to ocvh

weve been bringing our pets to the fisher office for years theyve cared for our late bunny quinn our late dog rocky and our two new dogs jasper and reese everyone from the vets to the support staff have always been amazing our rocky had a surgery as well as diabetes and the level of care he received was top notch also when we had to make the difficult decision to put him to sleep the office was so kind and supportive during that difficult time weve seen dr briggs dr pearlman and dr danowitz many times as well as a few of the newer doctors theyve always been kind efficient and knowledgable we are so pleased with the practice and would never want to go anywhere else

sadie and her family have a wonderful experience every time we visit ocvh  the entire staff is welcoming friendly very kind caring and always encouraging and instructive and thorough in their care of sadie  so grateful for ocvh

my dog os a 2 year old chihuahua and recently started experiencing issues with anal gland blockage he had an abscess about 2weeks prior to me be able to take him to our vet had to go to an emergency center it wss a sunday  fast forward 2weeks to my surprise i noticed him scooting checked his behind and there it was again but on the opposite side  i was able to get in to see my vet on a saturday the hours are great and they took great care of my dog they explained everything thoroughly before doing anything to him answered all of my questions qmd best of all took great care of my dog and made sure he was comfortable

we were very pleased with our experience at ocean county veterinary hospital there was an emergency but they seamlessly moved us to another doctor with no wait time everyone was courteous and professional and the doctor was gentle and thorough we highly recommend this facility for your pets care

my husband  i were extremely nervous bringing our 17 year old african grey  figi  to ocvh for the first time our previous vet had relocated  we were in desperate need of a new caring  understanding vet then dr briggs walked in instantly he made all of us at ease the whole experience of our visit was great  we have found a new doctor for our parrot also we want to mention that dr briggs assistant  the front desk were wonderful as well

we see dr briggs for our amazon parrot he specializes in exotics and birds and you will be hard pressed to find anyone better  he is great with our bird thorough informative and is never rushed  you can tell he loves his job the staff is also very warm and helpful i would not recommend anyone else or any place else

my experience was superb at ocean county veterinary hospital  when my cat needed to be seen right away i had no difficulty getting an appointment and she received the most caring and competent care that made all the difference in getting her back to normal quickly  i was very impressed with the doctors staff and facility and will definitely take all my pets here from now on
next day appointment  very friendly atmosphere  very caring everything explained to me in detail my new vet  thank you all
everyone one is so friendly knowledgeable and  professional the doctors and the staff treat my fur babies as if they were theirs not just another patient which makes a very happy mom
the doctor that sees jennifer is very very professional and very very loving to her
we loved the fact that this office is open late every day this makes it easier to keep appointments

we were so pleased with our visit to the toms river office  our dog charlie had an eye issue that needed to be addressed while we were visiting our beach home the office graciously took a last minute appt request gave us our first visit free with coupon   the office staff nurse and dr were all lovely  they were warm caring and friendly  we thought very highly of our visit and are considering switching this office to our full year vet

i was very weary of trying a new vet but i had a coupon for a free check up  from the moment i walked in we felt welcome  i was afraid of what my bill would be as well but they had a spectacular deal for my baby kitten for the first year i have dealt with a few vets in my life and it seemed they were after my money  they were so patient with me and bella  they took their time explaining everything and let me voice my concerns and not rush me out  i didnt even wait to get in the room  i highly recommend them

everyone at ocean county hospital were friendly and helpful  the doctor was kind and gentle when he examined my granddaughters pet mouse  the mouse is recovering and the doctor tried to keep costs down  we were very happy with our visit

there was not a wasted moment from the time i entered ocvh until i left almost immediately my name was called and i entered a private room with my cat the veterinary technician and the doctor listened patiently to my questions and gently examined and treated my cat no time was wasted and nothing was rushed i have been here before quite a few times and i will return

dr boss examined my yellow crowned amazon parrot for a leg injury in late september  it way my first visit to your facility as my regular exotic vet was unavailable  after discussion  examination  an xray  further discussion she determined that the parrots leg was sprained only not fractured nor broken  being a very concerned parrot parent  noticing a dramatic difference in the parrots behavior i made an appt a few days later to see my regular vet  i was extremely hesitant in what dr boss had told me  my regular vet confirmed what dr boss had told me  explained in detail about why our parrot was acting the way she was  end of the story  i would recommend and come back to dr boss  her team with any problems or general health checkup on my parrots  i have 2  thank you dr boss for seeing us almost immediately for your correct consultation and for your understanding of our concern  ill not second guess you again  ps  on our way out another couple with 2 exotic pets raved about your facility  the exotic doctors including dr boss  both my story happy ending  this other couples reference are worth their weight in gold  thank you once again  hope to see you soon for a wellness visit regards gail  louis kadi

i wouldnt think of taking my shelties anywhere else dr danowitz is so good with my girls that you would think they were his own he has the most gentle manner with them they dont even know he gave them shots
friendly treated my dog in a very nice way  my dog was not stressed out staf was excellent

my experience at ocvh was wonderful everyone there is so nice caring and they make you feel comfortable the doctor is a very sweet caring lovely person she truly cares for her patients so did everyone else there everyone that i have met there is very sweet comforting and you can tell they truly care for all the patients my dog is part of my family and i believe everyone there feels the same towards all their patients i will tell all my family and friends to go there its comforting to take your pet someplace where they truly care and you dont feel like its only about the money

i cant say enough about how great this vet hospital is i am so impressed with how friendly  kind and helpful the front desk  and vet techs are and our vet dr wiener is the sweetest best vet i have ever had in my years of pet ownership not only can you leave him a message on his voice mail but he actually returns the call promptly and after youve had your visit they call to see if all is ok this vet practice knows what is takes to be the best and in my book they are

i was so worried about my little girl sadie since she is my little love bug and your staff just handled her with such carei was glad to see that she enjoyed the experience and let the vet take care of trimming her beak i will definitely bring her and her sister back if they need any further attention   thank you all so much
as always i was greeted cordially and my pet was very well taken care of

i went to the jackson office to pick up a written prescription for my dog  i had gotten it from the vet in the past but now the price was quite a bit higher than petmeds therefore decided to order and had to pick it up  the receptionist was pleasant and we waited for what we  needed and she told us that the lakewood office alerted them we would get my dogs nails clipped if we could without a vet checkup when we pick up the rx  my daughter was somewhat upset and i wasnt that crazy over how the tech  took our dog didnt invite us in the room we are accustomed to that  our dog is older 13 and isnt good on table and we said we would like them to clip nails on the floor if at all possible  the tech walked away with our dog and made a comment about seeing what the doctor says  the price to clip at the vets was double what petsmart charges yet they understand when we ask them not to put him on the table not sure why the tech at the vets wasnt courteous or understanding  he is our baby even if he is old

the vet dr weiner couldnt help out my sick rat because he hardly knew anything about them i brought the rat health care booklet with me and several stuff he said contradicted what the book said when i told him that he didnt admit he was wrong
everyone was receptive to our cats needs and treated us all like family  we sincerely appreciate the doctors care and all the staffs kindness
the office was extremely clean and our waiting time was less than two minutes  the vet and vet tech were both experts in dealing with our bird  we are switching our dogs vet to a vet in this office
my guinea pig always looks good after he is groomed  she takes the time to talk to me about him before and after she takes care of him

dr briggs is an exceptional veterinarian that we trust for our dogs well being
the dr was great everyone was awesome

i have been going to ocvh  fvh for about 5 years now i have been breeding persians for about 15 years i love that dr faulk  his staff take our experiences into consideration when treating our animals many vets in the area treat any breeder in a very condescending and rude manner i have never felt anything but professionalism from the folks at ocvh from top to bottom the place is spotless and the customer service there is untouchable thank you for all the years of great service and professionalism

i had a laproscopic spay done on my labrador retreiver on friday august 22nd and dr briggs performed the surgery  he only made one small incision some drs make 2 or 3 holes which looked almost completely healed already on sunday night  he has a great way with my dog  she loves him  he put up with her crazy lab puppy attitude  i have never had a problem making an appointment to see him or one of his fellow doctors  they all are animal lovers and are easy to talk with  i would recommend ocvh to anyone win a 30 minute drive of them
i have been going here for at least 20 years this is my third dog with them i am always satisfied with the amazing and compassionate care they all give

the doctor that attended to holly our pet was very pleasant  answered my questions  but holly was put on 2 antibiotics at the same time  i told her that i will only give her one  dont like the idea that holly was put on 2 flea medications in previous visit  i believe this caused her to have diarrhea that was so bad that she was only pooping blood

i cannot say enough good things about the ocean county veterinary hospital and all of their locations the entire staff from beginning to end is friendly very informative and great with our pets oh and the extended hours are amazing for those who work late like myself i would recommend this practice to anyone with pets
very helpful and caring vets and techs clean facility too several vets on premise  a bit expensive though

ocvh is new to me and my 15 yrs  7 month shin tzu  but the vet dr billy danowich set such a friendly atmosphere that during my dogs examination he was not nervous as he usually gets at a doctors office the dr was extremely gentle with the dog during the exam his personality and demeanor was outstanding and really put me to rest and at ease he explained different problems that can affect such an old dog  after drawing some blood he assured me that what ever the results might be that he and his staff were there for me  he was on the phone five minutes after he received the test results and even though i was prepared for the worst he assured me the  dog was in great health and he could find no problems according to the blood sample he also said that the problem is due to his age but  at the same time assuring me that he and his staff were available anytime if the need arises overall i must say that ocvh is by far the cleanest and friendliest hospital i ever visited if only i was a dog

we have been clients of ocvh for many years  the staff from front office personnel to technicians nurses and the doctors are very professional understanding and compassionate  several of our animals have had very serious and challenging medical conditions and the veterinarians worked tireless with us to diagnose treat and adjust medications for years  they are truly dedicated to their profession and run a superb practice  our lives are better knowing that our pets can receive the best care in ocean county and perhaps the state

from the friendly staff that greets you when you come in to the vets that treat my animals like their own ocvh is the whole package  after so many frustrating interactions with regular doctors and their office staff its refreshing to deal with people who really seem to want my business  they are always available and never forget that follow up phone call with information or test results  i would definitely recommend them to anybody looking for a vet

lets face it no one likes to see a doctor including your pets but all four of my pets love their vets and the staff that supports them their level of caring is unbeatable they listen to what you have to say for your pet they explain what could be happening and how they will treat it they also understand that money is tight and will work with you on getting the best care that you can afford i really like their prepay vet visit plan it allows me to pay visit costs at a time when i have the extra money and with four pets you never know when you may need to take one in for a visit i also love their hours i can pick up medicine for my one dog on a sunday i highly recommend each and everyone of the ocvh vets and would not go anywhere else

i went to them because my baby bun was sick i had visits two days in a row they did what they could to help my bun and me they werent sure what was wrong outwardly he looked fine so bloodwork n xrays i thought surely with a string of meds would surely happen they know how pricey these things can get and gave me alternate ways to take care of my bun and bring him back to health they even called me to check up on my little guy the vets there are amazing and loving very friendly as well as all if their staff highly recommend thank you from the bottom of our hearts  carrie leonard  king tut
our cat seemed to trust the vet she got her shots and didnt even make a sound  we were in and out in no time  i recommend this place
i like the doctors and the staff  clean office and they treat my fur babies very well  the staff is thorough with answering any questions i have
staff is always helpful and they really take their time to make my pets feel  comfortable
i suggest ocvh to any one i know with a petfeel like my pet is truly cared forboth office visits and grooming
