decided to book in for a home visit rather than put my cat through the stress of being taken to my registered vet as she is getting rather old and i feel its not a nice thing to have to put her through the reason for my home visit was that my cat has to have her nails cut on a regular basis i contacted the vets bristol to enquire about this new service and they booked us in straight away with know fuss it was so easy to set up the home visit on the day of my home visit i must say how impressed i was it all went to plan know stress for my cat know stress for me   the veteran nurses were on time they were friendly my cat was not bothered at all by them even the nail cutting was easy payment was easy on the day of my visit and it was not expensive i would highly recommend a home visit my cat and i cant thank you enough for this new stress free  home visiting service  excellent thankyou so much

my girl cat 1 was spayed with the vet in february and since then the bleeding in her wee the struggling to wee the extreme licking herself the squatting on the floor to bleedwee the spending half hour trying to use the litter tray to return seconds later and try again has started lyla now has recurring cystist and its triggered by stress or so the vet told me for a very hefty bill however i have given her calming supplements we have plug ins and specail food calming treats and collars everything i can possibly do to ensure she remains stress free but its still happening shes still really struggling and every time my head goes back to what the vet first said when i mentioned it them  sometimes the operatiom can go wrong or isnt done properly only to find out it was with them she had to op so quickly was saying that wasnt the case so if it were done elsewhere it would be all i know is my little girl is having issues ever since that op and she was completely fine before hand

i called the vet southampton for an appointment but the call ended up being picked up in barnsley however debbie the receptionist there was lovely and booked me an appointment in southampton for this morning excellent and what a lovely lady  i just hope the appointment goes well for my poorly fur baby

johann has been our vet for many years and when he moved to the vet recently we followed him even though it was a half hour drive from our home happy to drive though as he has always been an amazing vet with our animals welfare always paramount  unfortunately on the 15th july we had to have our 12 year old dog hugo put to sleep we were absolutely devastated and broken hearted losing our boy we still are  we just wanted to say a huge thank you to johann for making the worst day of our lives a teeny bit better he was so kind and respectful to our hugo he was compassionate with us  letting us stay as long as we wanted to say goodbye to our boy no rush just kindness and empathy thank you johann youre simply the best

if you want your insurance claim dealt with promptly dont take your pet to the vet  they take weeks to process claims and as you have to pay their fees up front it probably is not priority for them   so not only do you pay high monthly insurance premiums especially if you have an older pet  you also have to pay up front for treatment and wait weeks to have your claim processed

do not go to this vet not alone did they give me an incorrect dosage of antibiotics for my cat the vet made his mouth bleed by pulling too hard a shocking place when i complained and asked gor a gesture of goodwill they asked me to sign a disclaimer and 30 the ceo mel fuller is cold unprofessional and people should know that they are not professional finally hannah on reception is just a cocky individual who cares more about being right than the pets welfare just dreadful keep your pets safe and dont go anywhere near it

money grabbers with no loyalty whatsoever  after being a loyal customer for 9 years with 5 pets i recently had twins and lost my job which resulted in a single missed payment of which i contacted them and said id be able to pay at the end of the month within 2 weeks they had sent this off to the debt collectors bearing in mind it was a missed payment for the pet plan not anything else i emailed to ask why and was got told its standard so its a little confusing that when i initially got in contact and they told me its fine why im a little suprised the customer care manager laughable title couldnt even get my name correct when telling me tough its just how they do things the thousands and thousands of pounds ive spent there over the passed 9 years i thought id have got a pardon for one missed payment which i already arranged to pay before being palmed off to a debt collection agency

1 person makes this the only vet i would take my dog to johann senior vetinary surgeon johann is straight forward empathetic and considerate to not only the animal but the owner too our english bulldog vinnie is treated by johann for a life long condition upon diagnosis johann completed all examinations and tests with ease and came back to us with a firm diagnosis and a plan of what we needed to do in order to help vinnie there were no money making tactics from him we appreciated his direct approach and advice and took his directions vinnie is now feeling much better and his condition is kept under control via ongoing medication if we ever have any problems we take him to see joahnn straight away knowing that his expertise and kind nature will soon help vinnie feel better we recently took vinnie in for his yearly vaccination and johann was the vet he saw again another no fuss no money making gimmick appointment and he knew his stuff i would recommend johann as a vet to anyone as i said before he is the only reason i take my dog to the vet liverpool thank you johann x

i visited the vet in waltham forest with my cat for an emergency over the past few days he had neither eaten nor drunk anything and had been vomiting yellowgreen substance on the day he stopped eating since then he has refused all food and water  the clinic performed initial checks and administered some medication they informed me that further tests were necessary to determine the cause of his condition at that time i could not afford the full cost of the treatment which included a blood test and iv fluids along with a few hours of hospitalization  i returned the following day and the clinic conducted the blood test and administered iv fluids keeping him at the clinic from 3 pm to 8 pm i was instructed to return the next day for a final checkup and to remove the iv line the doctor had assured me that my cat should recover fully but this did not happen  my cats condition has worsened he is still not eating or drinking and is not using his litter box i left the clinic in tears having paid 700 without receiving any definitive diagnosis or improvement in my cats health the doctor suggested additional tests including an abdominal scan which would cost another 300  i find this situation extremely frustrating and feel that the clinic has been unhelpful unable to provide a diagnosis despite the symptoms my cat is deteriorating and i am at a loss devastated and in tears fearing i will lose him due to their incompetence  i want to warn others to avoid this clinic and seek the best possible care for their pets my cat is slowly dying in front of me and despite the checks and costs i am still without answers

took our yorkshire terrier to the vets liverpool because he became very poorly we went there because our regular vet had moved practices to there johann is our vet and he was as always so compassionate and caring to our dog and us we cant thank him enough for what hes doing for him we thoroughly recommend him we are  also impressed with the reception staff who are also very caring polite and so helpful

this review pertains to the vet we know as lutz we lost our baby on friday last week at the waltham forest branch it was painful enough watching him suffer having to make the decision to end his suffering felt worse than if my own life were ending thankfully lutz did not place any pressure on us and gave us the time we needed to process the grief that was already starting to to form a tight knot inside thanks lutz

bristol site totally diabolical service i have insurance for my 8 year old greyhound i thought id have to pay the excess then insurance would take over for the rest she had to have bloods done but they wanted the full amount first which was 154 next day she had to have urine test 40 which i took in at 930am i was told id hear by late afternoon  results were in at 415 but i couldnt have them as no vet available  i called them 3 times after for results not knowing the result i was stressed tht she might need meds and by them being slack it would hold of any medicine bein given to her i eventually got the results at 740pm i shouldnt have had to chase them so much for animal care i will never use them again totally unprofessional  money grabbing with no empathy whatsoever avoid at all costs  if there was a no star rating i would have chose tht

absolutely 100 money oriented unprofessional staff no interest in the care of pets we took our dog in for a procedure at 9am we was then then the dog will be ok to collect 2pm ish we got a call at 130pm to say she cant have it done now as there had been and emergency so we was paying 1500 today for a procedure and recovery that lasts 30mins on top of this the staff have been lying to there complaints team head office about what was said on a phone call to us i have been charged 50 for blood work and no operation this is a joke things need to change

if i could give a zero star review i would avoid this practice at all costs i cannot believe blue cross would refer anybody to this shameful practice  i took my 17 year old dog frankie on friday for what i thought was going to be a routine check up on his teeth however it turned out he had a tumour at the back of his throat and the vet recommended putting him to sleep fair enough however the way in which he was euthanised was absolutely barbaric the vet put a rope around his left leg first injected him tied the rope around his right leg then said he was going to sedate him  ive had dogs put to sleep previously and the first step was sedation before the injection no rope present what was the point of injecting him and then sedating him blood squirted everywhere the final moments of his life he was scared and in pain  absolutely abhorrent this practice needs shutting down

absolutely no customer care whatsoever  dog went through 4 weeks of treatment due to poor examinations twice when 2 weeks would have been enough no sympathy or any offer to reduce fees even though some fees where only there because they missed obvious problems  beware these people they only want you money responded twice to the vets reply to my review and guess what  no response at all  so only goes to show no customer care

poor service high cost my dog now going to the pdsa hospital in liverpool has broken out in spots was charged 7307 for treatment of surolan i can get locally for 1500 no need for these charges also never get sent spot each month as with monthly subscription i will cancel this with immediate effect before that tried for several days to get through on phone no avail

the whole team at harbour southsea were wonderful once again at our most recent visit for bambis operation the nurse is so welcoming kind and takes her time to answer all my worried mum questions and always puts me at ease they all took such good care of bambi and for that i would highly recommend a big special thank you to lindsay for all your care and advice because of you bambi is recovering so well  and for that ill be forever grateful

maybe i was unlucky as the other reviews here seem ok however i tried to book an appointment via the phone i was told to go online and register i went online and registered and then called back to book an appointment and was told that there arent any places available they arent really interested in my custom right now they are busy enough and that i should go to another vet astonishing

just been into the norris green to pick up a prescription for my dog prices doubled new owners apparently not only no out off hours service they send you the pdsa not a good experience when your dog comes out with an anal infection after a dirty thermometer340 the vet used to be good my animals an there pet plans are going to another vet now 1with out of hours service disgusted in the new owners a new prices reading the latest reviews looks like a not the only unhappy client greed

i first went to the vet thinking luna had an ear infection which they treated her for but didnt get any better so i went back and thankfully johan the vet was there and she didnt have an ear infection at all but a skin allergy after he treated her omg what a difference she is looking and acting like her self again cannot thank him enough l will be booking my appointments with him infuture

took our dog  2 year old rottweiler this morning to the vet at morden branch the vet we see was called dan drennen he was amazing so were the nurses and the receptionist they was helpful and reassured us that our dog was going to be ok she required to be sedated and they comforted us when upset thank you
absolutely terrible company all they care about is profit they murder healthy dogs for money no vet should be killing healthy dogs just for being of a certain breed stay away avoid

really disappointed and not happy i was put on hold for over 30 minutes today so ended the call all i was trying to do was book a recurring dental appointment for my rabbit youre advising to download the  petsap to able to book appoints etc ive messaged on there numerous times still no reply no response to my emails no option to book online been registered here a few years and cant even book a simple appointment

the vet liverpool cant fault them our dog wasnt well this morning rang up 830 there at 845 and was scanned tests etc and in emergency surgery everything explained in excellent detail with care  compassion every member of staff no matter what their role took the time to talk to us in a very caring matter they saved our dogs life an she is now back home with us recovering thankyou we highly recommend you

what amazing service theyve fitted us in due to the serious condition kind and caring allowing us plenty of time with our beautiful girl after making the hardest decision to let her go we were so incredibly grateful to then receive a card of condolence through the post meant they absolute world highly recommended for all animal care thankyou

we have had nothing but excellent service from the vet in southampton our dog has had 3 operations there now and the attention has been first class her 2 nd cruciate ligament operation went far better than her first which was carried out by a so called specialist in winchester nothing but praise for sll the staff

cocker spaniel with a grass seed in ear vet incredibly rude and judgemental in response to me attempting to help my dog in pain at home by washing it out prior to visiting there was no effort to try and extract the grass seed one look one yelp later said that the price would be 400 to sedate when i questioned this and said i wasnt happy to pay this i was asked to leave elsewhere they had a look immediately and managed to remove the grass seed without sedation costing only 50 they do not care about animals only the money

tonight i had to make the very sad decision to say goodby to my beloved cat willow the lovely lady vet and the equally lovely receptionist showed us so much kindness and compassion although it was closing time they happily waited for my son to arrive to say his fair well to willow thankyou both so much xxx rip willow you were very loved

been using the vet  highams park for our 4 cats pretty much since it opened ive always found them to be very communicative professional and compassionate theyre victims of their own success really as waiting times can be long on the phone but other than that please keep up the good work

brilliant practice robert was so kind and considerate in fact i cannot thank all the staff at the vet enough for helping both us and smoochie at such a difficult time  we were shown to a private room rather than having to sit with the other waiting customers and their pets where there was a little tree with paper hearts dangling from it that people had written memories of their pet on everyone was invited to do the same and this consideration was free of charge  robert the vet came in his kind nature and soothing words took us by surprise compared to the matter of fact attitude experienced from other vets  i cannot thank him enough  robert you made such a difference thank you for everything

belle has had over five years of quality treatment at the vet  norris green she has had operations vaccinations and numerous other treatments over the years cant fault anything all the staff are very friendly and professional they all seem to enjoy their work we have recommended them to family and friends over the years  and all have been very happy

very poor customer service my dog was in the clinic for 9 hours and despite attempted phone calls with no answer or no reply to emails finally got my pet back 10 hours later with no explanation or apologyyes and a 650 bill not acceptable disgusting service

on my most recent visit when i sat down on a chair in their dog waiting area as i look down to pet my dog i see urine slowly creeping out from under the chair im on i get up and inform reception of the mess they moped it up and wipe with a wet wipe but the women didnt wash her hands after and got back to work touching all her desk and peoples orders of medicines its never clean there and they were very slow to get up and clear it up just one of the receptionists too and not a cleaner

i have been using the vet for many years now and have always had excellent care given to my pets particularly after my dogs lolas latest dental and extraction shes is and elderly dog and very anxious of the vets but with the use of the petsapp the nurses were able to keep me updated with how she was and even sent me a photo of her recovering ive always been given detailed follow up calls after procedures and bills carefully considered couldnt ask for more really put my mind at ease

the vet southampton have looked after our border collie superbly for six years ever since she required neutering they also saved her life when she had a tumour all the staff and the vets are always efficient and professional and they keep us fully informed and up to date with treatments and vaccinations

have been with the vets for just over a year we have found the vet is overpriced in comparison to other veterinary the vets charge 250 for a ahc when you can get for 99  reception staff have been rude during phone calls and booking appointments judgemental when youre ensure what decisions to make on the spot  i personally would not reregister our pup with this veteran

thank you for a giving great treatment to my kitten  he is now doing really well the nurses and the vet in waltham forest were wonderful very compassionate and gentle i was able to book a visit at short notice the clinic offered sprayed blankets to cover the transport box which helped my distressed kitten to relax

our beloved dog had to be put to sleep recently and as he was wheeled away to have a needle put in him to administer the sedatives he was brought in and we eventually said our goodbyes and agreed to the euthanasia to commence after about 45 syringes being administered it was obvious that the needle was not in his vein and he was then wheeled out again for the other leg to be shaved and the needle infused he was then wheeled back in banging his leg and paws on the door frame and again after an emotional second goodbye he finally passed we have complained about his treatment but the practice manager refuses to acknowledge any wrong doing discusting service and attitude and will never use again

i had to have my pet re vaccinated because of the covid restrictions i found the vet on google theyre prices were very reasonable and i couldnt really afford them vaccination and pdsa werent doing them so i went to the vet and got an appointment quite promptly my overall impression was that the practice is well runfriendly and very clean

was on hold for 30mins from 645715pm last night as my cat had been attacked by a dog and was injured and in pain the receptionist eventually picked up and told me they cant help as theyre too close to closing time 45mins until closing time vile customer service and gutted by the lack of care for animals  not the first time they have had no care for my pets either i wouldnt ever go back there currently on hold to transfer all of my pets details to banstead village vets where they actually care and want to help animals

i take my cats here best vet in warrington by far the vets and nurses are so lovely with the animals they are very professional and thorough the reception staff are always welcoming and caring also you can always get a quick appointment and charges are less than other vets in the area sara especially is a truly kind thoughtful professional vet give them a go

i cant really believe this company still has the cheek to email me  my cocker spaniel was dying of pancreatitisi took her to the millbrook vet they charged me a fortune for all kinds of treatmentsi asked to be kept up to date  then late in the day i was contacted to be told she had to stay inbut they dont have any night time staffso id have to take her to another vetand then bring her back in the morning ori could leave her there overnight unsupervised absolutely shocking experiencebe very very careful and ask these questions before you sign up with this so called cheap alternative

a great vet experience every time the team are always willing to offer advice both my dogs are rescues and quite timid around new people hut the vets and nurses always take the utmost care in helping them so they are comfortable not overly expensive and the support through the app is a great feature

we have been with vet on glaisdale drive since it pretty much opened but after our experience on friday we are now leaving them and going elsewhere on coming home and finding our dog limping and dragging his pawwe called the vet around 430 to be told by an unhelpful receptionist to call the out of ours emergency number as they had no one to see our dog until a week later we then called the vet where we take our dog to be groomed and within an hour he had been seen by a vet had a very thorough examination and had pain relief administered we have a pet plan with the vet which ive now cancelled and have relocated to the vets that took great care with dog our on friday

unfortunately this morning we found my sisters cat mickey deceased under a bush i called the vet in southampton the lady on the phone was very compassionate and helpful informed us to register online so they had his details  to bring him in whenever on arrival another lady at reception was very helpful  took us into a side room to wait for the nurse so we had privacy the nurse who again was so lovely and compassionate gave us our options for cremation  it was much more reasonably priced than any of the other vets we had enquired around other vets just did not answer the phone the nurse was very patient informed us of our choices we didnt feel rushed to make a decision despite springing upon them overall the best experience ive encountered and my sister now feels relieved shes been able to find somewhere in order to eventually lay him to rest whilst still not putting her out of pocket would highly highly recommend

at short notice i received an appointment for my puppy as i was worried about him the front of house staff were so helpful  kind the vet was lovely needed another appointment later in the day  the very kind nurse fitted me in even though fully booked excellent service needs a thank you as too many times unfair negative feedback more likely to be posted

the vet southampton has been outstanding with looking after our cat oreo who has been poorly their care and compassion has been outstanding not only to oreo but to us im a nhs professional and seeing this team go above and beyond to look after our boy has been exceptional callie the manager is outstanding with her levels of care and attention she has been our gaurdian angel and we cannot thank her enough for going above and beyond to help us and oreo the admin team is professional and caring and abby and her veterinary team are fantastic we have clients since oreo was a kitten and i wouldnt trust anyone else with him we are truly grateful for all your care with oreo he is not only a cat he is our family member

on 18th april 2023 i paid a deposit of 13250 for my dog to be spayed on 4th may 2023 i took my dog in at 0900 am on 4th may to be told she was not on the system and was not booked in  i was then told to leave her there and they will see if a surgeon would be happy to do it which they were  when i went to pick her up at 1500 i paid the rest of the payment in cash for the spaying to the lady on reception who was training a staff member at the time and advised us our account was 000  23 months later we received a letter with two outstanding balances one for the spaying and one for medication  i sent them the screenshot of the card payment for the medication and was advised a manager would be looking into the cash payment i had to call up at least twice a week for an update to be constantly getting told a manager was not available  a manager named joanne called to say she would be dealing with it and asked me to send the email again with the screenshot which i did she then called again saying it had not been received i had sent this 4 times now we had an emergency last month were my dog was really sick and they refused to see her as the account was on hold due to the outstanding balances which was the vets fault  the service has been unbelievably shocking and one i would not recommend to anyone  i made a formal complaint in october 2023 and to this day have not received a response

in the business of selling procedures knowing that the majority of pet owners will never say no backing that up with vastly inflated prices for treatments and medications stay registered with a vetinary practice for the sake of your pet insurance but choose wisely and with your nonprescription medication always shop online  response from the vet has been answered by email to the vet centre director i stand by the above

visited liverpool branch with a very sick guinea pig that sadly could not be cured staff at all times were very caring compassionate and took time to answer questions and nothing was too much trouble we received a lovely card with our guinea pigs footprints on and a lovely message

do not sign your vet up these here worst mistake of my life  all they care about is money they charge over 20 per item on a prescription if you want to get your prescription written out this is after you pay high cost of your pet been seen also it is always a really long wait often more than a week  they also prescription the wrong dose for my cat it was because of this i wanted to get a written prescription so it could be dispensed by a professional as the vet are in no way professional this can also be seen by the very high rates of staff turn over  please never sign up to these vets

barn lodge skelmersdale just want to say a big thank you to the staff at barn lodge i was faced with the difficult decision to have my 16 year old dog put to sleep they treated him with the upmost dignity and provided reassurance and compassion at such a difficult time i decided to have an individual cremation for oscar and have just picked up the ashes in a beautiful presentation box along with a card of condolence to say i was touched by the service would be an understatement excellent practice i wouldnt hesitate to recommend them

the vet morden is a fantastic practice i took my dog there today for his annual vaccinations and the staff are always so polite and helpful i have always been seen on time and the vet always takes time to interact with bailey before doing any checks they are also reasonably priced compared with a lot of other private vets would definitely recommend

i have been using this vets since moving to market weighton in 1996 on saturday 2nd september my daughter rang in tears saying one of her pets was ill so i immediately picked them up to take to the vets a 24 hr emergency hospital for animals to find no reception and we should have made an appointment never in the years ive been here have i booked an emergency appointment ive just walked in and been seen so its not a 24hr emergency hospital for sick animals we waited for over an hour outside hull royal hospital doesnt expect me to pre book an emergency appointment the vet we saw was very pleasant then came the bill to say i was shocked was an understatement charged for out of hours if its advertised as a 24hr emergency service there is no out of hours

not happy with the vets when i took my dog for a scale and polish last year it was 210 this year 310 went to see the vet for a dental check just to see the vet it was 35 then he give me an estimated bill for treatment for my dogs teeth 535 not fair on low income families not good service karen boyd

absolutely outstanding service friendly staff and very caring and compassionate they looked after my boy oscar with such care and attention until the very end i would highly recommend the vet southampton to anyone who is looking for someone to love their pets as much as they do

called this vet practice and asked whether they can produce paperwork for pet travelling abroad had been told they can travelled 25 miles to appointment on the day they refused to change the port of entry from dover eurotunnel to dover port called defra and was told they should have on the spot as it makes no difference they gave us ahc and forgot to inform we also need ehc then turns out practice is not registered with defra for a year and va is the actual manager this manager then called and gave me wrong advice on travel stating that blood test is also required i checked with defra and it wasnt this cannot be worse for travel documents dont bother unless want to waste money and time absolutely irresponsible management

not happy with the way my nervous dog was treated hes frightened in the vets and we muzzle him they needed to check an ear infection he had and told us to bring him in for sedation to do the exam and treatment my husband took him in and after 4 members of staff both vets and nurses tried but failed to inject him my husband told them that they were making our poor dog more distressed and he walked out they wanted over 500 for this of which my husband had to pay half upfront he was so angry when he brought our kev home who was so frightened by his experience we telephoned the vets and asked for our deposit back as we would not be using them again we now go the a vets in appleton they did the procedure by simply placing a blanket over kevs head gave him a sedative and when he became sleepy they examined and treated all at a cost of 200 big price difference and a much calmer experience for our dog we would not recommend this vets at all money grabbers with little respect for our nervous pet

everytime we visit we are always welcomed with a smile and bear always with alot of attention the staff are so caring and kind my bear had to have xrays and i was so worried but the staff went above and beyond to reassure me i had updates all throughout the day and when we came to collect him we were met with praise from the staff on how well behaved he is and how lovely and cuddly he is i wouldnt go anywhere else and wouldnt trust any other place with my boy they treat him and me like family and care for him like hes one of theirs

we had to have my pet put to sleep as her health was deterating and there was nothing  else we could  do on arrival  we was put i a room were the vettook my dog to another room to put a canoly  in her legno one explained  how it worked and we was to upset  to ask we thought shes a vet they do this all the timethen a receieptioniat camd in sating how sorry she was and saying while my dog was there are you having her cremated  and that we wouldnt  get her ashes back i couldnt  believe  it we wasnt  having my dog cremated  there we was going to a pet cemetery  it was not her business  to be asking us as we  was deferstated  and just wanted  this time with our dog and i know they say digs cant understand but my dog knew what was happening then the vet fetched my lovely  dog back  put her on my lap never explained  again what was going to happen  and then with out letting us know pushed the liquid in and i thought  my dog had been shot boom she fell like z rag dool on my lap and she was gonei cant get that last image out of my head it was the worst thing ive had to do i thought they would  have put her sleep calmly there was a nurse there who was the only that showed emotion and  helped clean my baby all i gave know  is a void and a broken heart please make sure people know what the process is  and nobody else in the room except  family  were are grieving  we have lost a pet who is family  and cerished and loved have a bit off empathy

avoid this establishment if you can on my first visit i had to wait 50 mins pass my booking time then the vet complained my kitten is cold the next visit was booked 945 but when i complained well after 1000 they said my booking was 1000 no tests performed on the first visit even i told them the problems are present for 2 weeks their only interest is to book you more visits to charge you more but they dont care about your animal they dont want it to get well quickly as this less money for them

the vet hengrove are absolutely lovely the vets and nurses are really well trained and kept up to date theyve always put my dogs needs first and explain any treatment or medication to me well both of my dogs have had surgery and attend yearly for check ups everytime we are greeted by the lovely receptionists who are really polite and the waiting area is always kept clean i wouldnt take my dogs anywhere else

southampton  took my 14 year old cat as she woke up with blood around her mouth and nose it was a sunday and she was seen at 1pm this vets is excellent the reception are efficient polite and friendly emma the vet did a fabulous job sorting out a problem with millies teeth quickly today millie is full of beans and much happier this vet also does not charge ridiculous amounts to come at the weekend if it is during the weekend opening hours some vets charge 150200 just to get through the door during out of hours i am very happy with this practice and would recommend it

the vet nottingham  are the best vets they looked after my dog laci a rotti x bullmastiff   not only did the sort out my dogs ear a couple of years ago where others  had failedbut last saturday 19th february 2022 i had to make the hard decision for her to cross the rainbow bridge the nurses  vet where outstanding i cant thank them enough they where so kind and fantastic with her  the room they provided was lovely and we could take as long as we need with her  i would highly recommend anyone to go to this vets they are exceptional

i got both my dogs microchips done at morden vet around 4 years ago i was at a different vet recently and found out that both my dogs chips dont have my name and address on them only a chip number i had to phone the company that the chip belongs to and put my name and address on them its all done now but what if i lost my dog yes they have id tags but what if they checked my dogs chip they could easily have put there details so many dogs have been going missing over the last couple of years its not good enough that morden vet didnt do there job properly it was pure laziness not to have put my name  address so if u got your dog chipped at this vet i would go and get it checked out just to be on the safe side

receptionist greeted me politely dealt with my details and appointment promptly my pet and i didnt wait long and our appointment was dealt with in a professional and kind manner my visits are always so positive that my pet gets excited as soon as we get into reception  and into treatment rooms

excellent service friendly helpful staff we have been able to see the same vet meaning she really got to know our not so little pup this was so reassuring when he wasnt well and our vet sara and the admin team were fantastic would highly recommend

terrible would give no stars if i could refused to give my diabetic dog insulin after i did a perfectly fine curve she is just being awkward what am i supposed to do im desperate  please give some insulin or he will die without it will be contacting the vcms

i looked for a long time for a decent vet practice for my dog the vet portsmouth have been so good i was wary at first with it being a chain and in a retail park but i was soon proven wrong and if anything the location is super convenient always accommodating information flowing back and forward called in the morning and was seen immediately with such attentive vets and staff constant updates when my dog was admitted he was so poorly i was so worried but they set my mind at rest and you could see the passion they have when i went to collect him  he was so much better too advice on insurance diet and discounts on his diet food with the vet health plan i think its 14 per month i would have no hesitation in recommending the vet portsmouth

although i was delayed and a little late for my appointment i was received in a friendly manner the waiting room is large clean and airy the reception staff was pleasant and friendly the vet gave rosko a thorough examination and was very friendly you get the impression that they care about you and your pet

a massive big thank you togreenwood and brown vets castleford branch to all the staff and the vets you helped to keep our beloved charlie a extended 26 months unfortunately charlie the dogpassed away on the 23rd february 2024 i would just like to saythe vets and nurses receptionistsand everyone at greenwood and browna big thank youfor helping charlieall thease months thank you ps thank you for the lovely card

ive been coming to them for over two years now i registered my cat with them and my puppy 6 months ago they are extremely loving and caring towards my pets  their advice is always genuine and great from booster jabs and check ups to my anxious cat and puppy eating half a chocolate cake theyve been supportive and helpful they also have decent prices  a lot less than some of the other companies out here id 100 recommend them to my friends and family

the liverpool branch are very unscrupulous vets i have twice had to query charges by this vet the first time was when they tried to charge me 3800 to weigh my dog i refused to pay and they rightly waive  the charge the second time  we got our dog castrated paid the bill on the day  standard procedure at most vets  then months later received a letter stating there was an outstanding balance of 7900 i phoned them and spoke to a manager who assured me it was their mistake and the charge would be wiped  fast forward 56 months and another letter arrived stating that 7900 was still owed phoned them again and explained the charge was supposed to have been wiped i was then informed the manager i had spoken to has now left  very convenient  and the bill would have to be paid as my partner had signed a consent form with the price on my partner is adamant the price was added after she signed the form nobody could explain to me why we hadnt been charged the correct amount on the day of the procedure i was willing to fight this charge all the way to court  but having received another letter threatening a debt collection company would be taking over the case my partner reluctantly paid the amount allegedly owed stay well clear of this vets we would never use them again

we have been with the vet for a number of years now and wouldnt even think about moving anywhere else we attended recently for our dogs booster and the practitioner asked how our dog was in himself i explained some unrelated concerns and they were dealt with without hesitation and with the absolute most attention the information and treatment options where discussed thoroughly and our minds where put st ease with us feeling confident moving forward our experiences are always good and i could not recommend the team enough

just picked up alfies flea and worm treatment toothpaste and yumove advantage for 6 months always a pleasant experience when going there had alfie weighed while i was there  i am on the smart pet scheme so only had to pay for toothpaste and yumove

the staff were totally understanding and supportive to my end of life request for my elderly toy yorkie the vets carried out the dignified euthanasia with total care and compassion on a sunday morning thankyou

i have been with the vet southampton for several years and would definitely recommend the front staff are always polite and friendly and the vets have been very good at explaining treatments much better now there is an appointment system

highams park london my elderly neighbour loving pet owner i accompanied was charged unbelievable 30 consultation fee for one minute saying in the waiting room that his cat ear needs checking as a bit irritated although he already said it over the phone while making the appointment another 4 minutes woman spent  telling him he cant accompany his cat to the treatment room no matter how distressed his cat was she said she needs to take the cat in behind the scenes to be examined by the vet he reluctantly let his pet be taken awaywe waited 45 minutes the woman brought the cat back saying the vet have seen nothing in the ear but suggested might be mites and the woman also said the vet administered some ear drops and injection that my neighbour was charged for as well as  ear drops to take home costing 200 there was no proof the cat received the ear drops and injection they charged for i asked the cat but the cat couldnt say perhaps they dont allow the pet owner in with the pet for that same reason
wasnt as nervous this time as trust in megan completely she is so good at explaining and reassuring couldnt imagine trusting anyone else as much such a credit to your practice x

great vets the receptionists and vets come across so caring offering blankets with herbal spray to keep your pet calm i got an appointment for the very next day and my pet was treated and already a lot better

i have been coming this vet for a few years now after my cat required some treatment and i found it a lot cheaper here ever since whenever either of my cats are in a scrap or require treatment i return here not just for the price but also the staff are always lovely and welcoming and the reception area is nice and big and spaced out so not on top of each other will carry on returning

celyn vets holywell this is the worst vets ive used not trusting had to pay 106 for flee treatment they said id had but had not received  unable to talk about it  just sent me a letter with a 7 day bailiff noticeplease keep your records with this company

all vets only care for money i was charged 44 for 10min with a young vet 5mins out of school then she wanted 512 to take two teeth out they discust me this has to change they have to stop these greedy little people and stop them ripping them off

poor experience on every occasion contacted for emergency on line treatment was given advise and prescribed medication for my dog called vet after several hours to see if medication was ready to collect was advised no but online chat said it had been sent over hours prior i had to find another vet to prescribe as my dog was in pain we then went for a booster jab booked in sat and waited to then be told our appointment had been booked for the wrong time and could we come back two hours later after sat there for 30 mins i would not recommend this vet their approach and customer service is very poor and clearly not in the best interest of the pets they had 2 weeks to contact me to advise the error on the appointment time which they had made due to double booking is in but failed to make contact  as stated still booked us in on arrival to send us away

dr paulo and dr margarita saved our dogs life after wed received insufficient care whilst abroad this statement is inadequate to describe the dedicated and extended care they have given  including working at the weekend to find someone to make up some medication that was not available anywhere in portugal or spain i cannot recommend them highly enough

i would highly recommend this practice as first rate kind prompt and extremely good value they have looked after my two dogs since i moved to liverpool and undoubtedly saved the life of one when he was very poorly appointments and walkins have both been brilliant easy parking and a very safe and clean enviroment

the vet warrington have been treating my 13yr old go for over a year total spent 210000  he took a bad turn last week and i knew it was time to let him go  i contacted the warrington branch at 1815pm they close at 1900pm to say hes collapsed and he needs to be put to sleep i was already distraught and then to be told they had no apps left that day and they could fit him in the next day i said he has collapsed and he cannot get up   they said they had no emergency appts left i honestly dont know what treatment can be more important emergency appt that one to end their suffering also ive been eating 2 weeks for them to get preauthorisation from my insurance for blood tests to see why his health deteriorated so quick ill never know if blood tests carries out 2 weeks earler could have prevented the sudden collapse  never use these again

i dont usually leave reviews but i have to on this occasion unfortunately my cat bobo was involved in a fatal rta last sunday i wasnt home at the time and the lady involved and a passer by stopped which im forever grateful for as it was sunday they took bobo to the vet in southampton as they were the nearest open one i had recently changed my phone number and not updated it on the pet log database so when she was scanned only my address was available callie and the team went above and beyond to get in contact with me so i knew what happened to my little one we werent able to see her due to the injuries she had suffered but we were given paw prints and treated with such compassion and kindness it made a horrific experience more bearable knowing bobo was safe and able to be returned home to us and her sister i cannot even put into words how much this meant to our family and in my 30 years of owning pets and losing one in the worst way having people care the way they did lessened the blow of what happened thank you so very much for the way you handled this we will never forget your kindness x
first time visiting today and we were really impressed no rush and sell proper discussions and explanations no pushing to sell unneeded productstreatments even got a discount really impressed

i only left 1 star so i could write this i am looking after my mums dog as she died last week i came in to get daisy some flea treatment but the head vet wouldnt even come and speak to me told the receptionist to tell me to go and buy front line he wouldnt even let me buy the flea treatment under the circumstances not only covid but the loss of my mum and daisys mum he then wouldnt even take my call in my opinion he doesnt deserve to pick up dog mess in a park absolutely disgusting so i advise anyone to not use the vet at morden disgusted doesnt even come close to how i was made to feel

i have been going here with my older dog for almost nine years and my other dog for six years i was on the pet plan and went to collect flea and worming treatments as required i always had text message reminders monthly for this and for upcoming vaccinations when i went recently i was told my dog had missed their vaccination booster by four months  included in my pet plan and had to start the course again which i now had to pay for i was surprised by this as had no reminder on checking the vaccination record i realised this was right however had not checked this myself due to previous reminders when asked i was told they were changing systems and a reminder is a courtesy thing not happy at all with this response and walked out cancelled my pet plan and now looking for somewhere else    i never requested reminders but felt it was a nice touch and admit i became reliant on this you should have notified customers if not offering this service anymore bad customer service in my opinion

another great visit to the vet liverpool my fur baby was taken care like the member of the family she is and had another great experience couldnt say ive ever had a bad experience here in the 6 years we have been with them all of the staff are amazing

been with these wonderful caring people for a number of years they always look after our two cats and they have the animals welfare foremost always happy to discuss the best care for our furies well recomend

the vet southampton 4 years ago i paid 10month for insurance to cover flea treatment  vaccination and 2 vet consultations the next year it went up to 1250 then last year and this year up again   and the vet consultations were removed but the reason for only 2 stars is that i took my beloved cat in yesterday as an emergency because she woke up really poorly and crying  after a few tests i was told they can do nothing for her and i was taken to a room to wait for them to prepare the injection i only just sat down and was in total shock and crying when the door opened and in walked someone with a cash machine asking me to pay for my visit   i was totally shocked  i had rushed out without my wallet thankfully i had my bank app on my phone so could pay them as requested    ive never encountered such a lack of empathy usually payment is requested after the event   someone at ho needs to think again about this unfeeling money grabbing practise   i can never recommend any of my friends to come here  which is a shame because the vets are really lovely

i had a cat previously and i didnt go there as often but now having a dog it requires me to go regularly  on a number of occasions i have had to to drive there as i cannot get through the telephone lines are sometimes down as because they dont have a automated system you dont know how long you are waiting it just rings they have stated they are trying to get a line sorted but have had to use mobiles due to problems with bt this scares me just in case i  have an issue with an emergency im going to have to cancel my subscription and go somewhere else the staff are lovely but this is not good enough

was told my dog would not be given further treatment due to the lanarks practice failure to advise me a blood test carried out by niall just before my dog was picked up this had not been added to the already large bill for treatment i had previously moved home and they had been apparently sending out letters informing me of this therefor i had no idea about this i was told my dog was fit and well to come home after 4 days i was then told i was no longer welcome at the practice by letter at my new address i informed them of this mix up and was not given an answer as to why was my dog given another blood test if she was fit and well to come home i called this morning to ask for an assessment for my 12year old dachshunds who has ivdd with the view to having her euthanised only to be told they would be willing to see her i have had all my dogs and horse registered and treated with them for years and suddenly because of their administration fault my animal would no longer be seen very poor service

avoid this people ive been there twice and would never go again prices terrible customer service disgusting avoid avoid avoid when my dog needed emergency treatment the first question was  can you wear a mask at your visit i have a shaking screaming dog in my hands and you are asking me to wear a mask first went to pets at home chingford vet they are the best people ever and always happy to provide an emergency service to my both rabbits and my dog  ps emergency vet request after pandemic disgusting customer service i make sure not of my friends use your practice glad few already left

at first great but im not sure any more cat was foaming at the mouth kept him in very good care  cat sent home where he sneezed constantly and then we pull a 15cm piece of grass from his nose 700 down and somehow they didnt see this it has now taken 13 days and counting for them to fill in my insurance firms i have chased the insurer has chased no response to email and phones keep cutting out  therefore i wouldnt recommend as i am seriously out of pocket and the communication is dreadful when you want them to do something but happy to take your money shame vets were nice but the administration is poor

portsmouth north harbour i cannot thank the vet enough for giving me time and patience with my pet dog florence i hadnt relised how poorly she was and the vet gave me as much time as i needed with her a very painful experience but helped by the vet thankyou

i had been attending the vet in southampton for a quite a few years until a very nasty staff member joined the team who some how thought she was in charge she lies through her teeth and i was asked to leave to be honest i am glad but would go back once the vet understands that she is the issue not me good luck with her and i await your apology

they give a price which is valid for a month when i tried to book in the appointment it was delayed on their behalf then they could miraculously fit me in one day after the quote expired and wouldnt honour it and tried to tell me the prices had changed and increased from 79 to 139 waited days for someone to call back to see if they would honour the quote and i eventually gave up waiting and have now booked into another local vet with a quote of 80 and a booked appointment appointment totally unorganised and the vert has gone downhill ive been registered here a few years now and they have seen and operated on 4 of my animals im unsure if reception staff have changed or management but something has gone wrong and it is reflecting through the practice and the way in which clients are treated all they seem interested in now is money not the welfare of the animals such a shame but i wouldnt recommend using these at all anymore with their price increases they no longer compete with other affordable vets with a much better service

my dog pug x shitzu has only ever been to the vet and i had my cat registered there although i have not been for a while due to my own problems i cant praise the vets nurses and reception staff enough for their care towards animals they see they are amazing people and i would recommend them 247 they not only care about your pet they care about you too

incompetent vets  i am writing this review with a heavy heart and anger i feel towards the vet in millbrook southampton who failed my 2 week old puppy the lack of competence and negligence displayed by these supposed professionals has left me mourning the loss of my puppy  i noticed some concerning symptoms with my puppy worried about its wellbeing i took it to the first vet to assured me over the phone before taking my puppy in that she was fine the vet advised that the reason my puppy was in distress was down to a skin condition and i should give her a bath trusting their expertise i felt relieved and left  45 hours later and my puppy evidently deteriorating i rushed my puppy to another vet as soon as they saw my puppy they were able to tell me she was suffering with pneumonia and fluid on her lungs these vets advised it was cruel to keep her alive however my puppy decided to pass on her own just moments later  the lack of professionalism and care demonstrated by the vets in millbrook is simply inexcusable it was evident they are clearly not interested they dismissed all my concerns without conducting a thorough examination it is clear the vets primary concern is not the wellbeing of animals but rather their own convenience and profit  i urge all pet owners to think twice before allowing their animals to be taken into the care of this vets
fantastic visit to the vet again so friendly and explain every thing in great detail my yorkie is very nervous but there so kind and put her at ease would never go anywhere else

unfortunately my option of the highams park branch has changed from 100 positive to 99 disappointing i joined because of the walk in appointments and good valuenow you are lucky to get to see a vet and prices are just as high as another vet  i have never in the past had to pay a consultation fee for a follow up appointment but last time i was charged just for a vet to look at my dog for less than 1 minute in the waiting area to tell me all is ok which i basically already knew when i questioned the payment i was told it was not a consultation fee but for time spent  jesus nearly 30  for less than a minute are you having a laugh  my dogs condition could have been nipped in the bud had i been able to get an earlier appointment   also they are selling a service what the crack about never having change  hello off to another vet

avoid the vet 145 morden road mitcham  absolutely disgusting my dog was locked in a kennel all day after having a very large chunk taken out of her back to have her cancer tumours removed to my horror and disgust she was returned to me at the end of the day not fed and covered in her own poo with just a plaster covering her open weeping wound  which was hanging off my pet has not ben the same since she is very nervous scared and traumatised the vet refused to return my call i had to spend additional time and money to find a suitable dressing i had to drive back to the vet to try and get the vet to speak to me as he refused to call back he finally came out the vets name is imre his response was basically the vets has run out of food we dont dress the wounds shrugging his shoulders and rolling his eyes my dog appears to be unwell so i am worried about infection and her general state i have now gone to a new vet no break down of costing i have no idea what i have been charged for but i do know nearly 2000 later i have a very distressed pet i can only hope she is cancer free and will get over her ill treatment from the vet

i have been into the nottingham branch today with savanah we went as an emergency as we though she had been hit by a car they moved fast with care to her and to us they took her for observation they put her under while they did scans and xrays sadly she crashed after 3 rounds of cpr they called to let us know they lost her it was with emense dignity and respect they gave us the devastating news thank you katlen for your love and kindness you showed us and thank you connor for the consultation this morning  love  mark and sue  your all super heros everyone that works there

the vet liverpool my dachshund dog is petrified of this place never been to another vets until iv recently changed vets hes had that many bad experiences here hes petrified to enter the building on one visit they were asking me to pin him down on the table to try and cut his nails he was so distressed his eyes were bright red bulging the vet insisted we carried on trying to the point my dog fell off the treatment table bare in mind this is a dachshund you have to be very careful with their back i straight away made comment and said enough to which she then agreed to give up this is just 1 visit alone previous visits were similar but not as bad not too mention they than kept calling me and sending me letters for the bill of a treatment he never had done he was also on a care plan that i was accused of not paying honestly tried too many times to give this place another chance im over it now and have gone elsewhere i really dont believe this place has a genuine best interest at heart for the animals pets are family to some people

my dog gets a prescription from the vets which i take to the pharmacy to fill as its cheaper than buying from the vet direct its a simple process the vet draws it up prints it out and signs it and i pick it up and pay for it first time i took the prescription to a pharmacy the signature wasnt legal as it was printed and not in ink so i had to go back and sort it out the next time i got a prescription the vet didnt even sign it at all i then had to ring them up and ask them to email it to the pharmacy with a signature so my dog didnt go without medication and now need to reconcile this with the pharmacy with a prescription that is actually signed and theyve told me i need to buy a new one because theyve binned it its got a years worth of medication left on it and they want to see the dog before they give me a new script and leaving the pharmacy with an illegal prescription its not hard to sign a prescription is it
the receptionists are always friendly and the atmosphere is re assuringmy dogs do not feel scared or anxious when i have sadly lost a dog or cat they have always been sympathic and caring
my dog gracie had cancer of her ear vet dan was amazing explained everything aftercare was amazing dan at micham is awesome

pooch suffered with yeasty earswas told they would do a ear scrape to identify what was whati knew it was yeast infection as hes had it before anywaysthinking it was being sent away to be tested i agreed no they just put it under the scoperang the same day to tell me he needed putting under to do a ear clean  bloody taking as he was going under nearly 300 they wantedgot a second opinion from another vetsdidnt need being put under for ear cleandidnt have the infection that this  vets said he had the lady vet that i saw there was just interested in  for what they could get out of mewill never go this vets again they are not for the animals they are just in it for the
very happy with my experience at the vet bristol  i never feel pressured to pay for things that i feel are not needed etc the staff are always helpful and friendly and treat my pet like royalty

was reccomend by my sister max is a very nervous dog n the vet was absolutely brilliant with him very calming n went at my dogs pace by the end of his appointment he was very relaxed n was able to carry out his treatment highly recommend
took minnie this morning to the vets broadway the receptionists were absolutely lovely and so helpful not just to me any my pup but to all who came in whilst i was there  thank you x

i have been with the vet morden since they first opened and would not go anywhere else the staff have come and gone over the years but all of them replaced with equally wonderful people my 12 year old dog had a serious infection that needed a particular antibiotic to treat it was not available anywhere in this country my vet sylvia researched and found it on an obscure vet med site that imported it she was calling me all the time to let me know who she was trying and what was happening the antibiotic was not a success on its own in the end so she and another vet marcos operated on him to open and clean the track of the infection this was the most difficult procedure as he has syringomyelia and a very bad heart murmur so cannot be anaesthetised the procedure was done with only local anaesthetic and mild sedation and was a success i am sure that not many vets would have gone to these lengths with an elderly dog with such him i will be forever grateful to them for giving me more time with my boy who continues to enjoy life if a little more slowly these days
i called up last minute got same day appointment and my boris was seen very quickly didnt have to wait long very happy with service and how efficient staff are happy with service

avoid  at all cost the laziness and unprofessionalism of this practice is beyond belief ive never been somewhere so horrific myself and multiple friends have had bad experiences resulting in their pets almost dying

really nice vet practice and lovely staff everyone is happy to help and the vets i have seen are very knowledgeable and kind the practice has a clean large waiting area plus ive never had to wait long for an appointment
good luck trying to get through waiting 30mins for someone to pick up no response on the pet app no help with insurance claim and no updates with follow up

the vet was warm and welcoming he put both me and my cat at ease my cat is 16 years old and i was very worried about her going under anaesthetic but alex said he would treat my cat as his own thank you so much for looking after my precious pet
absolutely fabulous vet they really care for their patients and are very reasonably priced cant recommend them enough brilliant

excellent service at the vet warrington as always slight delay to annual check but was advised of this when rang after reminder last year to book reasons explained as to why the delay and seen within the time period allowed would definitely recommend
excellent and prompt care given to my dog  much better now that you can book appointments as i hated having to wait for hours on end with the previous system
my pet had a visit today for vaccination and check up and a slight health concern everything was explained thoroughly and treatment was good as always
i have used this practise for a few years now customer service is great and veterinary staff are brilliant both my mum and son also use this vets for their fur babies highly recommend
the vet i saw today was really lovely he was friendly and attentive and treated my pet fabulously it was the first time id been allowed in the room which i was really grateful for

show of compassion sadly we had to say goodbye to our love cat pedro it is an awful time but this vet show so much compassion and was very professional we were given time and even offered a cup of tea but most of all was the time and patience shown to our lovely cat who deserved the best and got the best i am pleased that we came to you not just the vet but the reception staff were kind and offered their sympathy the follow up service was also very good
hi recently visit norris green  waiting room was filthy smelly and the floor was rotten  didnt sit down as the seating area was all torn and dirty
appalling experience  totally a money maker young foreign speaking vets only interested in the money would never use again

im absolutely disgusted by how the vet handles loyal customers ive been their customer for 4 years since moving to the uk i set up a healthcare plan last year for my dog to benefit the free consultation and treatments they offer within their policy in the beginning of this year they changed their policy they offer only one free health check up now and only 10 off of dental treatments compared to the previous 2 annual free check ups and 30 off of dental treatment and they implemented and extra mandatory health check up to get the worm and flee treatment so since i saw i barely benefit anything from the health plan i cancelled it very easy straight forward they told me on the phone it okay you can cancel only a week later i received a letter that i owe them 6616  apparently i couldnt cancel the health care plan before the 1 year period which i wasnt made aware of i never received any information regarding the terms and conditions they have not made me aware of the cancellations policy when i asked about the policy they sent me a leaflet where instead of highlighting the policy they covered it after being 1 week late for the payment which i intended to pay in the first place they forwarded the claim to a debt collector company  after being 1 week late from the original deadline  i ended up paying 15616 instead of 6616  expensive lesson know your terms and conditions folks because even your local vet will try to scam you they apparently can change the terms and conditions as they wish and after actually making me pay for the extra 4 months left from the year they told me they wont provide their services for my dog i can only assume that they dont understand legal terms and conditions they should provide their treatment for the rest of the period as they made me pay for the rest of the 12 month of the policy this is the leaflet they sent me with the highlighted policy absolute scammers

i took my small jack russell dog as she had a growth on a rear paw after an examination i was told that the treatment would cost around 150200 it ended up costing me 800 due to their mistakes in the treatment
i was seen fairly quickly the vet explained to me my options on the treatment for my pet i left the vets feeling quite happy with my pets consultation

we recently visited the vet waltham forest with your kitten boy apologiesno apologies for the less than imaginative name for castration from start to finish it was a great experience i had a free preop assessment via petsapp with a wonderful nurse who was thorough and went through everything with me she then sent through a quote for me to look at and some preop information which was very helpful on the morning of his op we arrived and were greeted by their lovely practice manager who was super friendly and efficient the practice was already busy at 8am and she received multiple calls but dealt with each one with a friendly and professional manner the nurse who checked boy in was also lovely and she went through the whole procedure with me thoroughly and put me at ease i knew she would take good care of our lovely little kitten once the op had begun one of the vets called to ask about an issue with his teeth but he wasnt pushy about potential treatment when i picked up boy postop he was in a good condition and i was thoroughly briefed on the op and how to support him with his recovery i even received 5 packs of hills food staff on the reception were also super helpful organising for me to have more spot on flea treatment all in all a really positive experience thanks to all the staff at the vet waltham forest
fantastic caring practice  really lovely efficient staff very clean and reasonable prices been going there for years  highly recommend this practice
great friendly team and very helpful i had a bit of a wait on my visit as there was an emergency being delt with but that was explained immediately thanks for looking after my dog

the vet portsmouth have been nothing but friendly and helpful with me and my recent rescue dog    they are attentive caring and take the time to explain everything to you  thank you for everything so far
registered with the vet 4 years ago very happy with service always friendly and helpful staff timely reminders of vaccinations and treatments
happy with the level of care pre covid we were allowed to walk in with no appointment but unfortunately you now have to make one but its easy to make one

fortunately i have only had to see the vet for vaccination and parasite treatment in recent years however i was impressed with the treatment and compassion i received when my cats brother died i have used the vet in southampton for several years and i have no negative issues

been using this bets since ot opened i  warrington and find that the staff are great they truly care about your pet the service in which they provide us excellent they explain everything and will explain anything tahy you dont understand

i could go into countless details regarding our practice in north harbour but well start with the most recent issue our dog went in for a spay and naturally we asked if theyd be okay to also trim her nails as its service they offer firstly due to some concern about her bleeding from a phantom pregnancy they promised theyd call us when she went into surgery which they didnt when we called after 4 hours they informed us she had been for about 30 mins in the past theyve allowed her to chew through several plastic pieces on the cage and even once told us to make sure she passes plastic in her poo as shed eaten cannula lines during her stay so once again we picked her up to find out theyd allowed her to chew through her lead for the 3rd time after getting her back from her spay we noticed that she had minor bleeding from one of her claws upon inspection the claw had been cut back within an inch of her actual paw and the quick was exposed we do understand shes fidgety and difficult but she would have been sedated and we were never even informed that she had this injury when she left these are the few examples not to mention when our dog went in for sickness and when we saw the receipt theyd sedated her twice without informing us they only told us they were giving her fluids our dogs always come home hugely dehydrated after hours staying there for what was just meant to be a check up im just so dissapointed as it always feels like theyre more interested in the money not the animals
after a visit to the vet at warrington i would like to say that my petteddy was treated with kindness and respect by the lady vet and i would recommend them to anyone that has a poorly pet

today i bought 2 tins of wet food hills dietary 360 grams they cost 1021 they were recommended by the vet thats why i bought them when back home i bought 12 tins of the same on the web for2839  what a mark up and what a ripoff be warned

a while ago they were okwalk in clinic which was very convenient for many people i suppose prices were also very good a good strategy to get clients than boom no more walk in only appointments which you can not get very soon prices exploded a written prescription as an example from 1050 suddenly became 22 appointment prices doubled one of my dogs have a history of eye ulcers so i know she will get it when i see her symptoms i went to them been given antibiotics and been told i must come back in one week when i called and told them my dog if fine i have been told that it is an emergency and i have to come in so they can check if she is ok i know when my dog is ok and when she is not so i had to change them after 23 years with them because i just had enough and this are just a few things that are wrong with them
do not go anywhere else  the vet is fantastic in every way caring and efficient  the cost of treatment is the best in the area i travel quite a distance to use them

edit after response from the vet no conclusion was reached other than the admit of fault and refund of 44 no explanation as to why they vet felt she was in the right to overcharge   the nottingham well what can i say i am absolutely devastatingly appalled by the treatment we have received today i have always sung their praise in past years since being taken over the service is just not the same it makes me sad as i loved the practice and staff before i took in our cat billy today he began choking this morning this has happened before he had something lodged in his throat i knew this was the case again as his behaviour was exactly the same trying to bring it up the consultation this morning resulted in him being sent away with a anti sickness injection he was still trying to cough up whatever was stuck but you seemed to think this wasnt the case you were negligent in not reading previous notes and listening to our concerns on the way home we were really concerned so rang back you asked us to bring him down again you said you could do the sedation and look into his throat but it was up to us as you didnt think that you would find anything not at any point this you recommend this be your course of action it was only done at our insistence i get a call from a nurse advising me that you removed a 5cm blade of grass stuck in his throat and up into his nose you would have left him to suffer in pain through the rest of the day night and morning you have even had the nerve to charge us for being seen twice this should have been 1 consultation how vulgar of you we challenged this in practice but you would not back down i am reaching out to the rcvs to raise my concerns as yes you have been negligent but not only this you have taken advantage of my care as a owner and over charged me in consultation fees

i attended the vet in southampton after my dog cut himself on some barbed wire hes a working dog so used to getting the odd knock and cut but this required stiches when i phone the vet i explained exactly what was needed ie clean around the cut some local anaesthetic and stich up i said he wont need sudation if im with him i know my dog this was really a very simple job for then to do which wouldnt have taken any more that 10  15 minutes  i arrived and they took the dog away i said that i wanted to go with him to make it easier for the vet and keep the dog calm they wouldnt let me go with the dog despite the receptionist saying that i could the vet comes out to see me 5 minutes later and say oh is bad hes done a right job on that hasnt he well its a cut thats quite deep i said thats why ive brought him here its very straight forward you clean it up a bit of local and stich him up hell be right as rain oh no she said well need to sedate him and its difficult to stich so the price will be 530 i couldnt believe the price they were trying to charge me so i asked how she arrived at that price well thats what we charge to stich a 3cm cut this was a 100  120 job tops and they just wanted to try and exploit the fact that they had the dog there and though i had no other choice well they were wrong i asked them to fetch me my dog the vet then said oh well perhaps youd like me to give them some paid relief no i dont the dog isnt in pain  when leaving the vet said and this is the best bit if you find a vet that will do it cheaper then we will price match unbelievable  anyhow i took my dog home put some local anaesthetic spray on cleaned him up shaved the area and stitched him up myself with my wifes help i didnt have proper suturing thread so once sown up i put a bit of super glue on to help hold it together some antibiotic spray i use for the sheep and hes healed up a treat a couple of doggie treats for him and pint of beer for me and all is well  shame on the vets oh and theyve sent me a bill for the consultation dont think thats going to be paid

on saturday  my cat was brought in and my son was given a quote of 490 for xrays  and treatment  and when he offered to pay the amount in whole  he was informed by whoever was on the front desk  that he should pay only half then  when my cat was examined i received a phone call  from the vet kajani paheerathan that the treatment of xrays etc  was now more than 600 and my cat would need surgery at you dont  as i already explained i couldnt afford 3000 to pay for surgeryand no alternative once again was offered except you will have to look for charitiesok on saturday when my cat was brought home from the vet phoned and gave me some names of charities  when once again i explained that unless there was something in place to pay by instalments id be unable to continue treatment with my cat at email from kajani paheerathan wanting details of where my cat is now being treated  otherwise im going to be reported etc i have been treated in an appalling way by this vet its not every body there
