i had a very good visit today with coco and flo made an appointment and didnt have to wait long  the vet molly crowley was really helpful and very friendly  she explained all the medication for my two dogs and put them both on the same to avoid confusion

melbourne  mercia vets cannock i wouldnt recommend this practice to anyone theyre ok for minor stuff but my dog had to have an operation when i went to collect him i was told the wound had been seeping and itd had to be dressed he was fitted with a buster collar to stop him getting to the wound i stayed downstairs with him the following night i went to bed as he was fine in himself i came down on the sunday morning to find the buster collar had come apart although it was still attached to his collar it was flapping open i saw blood on the floor when i looked hed got to the wound and 2 stitches were out we went immediately to an emergency vet as soon as we walked in the nurse said the buster collar was to small for him and very flimsy he was examined by the vet who said hed be ok till the next morning but to take him back to our vet as the stitches needed to be replaced it resulted in another anesthetic to put it right when i questioned the bill as the further proceedure was due to the wrong sized collar they started to trying lay the blame on me i contacted head office and lodged an official complaint i recieved a refund for the original operation but i wouldve prefered that they had got the initial after care right so my boy didnt have to endure 2 anesthetics which resulted in a much longer recuperation needless to say i changed vets my experience with this practice was way below whats expected the attidude from them when i questioned the care was closed ranksdesperately trying to shift blame what shouldve been a routine simple operation turned into an ordeal for my dog and very expensive for me i personally wouldnt ever take either of my dogs back there

i switched vets as i was finding my original one very expensive i really like the vet and would recommend to friends and family now that you can make appointments its even easier and i have been seen really quickly the staff are all really friendly and clearly love animals ive always been very happy with the service provided in all aspects im not expecting to switch vets any time soon

my dog alfie had an operation at the vet in ashton the facilities they offer are outstanding and the cleanliness is immaculate  out of all the vets my dog has been to this one is by far the best  the staff are compassionate and understanding and are lovely  alfie doesnt like strangers very much but he let the vet cuddle him which calmed him down  would recommend this vet to anyone  was that good the first time we took alfie we registered him there and then because they were brilliant

took my cat who was an adopted stray to have her a checkup and get vaccine injections done as i wasnt sure if they will have been done didnt need an appointment just went in and was seen in about 10 minutes the prices were about 20 cheaper than other vets for the same service so will definitely take her back there in the future
quick efficient dont charge you unnecessarily

its a very clran and  spacious area to waiting with your pet with separate dogs and cats space for piece of mindthere is a grooming and self bathing facility different treatment rooms car parking staff are absolutely welcoming friendly and helpful they just love all animals the vets are professional and listening to owners within reason answering questions dr randy once successfully saved our  dog by removing a tumor of course we cannot say enough thank you for that no need appointment and waiting time is short there are also a coffee machine too for anxious owners its a pleasant place where even dogs feel great and not in fear

we have a poodle called pennyshe is now 14 in the past we have found the service  treatments excellentpenny is loosing weight penny saw giulia tosi on thursday 24th for blood tests i was told we would have results next day this has not happened despite many phone calls to hope who has told me that now the blood may be to old to testlee has told me that the laboratory were not told what tests were required  did not test the blood its now the 28th no one has phoned me backone phone call would help put this right
lovely friendly well trained and accommodating vets would highly recommend

i was one of the first to register when the clinic opened and praised its efficiency to everyone and the initiative practice  well over last few weeks this has gone down massively last week waited 25hrs to be seen then my dog was booked in today for a tooth to be removed checked in was 8am had to wait for over 1 hi to get the dog in then at 320pm get a call to say they had been too busy to carry out the op  i live 5 mins away had to sit and wait for over 45 mins wimpy to collect the dog who had not had anything done to her all day the phone kept ringing the receptionist just loved sitting on floor and playing with the dog as several people waited to be seen to as she was only one on the desk  one lady had been at the clinic 3 hrs and was still not seen with her dog i had to ask twice for my dog as well as several others lots of people around but no clear idea what was going on  what is it lack of staff lack of planning lack of leadership greed for money  well i can see clearly as i drove out the great excitement of the clinic was the arrival of a new banner which 3 staff including medical staff were excitedly erecting outside the clinic  inside was chaos with several unhappy owners being told wait sorry while im clear whats gone on at the clinic as its now grown im off to a proper vet from now on as having spent over 100 and nearly 5 hours in a waiting area i still have a dog that needs treatment and they maybe slightly cheaper than a normal vet the hidden costs and frustrations are clearly out weighted to me  stay away unless you have so much spare time  including the booked time slots of 13pm youd be better off elsewhere

this clinic is the worst treat customers and animals as absolute zero my mother left our cat there for teeth cleaning in the middle of the day she receives a call not to go there because they gave the cat to the owners  we took care of this ginger fluff for more than a year tried to contact the owners with no success and all of a sudden they took our cat without even proof the cat is alive didnt let my mother to say goodbye even this is a disgrace for any vet practice total lack of customer service the worst vet practice ever i know the owners have rights to do anything but you work living beings with feelings and this is monstrous towards customer and pets i will not stop writing about this case because this is unacceptable and monstrous
very nice helpful receptionists and helpful nurses  couldnt find fault

we recently lost our beloved basset hound mabel the practice in warrington were so kind and sensitive to ours and her needs it made an awful experience a little easier i went to pick up her ashes yesterday inside was a card with her paw print a snippet of her fur and a little packet of forget me not seeds to plant in her memory above and beyond thank you all so much at this sad time

the staff are brilliant and attentive they make you feel welcome the atmosphere is amazing they treat your pets with affection the after care is out of this world they ring to see how your pet is doing after the appointment cant thank them enough for what they did for me and my pets x highly recommend xxx
excellent service really caring and supportive staff
having both of my dogs registered with the vet always received top quality service from the members of staff and both dogs are quite relaxed whenever i have to take them

all of the staff here are friendly and helpful nothing is ever too much for them jen has been fantastic with my cat sulley and his recent diagnosis explaining everything in detail and reassuring me i cant fault these guys at all and wouldnt take my pets anywhere else
sophie and all the staff at the vet bristol took excellent care of puss whilst he was poorly highly recommended the vet bristol kati

the vets are very cheap for treatment and booster vaccinations but we waited almost 2 hrs to see a vet my cats were in there carriers for all this time and they were getting quite stressed there should be an appointment system with 2 vets at least you know you are going to get seen within that time apart from that the vet we seen was very good with my pets

absolutely amazing service always up front with diagnosis and cost very sympathetic with a loss have been with the vet with previous dog that i unfortunately lost am now still with them with new dog will always be a favourite because of location and friendliness of staff and vets and services provided

i would highly recommend the vet i have a dog and they always explain in detail the diagnosis given and the cheapest way to medicate  they appreciate that not everyone has the money to cover the cost  there is plenty of room in the waiting room and the reception staff are very pleasant

excellent vets and would recommend to anyone everyone was so welcoming and caring towards my little dog who was very anxious and scared after a traumatic injury not only did they help n look after my dog  but also reassured and took the time to talk

i visited the vet to check my dogs teeth she was treated very quickly and efficiently my dog was cared for and recovered very quickly from a major operation the after care was also very good the total cost was reasonable and i will recommend the vet to anyone
great staff and i have taken both my cats here and both received the best care
my first visit with the kittens was great i found the staff really helpful and friendly and the vet was great too

my dog had a cough wait time online was 15mins waited over half an hour but i did not have an appointment so this was fair i have to take my dog back for xrays to confirm if cause of cough due to condition the vet suspects estimate for xrays no cheaper than the xrays she had 5months ago at vets 4pets who i was advised are a little expensive so far there has been no difference between the vet and vets4pets this is my reason for an average score but my dog is due to go back so this could change

fantastic vets my 11 year old staffie cross had a large skin tag on her hind leg that got to a point where it needed removing  there was another large lump on the other hind leg i asked for that to be removed at the same time i also wanted her teeth cleaned i had been informed by my previous vet practice that they would not do this her teeth clean would cost in the region of 500 then she would need to be put back under for the lump removal again costing roughly 500 i was very apprehensive about having to put her under due to her age the vet offered to do her preblood work there  then to save time  stress for me so if there was anything wrong it could be addressed prior to her coming in for the op on the day of the op plenty of time was taken with me to reassure me i was called to advise that she had been fine  that she had just been put under and it was discovered she needed 4 extractions and that there would be additional cost if it was ok with me i was later called to advise she was out and she was recovering well practically up and walking straight away when i collected her that evening again plenty of time was spent with me to talk me through what happened and the aftercare required 2 lump removals  4 extraction cost 580 2 post op checks included my previous vet had her on antibiotics for the large lump and would charge us a consultation fee each time they wanted us back at the end of the course of antibiotics  only for them to put her on more it was a seemingly never ending circle  which is why i left them and now travel from harlow  i have dealt with 3 different vets and 1 nurse each very friendly with the patience of a saint the girls on reception are fantastic aswell  i recommend this vets and other branches to friends as i find the care amazing the price is very good aswell

a great vets and staff my only gripe is the prices have crept up i took my dogs there due to the great special offers and realistic prices for there services but this isnt the case anymore although some things are marginally cheaper everything else is on a parr with other vets i also found the vets that arent the highest qualified trying to sell me things i do not want or need for my dog i guess they are asked to upsell by the sounds of it  an optional operation they quoted for previously had nearly doubled i feel i will have to shop around in future and wont go out of my way to travel here anymore

excellent staff all though even having booked an appointment was still waiting over an hour to be seen seems like walk ins have priority i was recommended this vet from a friend however i will still return as the advise and customer service i cannot fault
nice clean surgery great coffees lol staff really friendly and efficient

had some test on my dog as she wasnt herself the vet and staff were all very good they took bloods and she had her nails cut while we were there thank goodness she was fine in the end but everyone was very helpful

have been taking my cat there since i got him two years ago and very happy with the service very professional and consistant would recommend prices are affordable also which is great as pets are not cheap specially when ill staff are friendly and helpful will continue to use the vet
would recommend to any person with a animal of any sort very clean very polite and very friendly staff  try it yourself yo would love it
nothing to say they are amazing

superb service  the walkin option was efficient with less than 2 hours to wait each of the 3 times ive visited  my first visit i arrived first thing on a friday morning and waited nearly 2 hours but both subsequent visits we less than 30 mins waiting to be seen  at first i was concerned on arrival to see a different vet than before but was immediately reaassured to see the level of detail passed on by the first person i saw and the complerte understanding of the course of treatment and what the second visit checkup needed to look at  consultations are very reasonably priced and while meds are more expensive than i was anticipating they arent too bad the separated waiting areas for dogs and catssmaller animals is also well designed  genuine interest in the animals shown and a smile from all staff  even on a sunday

was very good when i first started going there but prices have shot up the low pricing was what made them stand out from the rest also appointment times was a waste of time i made an appointment for 330 and didnt get seen till 4pm not nuch point making one

we have been using the vet for the last few years we have been very pleased with the service offered  we have 5 dogs in their care we even had to use another the vet in southampton while away on holiday for an emergency operation we could not fault them  this was on a sunday the after care and follow up treatment was then completed by the vet nottingham our usual practice we like to if possible to see jessica but all of the vets have offered excellent caring treatment

generally i am very happy with this clinic  when i visited the clinic i found the staff most helpful and their fees are most reasonable  the time recently when my cat was treated i was unable to be there as i was ill and as i was concerned about the cat my friend charles lucy took her there for me  the vet cleaned up her coat which fur was matted and treated her for worms as far as i was told  the vet also cleared up her dead fleas which i had not noticed and treated her for these  she was found to be in reasonably good health for an older cat  the fee was most reasonably so i gave a donation of 10 as well  i was concerned that she was eating a lot more than usual but that could have been due to the cold weather but i am still somewhat concerned as she still seems to want to eat a lot and she is a small cat  she sleeps outside at night in a proper cat kennel i bought for her as my close friend angela is allergic to cat fur  i intend to buy a cat basket for next winter so she can have a sleep indoors away from the settees and chairs and not sleep on these during the day if she wishes  she has been a very good mouser but recently two mice were killed in a trap i put in the cupboard under the stairs  she normally catches and kills these in the garden but these two mice may well have come from next door via the floorboards   i will contact the clinic about her eating so much soon if she continues to eat a lot when the weather is warmer  i was most relieved to have the assistance of the clinic and to know she is good for her age
fantastic relaxing and good for pet great staff
fantastic service great to be able to monitor waiting times on line most definitely recommend

super friendly helpful knowledgeble and caringeverthing you need in a local vet

saw a just qualified vet they had to get confirmation on what she was prescribing to my dog and wasnt strong enough to be making the decisions would have been better if she was being chaperoned i took my dog to the vets with having diarrhoea they gave me liquid wormer which was very hard to get down him and after googling the medication can also cause loose bowels also gave me a probiotic which can also cause loose bowels then told me if he is still having loose bowels to bring him back in three days as it will cost a lot of money to sort him out i want to know why would they prescribe medication that can cause diarrhoea to a dog that already has it the vet nottingham shauna holmes
very pleasant really helpful and very efficient made the visit as painless as possible for our dog

its a very clean vets very spacious the staff are pleasant and the vet was very professional and my dog seemed to like her which means a lot the price was fair what i have been told that it will cost to do the procedure jb

really good open seven days a week and excellent service great value and considerably better than my previous vet have and will recommend them

the best vet you could ever go to i have been ripped off over and over again by vets but when i discovered the vet i told them that the previous vet said it would cost me 2300 to sort my dogs problem out which they said was cancer i knew they were wrong the vets charged me 225 for all the same treatment and the operation with i must say fantastic after service which was all in with the fee after the operation which was a complete success the dog was fine and has a new lease of life all because the vets price was affordable and now a suffering dog that i thought i could not afford to make better is like a spring chicken thanks to the love affection fairness and dedication of the vets 5 stars all day long for me thank you

welcoming clean and calm no hidden extras and your furry friend im sure will be treated with the same 5 stars mine was i would highly recommend every member of staff clearly has an animal friendly way with them as you hear no stress from any consulting rooms organised  choices of walk in for those unplanned for needs and appointments and you are seen on time for those follow ups that maybe required reasonable pricesestimates which you can agree in advance and no pushiness its great

the receptionists were such lovely people they are the only reason i gave 2 stars i traveled out of my way when there were 2 closer clinics because i thought i was giving my pet the best care turns out the vet didnt have any idea what was wrong with him even though it was quite obvious that there was something going on with his renal function especially after the blood test results came back  which were misread but my pet also had the symptoms of addisons disease but the vet did not run the test for it i found this unbelievable luckily upon my urging he was given some antiinflammatories and then also prescribed antibiotics antibiotics are quite common to be prescribed especially when wbc is up i felt like this vet was shooting in the dark like a first year student and it would have been a waste of my time and money had i been able to get prescriptions or blood tests without going to a vet clinic
the best vets practice weve been to helpful caring professional they dont rush you through the appointment take their time to make sure you understand no question is to small highly  recommend them

i had an email from the vet this morning asking to review my latest visit so here goes my dog has been registered here since she was a puppy and id always been happy with the care and cost of consultations treatment etc though lately prices have shot up and i havent been all too happy with the last few visits the most recent being i had concerns about her bladder which a vet prescribed her medication for as she thought she may have a weak bladder but didnt tell me anything about the medication such as side effects or even the cost i couldnt believe it when i went to reception to pay and a small bottle that would last only 10 days cost me over 40 i got home and researched the said medication online to find horrendous side effects and also found it to cost far less for a much larger bottle there was no way i was going to give my dog a potentially lethal medication when the vet wasnt even 100 certain that she had a weak bladder in the first place i emailed the vets to politely ask if there was an alternative cheaper and less risky medication to try instead and if i could return the unopened medication for a refund i was told that a vet would call me the very next day to discuss further options but told they wouldnt be able to refund me for the medication which i wasnt going to use and still havent used the next day i made sure to have my phone with me at every possible opportunity and no one rang in fact i didnt get a phone call until 10 days later which i missed and had a very pointless voicemail left im now down over 40 for a bottle of medication i will never use oh and to top it all off my dog doesnt even have a weak bladder after all so im  extremely glad i didnt give her the medication

i left my old vet who i thought i was very happy with to come here as we adopt uninsurable animals and the pricing was better after our first couple of visits with a very poorly cat i moved all my animals here and havent looked back fantastic service great staff and really forward thinking treatment that most vets havent even thought of being open on weekends and bank holidays is an excellent bonus and being able to turn up without an appointment means you really can go when it suits you cannot fault them and i am there alot

where do i begin after my pregnant cat went missing for two days and then came home bleeding regularly we rushed her to the vet in ashton normally we use another vet but decided to give them a try we arrived at 1815 on 2202 when we got back to see the vet he seemed very concerned about the fact that they were closing soon he gave our cat a quick look over and then said there was nothing he could do that night as he didnt have time he gave her an injection of antibiotic and told us to make an appointment for the morning while on reception paying for the visit and booking for the morning the vet came out and said to the receptionist that he had to leave and she was upset that he was not finishing with the other customers still in the shop we were then told to just show up at 8 instead of making an appointment  when i showed up at 8 the following morning i waited an hour to see the vet watching 2 customers who showed up after me get served first when i got into see the vet she told me that she thought that the pregnancy had gone wrong and that we would need to spay her or put her down then gave me a long list of other potential fatal things that could be a factor i opted for the surgery and left my cat with the vet  i received a call at 1242 that afternoon informing me that when they tried to administer anisthetic that my cat had taken a turn for the worse i was told that after doing emergency blood work which i had agreed to if necessary that her blood levels were not good and they could not do the surgery i was told that she most likely had a viral blood infection and the chance of her survival was very unlikely and that the only alternative was blood transfusion that would cost thousands and would only have a very slim chance of helping  i informed the vet that i would like to know the costs and options as i was not willing to put her down the vet infomed me that she would phone some specialists and get back to me within the hour as time was critical i was in harrogate with work at this time which is two hours away from the ashton store i left immediately and picked up my partner from work as she was in pieces having heard the news that we would most likely be putting our cat to sleep  when we arrived at the vet we told the receptionist who we were and he said he would inform the vet this was at 1600 and i still hadnt received the call that i was told i would get one hour from when we initially spoke we were left waiting for roughly an hour at which point i asked the receptionist what was going on and he informed me the vet was making the calls to the specialists and would be with us soon clearly she had not made any calls until we showed up to find out what was going on after being told time was critical i find this unacceptable finally we spoke with the vet who said after speaking to a few specialists that the surgery was now completely possible and that it was unlikely that all the other fatal possibilities i was told were likely were a factor we asked to see her as we at this point believed she was on the verge of death due to the vets description when they brought her out she was awake alert and seemingly in relatively good shape nowhere near the cat fighting for her life we were lead to believe  unfortunately now that so much time had passed she would need to be taken to an after hours clinic for the surgery i was initially quoted 100 for the surgery and had already paid 27 the night before i was given a bill for 130 and was told it was because they had to do a blood test so now im 150 in and still have nothing to show for it this is already more than the cost quoted for the problem to be solved  we were told to go straight to the after hours vet only up the road so we headed straight there this was about 1800 they told us they had not yet received the email with all the information from the vet which i was told was being sent as i was leaving i had to ring and remind the receptionist that he needed to send the email as we were leaving the receptionist explained that they are a vet during the day and a separate company operate after hours so we would have to pay the normal rate for them to care for her until 1900 we had already dropped her off so were charged a further 22 they informed us that they had told the vet we could avoid this fee if we just came at 1900 this was never conveyed to us i was completely embarrassed as i was under the impression we were only dropping our cat off and the receptionist had to stop us at the door and tell us we couldnt leave without paying we were also not told we would have to leave a deposit of 200 we were then quoted 6001000 for the procedure as it was out of hours this was only necessary due to the fact that the initial vet did not have the knowledge to perform the procedure correctly  the surgery was performed overnight by pets999 who were very attentative and kept me informed the whole time they said there was no reason why the surgery would not be successful and were confident she would be fine  the surgery went fine and there were no complications she is now home and recovering thanks to pets999 and no thanks to and in spite of the complete lack of competency of the vet  myself and my partner have been put through complete hell the last 48 hours after being made to believe there was no hope for our beloved cat actually being advised to put her down and then having to pay astronomical prices of over 800 for out of hours urgent care that wouldnt have been necessary if the vet had a more experienced competent staff  i never once felt like anyone at the vet cared for my cats welfare or our emotional state i was charged more than i was quoted for something that wasnt even done and got left with a huge bill  i am now wondering how to pay my bills and i will never use or recommend the vet to anyone we were referred by friends and will be letting all of them know of our experience

wish there were more stars to give i would highly recommend only discovered the vet by word of mouth every member of staff we met were professional kind caring and friendly i especially like the walk in service and the longest wait i had was 20 minutes also the clinic was clean bright and fresh excellent value for money with unrivalled service and care many thanks to the team at morden

i would definitely recommend the vet the staff are very helpful  informative they obviously know their stuff my cats have always been treated with both care  professionalism not as expensive as most vets which is a plus when you have more than one animal

i really like and trust the vet in waltham forest  the staff are friendly and clearly care about our pets  however i was upset at my last visit as the nurse who vaccinated my cat did not give a clean injection  she had difficulty inserting the needle and a little vaccination fluid was left in the fur afterwards  my cat who never usually bites or growls bit me and growled and was clearly in pain  the nurse said my cat had tough skin but my cat has been injected on other occasions including by a vet at the vet where the process has been smooth and pain free  it upset me to see my cat in pain and then be told that the reason was her tough skin  i will continue using the vet as i do believe this to be a very good practice  however i may ensure that i see a vet rather than the nurse when injections etc are needed ps  the nurse was otherwise very nice

i was on the doorstep at 8am in floods of tears as my cat was in respiratory distress they ushered her straight through and immediately saved her she has pneumonia and was gravely ill 24hrs later after intensive care she was home and is now doing great many thanks

my dog hurt her paw the vet carried out a small procedure under local anaesthetic without me booking an appointment i just turned up with my dog in the evening the vet appeared to be very knowledgeable about the bread which is not common and treated my dog excellently the procedure was a success and we dont have to return great service
lovely staff good value for money

my dog has been very unwell since december so ive made several visits to the vet recently the reception staff are lovely always friendly and welcoming and the vets that we have seen have been spot on in their diagnosis every time i do feel frustrated when i see there is a bit of a queue but i have never waited more than 40 minutes even on a busy day it is worth the wait for the excellent care that follows and i thank the vets from the bottom of my heart my pet would not be with us now were it not for the vigilance and experience of the staff
such a friendly vets no need to book an appointment  very reasonablly priced and teddy is always treated like a king wouldnt take him anywhere else

the vets are great and have a great knowledge and our helpful  the area that needs improving from my experience would be the front of house reception  they could be happier when greeting customers  i know they have a lot going on and see things that may be upsetting sometimes they are distracted by other staff when your talking to them  i checked the waiting time online prior to going as my dog gets very nervous and upset and of course i wanted to limit this only to be told that the times online were incorrect my question would be whats the point of having waiting times online  as a suggestion for better customer serviceexperience a waiting time clock on the wall behind reception could be put up which can be updated then customer can choose if they want to wait or come back

i did have a bad start with the vet when i brought my puppy in for its initial health check i was told it could have ataxia and needed all the mri scans cat scans etc that would cost thousands then after making external enquiries and changing the puppys diet i was advised that this was no the case my puppy was given bakers by its breeder and this was an inappropriate diet it put me under a lot of stress and worry however i have been using the vet again after a year and my experience has been excellent my recent health visit and yearly boosters went so well and the vet gave me some comprehensive advice for breeding i think i just had a bad start which was unfortunate
my dog was very vocal causing a disturbance but the staff were great and got is in a room really fast thankyou

very helpful and careing staff would and have recommended to other pet owners keep up the good work well done all

sadly our experience is not was not good when our dog went in for a routine castration operation which he should have been recovered from within 2 days he was he was extremely unwell and would not drink and when we took him out he would not walk when we took him back they wanted to charge us another 18000 which we could not afford i instead gave he water by syringe he had antibiotics he took nearly 3 weeks to recover he was a perfect healthy dog when he went in i believe he was discharged way to early as i had to carry him out and there excuse was he was bruised i also felt they should realised he was not right before they released him after all they are supposed to be the qualified vets i will not be using for again

the day we took our cat samson to the vet he was really poorly he had not been eating properly for a while and was losing weight we were getting worried as hes an old boy our wait was a little longer than is typical but it was spent talking to other visitors so went by quite quickly eventually it was our turn the vet gave him a thorough examination after i had explained samsons problems he diagnosed the cause straight away and treated him with a steroid injection he explained that he could need further treatment if the injection did not work but that this was the best course of action to take first we are pleased to say the injection did the trick samson is back to his old self eating well and putting on weight all thanks to the vet we are happy to give the vet a 5 star a1 rating  mrmrs t moulton

the treatment our two cats get at the vet is very good the facilities are very clean spacious and full of light every member of staff is more than nice from receptionist to the vets themselves the reason for the 3 stars is the fact that every visit to this vet means at least a 30  45 minute wait why because they are adamant in not having a booking system so no matter at what time or what day you go you can always expect a long wait i think the managers should realise that this is not an nhs for animals this is privately funded by us and we do not want to wait 45 minutes for our pets to be seen if they could improve that they would definitively get my 5 stars

usually we have a very positive and professional experience at the vet however this time i am not able to say that my cat was given advocate  inappropriately resulting in him being able to lick it off and the next day he had issues with mobility in his back legs falling over when he tried to walk i had to keep him inside until this wore off it was very frightening and upsetting to see him like this my daughter did not ask the nurse to apply advocate we are very capable of doing this ourselves she did this without asking and i was then charged 9 for her doing so the waiting time was over 2hrs and when my daughter asked when she would be seen she was told that she was next then two others were allowed to be seen before her all in all very disappointing and unprofessional i have to say that when i complained the manager was very understanding and refunded  the amount charged for putting advocate on my cat offered a free consultation with a vet to check if our cat was ok and investigated  the incident i have been assured this will not happen again and i am willing to give the vet  another chance

i have taken my two kittens to the vet twice now for their jabs they have to have two each the first time we registered and did have to wait a while approx 2 hours to see a vet because it was their first visit and first jabs we did not mind waiting lots of cute dogs and cats to keep you entertained also rather than having to make appointments we prefer to wait because our kittens can be difficult to get into their carry cases so wouldnt want to make an appointment and then have to cancel because of this this way is much more flexible the second visit we only waited 20 minutes because their jabs were with the nurse i have so far found all the reception staff to be very pleasant and friendly dealing well with issues and complaints overheard not complaints from me and answering queries over the phone with good knowledge the vet and nurse we saw were both really friendly good with the kittens who were very nervous and offered us good advice on how to help them be more confident tomorrow they go in for their neutering which i am nervous about but the staff have been reassuring and i am very pleased so far

so far we have visited this vet twice with our kitten and on both occasions despite booking in at reception they have forgotten us from the list on the first occasion we patiently waited 15hrs thinking it was busy and they were short staffed when we eventually questioned reception we were told that they had called us but we didnt answer both my partner and i know for a fact this was not the case but receptionist was very defensive we eventually got seen and put it behind us as thinking it was just a bad day and a sad kitten being boxed in for so long however on our 2nd visit 4 weeks later history repeated itself this time we had been waiting an hour not thinking it would happen again but sure enough we approached reception only to be told that the other receptionist who had checked us in had put us on the wrong list by accident the receptionist was not apologetic whatsoever and had a bad attitude 10 minutes later we were seen they should invest in a screen system to see when you are next or at least have your name appear when its your turn definately left a negative feeling for us even an apology would have been something now considering looking elsewhere and paying the extra for a better service

im in virginia and signing up for this vet service was the best decision ive ever made i have pure breads and had no idea how finicky their ailments are constantly battling utis ear infections allergies sinus infections lets be frank we know how to identify all these as the owner it is no hassle at all fairly user friendly interface and quick appointments in virginia they are allowed to prescribe based on tele visit also check your own state because i wouldnt have signed up otherwise i send pictures as proof and my pups have to be present but im out of this paying 80 for the vet to even look at them and get to keep them at home at the same time  prior to signing up this was the case in addition to having to schedule the appointment then request off work usually i have the regular vet still for annual exams but wont be leaving anytime soon this service due to ease of access  savings and time spent highly recommend

any doctor i have talked to seemed knowledgeable and willing to help me and my cats was told that if my treatments didnt work to contact them again and we could try a different treatment very kind and right to the point after just a few visits the 1 year subscription has already paid for itself in my eyes as i would have spent double if not triple or more at an in person vet for the minor issues i was seeking treatment for also they did not jump straight into changing my cats diets like many vets do and they actually prescribed me medication and probiotics to add to my cats food keep in mind that any treatments meds are not included in the annual price or the monthly price  those are an additional cost even though they arent included they are very affordable and ship right to your door i believe that they will even price match if you find a medicationtreatment cheaper somewhere else you can also get pet insurance and add up to 5 pets catsdogs only and not have to pay an additional fee for the other pets to be added

ive been using dutch for about a year now i was on a monthly membership plan but switched to annual i like the convenience as its easy to book a nextday virtual appointment for a consult with an accredited vet rather than driving down to the nearest vet and waiting for hours to be seen dutch also has convenient 10min appointments that do not cost anything other than the monthly  annual membership fees they also ship meds to your door and they are very reasonably priced this is also a useful service for getting prescription strength flea and tick prevention treatments most in person vet clinics upcharge in order to dispense these treatments in clinics and unless you specifically request to forward the prescription to a pharmacy of choice they generally do not do it then theres the hassle of requesting the pharmacy to dispense and ship it to your house which i find to be a longer process im all about convenience and getting quality results with less wait time if youre a morning person like me and do not have time to take your pet to an in person appointment because you work during normal business hours you can get away with a 10min video call with the pet which works if an inperson examination is not required i highly recommend this service to all my friends who are pet parents

i recently had the pleasure of consulting with dr barnes via zoom and i couldnt be more impressed with the level of care and professionalism provided from start to finish the experience was seamless and reassuring  she demonstrated exceptional expertise and a genuine love for animals despite the virtual setting she managed to provide a thorough and insightful assessment of my pets condition her ability to explain complex medical information in an easytounderstand manner was greatly appreciated and their compassionate approach made the entire process feel incredibly personal and attentive  the convenience of the zoom consultation was an added bonus making it easy to get the expert advice i needed without having to travel dr barnes was prompt thorough and very responsive to all my questions and concerns she even provided followup recommendations and resources to ensure the best care for my pet moving forward  i highly recommend dr barnes to anyone seeking highquality veterinary care thank you dr barnes for your exceptional care and support

my cat is now 3 years old and had gotten her second uti i swear i am not a bad parent her sister never gets these and i guess she is just prone to them the first two times were extremely stressful because i had to keep her overnight at the local vets because they were not able to extract the urine each time it was around 200400 it ended up coming back 4 months later because i had switched her food up regardless my anxiety spiked knowing i would have to take her through all of that and decided to try dutch instead i was able to obtain a vet appointment on a sunday at 6pm which i just signed up 3 hours prior when normally all vets are closed and booked up i explained to her my cats symptoms and within minutes she prescribed me the same medicine my local vet did i paid for overnight shipping so it came out to 60 this was all way cheaper and quicker and it allowed my cat to not be stressed through the process im so happy i found dutch it is like a virtual care for pets and its so modern and easy i was nervous at first but i am writing this to say definitely use dutch and skip the hassle and extra money sent by going to a local vet i did call my original vet the next day to say the exact same thing and what do you knowshe said she has to be taken in and get her urine extracted so it was exactly what i thought it would be and i am glad my instincts were right thank you dutch

recently california 1124 revised the law and allows telehealth for animals including prescribing medications  this is excellent news   we care for our animals like family there is a shortage of vets in certain parts of the state more than others  this is progress  however it is one step forward one giant step backwards with dutch  on the eve of july 3rd i was told by my doggy day care that my puppy had puppy warts or pappalivirus and he was quarantined and cannot return until he comes back  my vet an animal hospital though closed early for the day and was closed for the holiday all the way through the hospital  as an aside no hospital should be called such that closes for 4 days i thought i have options and used dutch    i was prepared of course for it to be harder than it looks as one cannot just sign up for a one time visit one must become a member  fine  i paid the membership fee and booked a visit for 910 am on the 4th   for some reason they tell you to plan for 30 minutes  you get 10 minutes if youre lucky  the vet joined 2 minutes late and ended 2 minutes early was not friendly engaging empathetic or even interested  instead i got a prescription for antiinflammatory which i told her in the call i needed transferred to costco   she said nothing in response    costco was closed the 4th so i sent several messages through the chat system with the phone number of the costco and planned to pick up on the 5th   when i go to check on the status i dont even see my message recorded  i call the phone number  no one answers  i leave more messages nothing  i notice a box on the website that says order your medications which i was ignoring because in the united states of america prescriptions do not have to be filled by a specific pharmacy although often one does for insurance benefits but prescriptions transfer  ask anyone who has had their eyes examined  optometrists everywhere fought this one hard but there is a very good reason your eye doctor is not an employee of your eye glass store  they still have their tactics but prescriptions are required to be given without a request for transfer before one even asks  this is not the case at dutchcom  no there is a separate form one must complete an additional 5 fee and 24 day processing time   how ridiculous  this is pain medication i am not ordering  from an online pharmacy and waiting for shipping for pain medicine  this is the most perfect example of a company that puts profits before animals   prescriptions should be called in to any pharmacy requested for same day fill if possible without a fee  not doing so undermines the entire ca law which is intended to expand access to care and not delay suffering   my complaint is that the fee was not disclosed clearly enough and the delay was not mentioned and it is just a bad faith practice that is evidence that this company does not have the best interest of animals as their mission and by doing so will not thrive  companies that seek to undermine progress made by new laws by intentionally increasing delays when the law was intended to reduce the delays are not companies that last  certainly not in california where consumer protection comes first   my ask of dutch is to do the right thing before more laws and fines are implemented against your company  doing business in california is a privilege not a right  i made a second appointment with a vet who i quote told me he was breaking the rules by calling it in himself but did it  how sad is that dutch  a vet had to break the rules to do the right thing for an animal who was suffering  he deserves an award a raise and not admonishment   answer your messages your phones  eliminate transfer fees build 2 mins into the  visit to call a script in  run a respectable business for animals that puts their welfare first or find a new business
smart quick enjoyable to work with

i signed up for dutch services and scheduled our very first virtual visit appointment the appointment began right on time the veterinarian was very nice professional and very helpful she prescribed a rx treatment plan for my dog following the end of my appointment all i had to do was go in my dutch account add the rx medications to my cart and check out i could also message her through my account with any follow up questions and received responses in a very timely manner this was the easiest vet visit my dog and i have ever had i did not have to load a very travel and people anxious dog into my vehicle to travel 20 miles then try to get my dog out of the car and make her go into a strange and scary to her place that makes her feel even more terrified let people she doesnt know touch her making her more scared and anxious then try to get her back into the vehicle and travel back home 20 miles and wait a hour or two after getting back home for her anxiety nerves and terror to subside all the while she is wondering why her human would make her feel this way dutch veterinary services is such a complete non stressful option all the way around that allows me to maintain the important sense of trust safety and security between my dog and i while still receiving great veterinary care vs the other route i will continually choose dutch for my dogs from now on unless a absolute hands on need arises i only gave 4 stars because i feel improvement could and should be made on prescription order fulfillment and shipping speeds allowing for affordable options to make it faster than 57 days before receiving prescription medications

dutch has been extremely helpful to me i adopted a kitten from a somewhat shady rescue and he brought ringworm fungus into our house my dog who has serious lifetime skin issues was very susceptible and broke out in lesions dr hardin was available to answer questions within a few hours at most which was great because my dog reacted very badly to the first antifungal and had to be switched to another one and also be put on antidiarrheal and gi prescription food after trying bland diet with no success i had a lot of questions about this fungus and the doctor was very responsive imagine getting that service from your local vet not gonna happen he didnt try to upsell me either he told me ways to save money and none of the products are mandatory you only add the ones you want to your cart the only reason i gave 4 rather than 5 stars is that when you transfer a prescription to a local pharmacy if you need it very fast the process is a little sloppy but that could also be on the local pharmacys end i will still use my local vet for annuals and things that need to be seen in person but i plan to upgrade to the annual dutch subscription at my next paycheck for someone with 3 cats and a dog and an average income dutch is a lifesaver

dutch is honestly one of the best telehealth vet services ive come across its so convenient being able to see the vet and get everything i need prescribed right there and then

it was nice to be able to get a quick and convenient appointment not to mention a whole lot cheaper than the standard vet visit the appointment alone at the vet just to be seen is usually more than double the price got the peace of mind with having a vet answer all my questions and set up a treatment plan for my dog there was a mail delivery issue and i never received the initial product their customer service team was helpful though and able to reship the product so my dog could get the treatment she needed

i ordered meds for my cat on 22324 i emailed on 2292024 and asked about the meds they emailed back saying i did not order through the treatment plan so i reordered through that they also said they would expedite my order i emailed yesterday and today still no answer from them they did refund the 1st order i had to redo still waiting for my meds
great detailed information that the vet shared with me went over medicines and set up a 6 week appt for follow up

i bought an annual membership in october everytime i try to log in to order my dogs meds it states i need to open an account and shows me pricing i have tried emailing them using the number given to text for questions today i have been on hold to chat for almost 5 hours my dog needs the meds anyone else with this issue any tricks to speak with a human

one star because i havent received my order yet only got a tracking number after i emailed twice i placed my pets order 0222 it is now 32 and still havent received it the tracking number i just received yesterday says usps is waiting on package and not in their possession yet super slow service ill update my review once i actually get my order if it ever shows up im super disappointed and regretting signing up with them

i was beyond impressed with the service i received during two different phone callsappointments i made the veterinarians were very professional and informative we healed my baby and that is the most important thing of all

do not think this will get your pet meds quickly your pet could actually worsen while you wait for their arrival through dutch  my puppy clearly had an ear infection i was on vacation with him visiting family so we werent by his vet and i tried to utilize dutch to expedite some ear meds for him i paid the subscription fee 36 dollars and was seen by a vet who prescribed him ear medication the vet told me his med would not arrive for a couple days with standard shipping so i selected the rush shipping option which cost 20 dollars in addition to the med cost roughly 65 dollars  despite selecting rush shipping the medication wasnt even set to arrive until march 4th which wasnt told to me until march 1st despite placing the order on the 23rd almost two weeks before my dog would have the medication despite rush shipping and additional money spent theyre also a site that only does email support so good luck getting any complaint addressed  i had to go see a vet in person to get him ear meds quicker waste of time money and effort just go see a vet in person

i had an online visit 226 for my dogs ear infection and paid for the medications as soon as they were prescribed i was not given the option to expedite the shipping but i reached out to dutch the next day to ask when i would receive my dogs medication and they allowed me to pay an extra 30 for rush shipping great its thursday 229 and i just received the box of medication and the main medication the mometamax is not in the box and they are closed horrible experience so far they just take your money and do what they want and theres nothing you can do i recommend to stay away

i love the ease of ordering flea and tick meds from dutchs vets i also love that i can do a virtual appointment with the vets for most things this is so much less stressful for my pets the price for an annual plan is unbeatable one local vet visit is almost the price that i pay for a year of dutch and can have up to 5 pets covered with unlimited virtual visits also the vets are very friendly and caring they respond quickly to questions and pharmacy requests as well i even requested flea and tick meds on a weekend not expecting to get an answer until monday i was pleasantly surprised to receive an answer and have the meds in my cart within a few hours of my request on sunday i havent been recommending dutch to all of my friends with pets

i am beyond disappointed my dog has a terrible ear infection ordered my medication they canceled it and never even told me emailed them they said i need to approve the treatment plan let alone theres no where for me to approve it so beyond frustrated found out after reading these reviews that this has  happened to multiple people be careful as this is a scam

i think a lot of these negative reviews are from people who are expecting emergency vet level care from an online consultation dr fleming was amazing my cat had conjuntivitis and my regular vet couldnt see him for 3 weeks she was able to prescribe meds and called them in to my local walgreens within an hour  this service is not for emergencies or severe illness or injury its for minor things that occur that you would take your pet to the vet for  fantastic experience i have an appointment for followup with my regular vet in 3 weeks

dutch is a great service  my dog suffers from skin allergies and ear infections regularly the office visit fee at the vet is ridiculous especially when you have to go often  i am thrilled with the service dutch provides  its easy convenient and i can have both of my dogs on the same account without paying an extra fee  the medicine was filled and i had it in 4 days  they even match prices  the dr really listened to my input as who knows my pet better than me  i really appreciated that he took the time to listen  that doesnt happen much today  he may have the knowledge and education that i dont have but im with my dog every day and having a vet that understands that is important to me  dutch gets a 5 out of 5 from me

i love dutch  its super easy  convenient  plus it saves me money not having to pay for the vet visit which has gotten so expensive  dutchs customer service is excellent fast friendly  professional  im so happy i found dutch for my dogs  i joined connected with a vet  had flea meds prescribed same day  its amazing  thanks dutch

this is a scam site the vets dispense homeopathic meds found on youtube videos i had a consultation for my dog with collapse trachea at 840am  as of 600pm my dog is choking for air and meds  never prescribed call site and they are closed until monday the license vet just graduated and working for scam site until their license is revoked i filed a complaint with florida state about this company no one wants the shady abuse of this company

very convenient and helpful vets and customer support have been awesome so far price match guarantee was honored as promised and the yearly subscription has already paid for itself in one telehealth visit for one of our four covered pets one subscription covers up to 5 pets

love this service it literally saved me hundreds and the meds were reasonably priced i highly recommend it was so simple and easy and 90 for a year you cant beat that

awesome service better than your vet should of did it years ago

processed and to confirm the order i go back to the website and when i try to log in i get a screen asking me to sign up for an account frustrating but i understand technology isnt perfect contact a scam  do not use after reading the reviews i decided to give dutch a chance i had just moved to a new area and the wait to see a vet was over 2 months so my dogs were running out of worm preventative thats the only thing are needed had a consultation x2 with a dr sanger she said she was going to prescribe something for intestinal parasites not for heartworm for which a blood test is needed  that i do understand then she prescribed the dogs simparica 40 x 2 dogs  when it arrived it turned out it is to prevent fleas and ticks which are not a problem in my frozenover state i requested a refund  nada requested an rx for worm prevention and they recommended i buy panacur  which is an overthecounter med you can get from amazon  and it is used to kill worms after the dog has already been infected i asked for a refund again  never heard back so now i am still without what was promised to me and also 250 poorer

cant speak highly enough of this company tellhealth visit with dr prescribed meds  sent and my puppy is so much better they recommended a behavioral center in my town and are refilling rxs for 6 months until i can get in just a great experience all around and the dr actually spent the time with me that my local vet never had

if i could give zero stars i would i had a visit with a very condescending vet who kept insisting she couldnt treat my dog and said he needed a behaviorist instead and dutch doesnt offer that this is after i signed up for a yearlong membership because behavioral issues were highlighted as an area they treat on their website and my dog has a fear of both the car and going to the vet in person he is already working with a certified behaviorist trainer but that person is not a prescriber the vet basically said she couldnt treat him and what i heard is that his fear aggression problems makes him a bad dog and we cant throw prozac at the problem i was not asking for that i was seeking an addition to his overall treatment plan because it takes a village and fear aggression in one of the problems prozac can help with and its even advertised that way on the dutch website then after the horrible visit where the vet refused to help me i get all these emails telling me theres a treatment plan and items in my cart but theres no plan and nothing in the cart this is a horribly misleading and disappointing service bordering on false advertising and downright fraud dont advertise virtual vet visits and then have vets say i cant treat your dog on a virtual call also ive never encountered a colder person who knew less about dogs
awesome service everyone ive talked to is very nice and knowledgeable and helpful if i didnt need my regular vet i would just use this but there are things you unfortunately need to be seen for

youve got to be patient and youve got to be persistent at communicating via text because thats the only way they communicate with you aside from the vet visit you have via video with one of their vets for me there were times when i wasnt very pleased about texting to get my messages of importance through to them but i was persistent and eventually i was able to solve my problem my problem was that i paid for the subscription for my pet via paypal and then i paid for the meds prescribed by the vet at dutch using my credit card and the charge did not go through paypal dutch informed me that i needed to pay in order to receive the meds for my cat i was like wait a minute i know i paid because the money came out of my account so i contacted them via text and was told the same thing then i went to my bank account and took a screenshot and sent them a shot of the money being deducted by them the person who was texting with me checked on the payment and find out that they did in fact receive my payment but admitted that some kind of glitch on their end prevented my payment from showing up the thing is they made it right what they did was they expedited my cats medicine and they overnighted it now that is the kind of service i think i deserve when ive been done a disservice thank you  dutchcom my cat is feeling better already how could i ask for more im glad that i bought a subscription and i am also glad the vet suggested an allergy medication formulated especially for cats i now own a year supply of it and the cost was very reasonable view full review users recommendation texting is the only way that their customer service works with you they are persistent but no suggestions are made so youll need to be able to think about things for yourself i thought i made both payments with paypal but found out that i had not after investigating how the second payment came out of my bank account
excellent customer service they are very helpful and easy to work with i can always get an appointment same day only downside which is not their fault is that you do have to wait for your rx
professional and caring vets excellent service easy to make appointments and obtain prescriptions if needed

what a great way to get help for your pet 247 video chat was simple and worked well even for a novice like me quick service pharmacy readily available professional and caring doctors they follow up too see progress or if your needs for your pet were satisfied  this allows for those of us that have to rely on others to get around cant drive or home bound cant  say enough

update dutch has tried to have this review removed saying my review is not based on an actual experience how dare they the messages with them are in my account and i have emails with them to back it up this is a shady business  i had an appointment scheduled and logged into the zoom link 3 minutes before the appointment was scheduled to start the vet never showed up i waited in the zoom waiting room for 40 minutes before i had to leave for a work meeting i messaged the vet 3 times on the online account messages during the time that i waited and didnt get a response until an hour and a half later by that time i had already received a response from customer service telling me that the vet had a system issue that prevented them from logging in however when i finally got the message from the vet she said did you log into the zoom meeting with the link provided and then must have been a technology glitch no indication that she had a system issue as customer service told me in this day and time if there was a problem on her end she should have been able to call text or email me saying so at the time instead of me wasting 40 minutes of my work day waiting around there is no excuse for a no show on the vets end especially when they tell you in the confirmation that the vets time is valuable and you will be charged if you miss the appointment well my time is valuable too what do i get since the vet missed the appointment

update similar to some other reviews here dutch contacted trustpilot to have this review removed claiming that it was fake and not based on an actual customer experience i sent trustpilot proof of service and they verified my review as authentic dutch is spending their time trying to remove legitimate reviews instead of spending time improving their service shameful  ive never written a negative review about anything in my life however i feel the need to warn other people about the horrible service i received through dutch i actually had a great experience with my vet dr brewer however dutch actually put the health of my pet at risk due to incompetent customer service  the vet prescribed two drugs for my dog one of which was prozac i received the first shipment of medication on may 12 2023 because i only receive 30 pills at a time i would need the next shipment to be delivered by june 12 2023 realizing that the website said my recurring medication order would be placed on june 10 2023 i contacted dutch support on june 6 2023 to ensure the medication would arrive in time if not i wanted dutch to do rush shipping which i was willing to pay for during the following two days i was bounced around from person to person through email and text i could not get anyone in customer service to properly address my concern finally a person named jen promised that she would try to overnight the shipment on june 8 2023 its now june 15 2023 and the medication just shipped ups says the medication should be delivered on june 22 2023 a full 16 days after i initially made contact with dutch to expedite the medication delivery  with prozac you cant immediately stop medication and you need to wean your dog off the pills therefore i couldnt just run out of the pills i proceeded to ration the remaining pills i had and my dog is now off the medication when the pills arrive i will need to reintroduce him to the medication as you can imagine this is not great for my dogs mental health  i plead with you to find a local vet and to avoid this service if you have a problem they will not get back to you in a prompt manner and will endanger the health of your dog

dutch has been a total lifesaver for my household all 3 of my dogs are seniors and oldest one has days of nervousness after a in person vet visit the cost alone of dutch is amazing i can use all 3 of my dogs on one subscription i do wish shipping was a bit faster but overall dutch has been by far the best and a truly caring company also i have one vet for all 3 so no switching vets every visit and having to explain things my vet even checks on them after their visit

believe me when i say i was extremely skeptical of dutch when my husband first mentioned it  the reviews were very mixed our older pup  alex had developed a very intense skin infection on his face that was progressively getting worse by the day we have very tight schedules with work  so my husband found dutch and set up an appointment through zoom with a doctor which took only 15 mins we sent her very clear pics of our dogs problem before the appointment so she already was aware of the issue along with us providing detailed info on the intake form and within 2 days the medication for our sweet pup was delivered to our home she also broke down what each medication was for exactly in a very thorough message which was very helpful i highly recommend this company  we will definitely continue to use them thank you to everyone on the dutch team

my meds were received im so happy  updated i had checked my spam and i did not receive anything could be a bug but i am happy to announce that my first order did send over a tracking number and the customer care here is exceptional once i posted my issue i received swift feedback and the situation was tackled at hand just going to make sure i receive my items before switching to 5 stars i apologize that i had to write a bad review in order to get an answer though  sincerely one concerned pet mama  original everything was great until i never received proper notification of my medications being shipped ive called and they said 5 to 7 days processing and everything was sent over to usps i ordered by 1am friday it is wednesday even though it was memorial day weekend their site says the order ships in 1 to 2 business days so after calling tuesday i called wednesday and was told my items were going to arrive on the 3rd which would be 6 business days yet i still have no tracking number so because i had to end the call quickly i tried calling back later and it just hit voicemail so now im left wondering if ill ever receive my orders that have been paid in full doing my best to remain patient but i wish they were more prompt about their processing orders i am happy to chamge my review rating if the problem is fixed i am in va and am listed as a state they offer prescriptions for i might end up having to pay double for meds and just end up going to the physical vet worst case scenario ill have to refute charges trying to be patient  sincerely one concerned pet mama

terrible company i explained i needed my cats prescription renewed in the appointment reason section the vet connected with me video chatting while driving a car for 2 minutes to tell me they cant do cat prescriptions i asked why they couldnt just tell me that and cancel the appointment instead of wasting my time they refunded me and cancelled my subscription i have two seperate emails confirming they cancelled well a month later they charged me again this is an scam to try to get people to forget they have a subscription and charge monthly they commit fraud when they say that your subscription is cancelled but still charge you can also only cancel through email and there is no way to remove your payment method on the website i have had to report the fraud to my credit card do not use  i sent 3 emails to dutch responding to the feb 7 confirmation that my subscription was cancelled telling them to refund my money and remove my information from their website instead of responding they marked my trustpilot review as illegal charging a credit card you are not authorized to charge  fraud its clear they try hard to scrub negative reviews online

this is basically fraudulent they claim to be a vet service but only after you sign up pay money and authorize automatic renewal and go to schedule an appointment do they tell you that they arent licensed and cant do anything but give advice  they give the excuse that they arent legally able to do what they advertise except in some states but they dont tell you anything about that until you have given them money  to their credit when i complained they did refund the membership fee but i lost almost 3 days responding to my cats veterinary needs because of their misleading advertisement followed by their only telling me their actual capabilities after id asked for what i needed  real veterinary care  the moral of this story just because you see an ad when you search for mobile veterinary service in your area you have no guarantee that you are getting what you searched for look for an actual dvm who actually does house calls

after seeing the good reviews i figured id give it a shot my dog has been dealing with some skin issues and i was really looking forward to her being prescribed a strong topical or oral prescription id made a point to tell the vet i have tried numerous otc items with no success the vet said that they would prescribe some stuff after the call and id see it in my profile and then i approve or deny the items ok great well things turned out not so great i take a look after the call and see that every item they prescribed is otc not only that but the vet threw in items to treat tear stains when i never mentioned my dog having them she never has and the prices were ridiculous every item listed i could get a better product off amazon for the same price half the price and even a third of the price i also learned that the shipping process is not quick but amazon i can get those items next day even chewy would be quicker honestly i would like to rate two stars but im not sure if i just had bad luck with the one vet i saw so i dont want to speak for others and say this service is a complete waste there may be vets that actually listen and are helpful sadly i did not get one of them
